English Sentences: The words of Jeremiah the son of Hilkiah, of the priests that were in Anathoth in the land of Benjamin:
Wolaitta Sentences: Biniyaama biittan Anatoota kataman de7iya qeesetuppe issuwaa gidiya Hilqqiyaa na7aa Ermmaasa qaalai hagaa.

English Sentences: To whom the word of the LORD came in the days of Josiah the son of Amon king of Judah, in the thirteenth year of his reign.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amoona na7ai, Yihudaa Kawoi Yoosiyaasi kawotido tammanne heezzantto laittan GODAA qaalai Ermmaasayyo yiis.

English Sentences: It came also in the days of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah, unto the end of the eleventh year of Zedekiah the son of Josiah king of Judah, unto the carrying away of Jerusalem captive in the fifth month.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Yoosiyaasa na7ai, Yihudaa Kawoi Yo7aqeemi kawotido laittatun GODAA qaalai Ermmaasayyo yiis. Qassikka Yoosiyaasa na7ai, Sedeqiyaasi kawotin, tammanne isiini laittaa gakkanaashin, GODAA qaalai daroton ayyo yiis. He laitti ichchashantta aginan Yerusalaame asai omoodettidi biis.

English Sentences: Then the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai taakko hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: Before I formed thee in the belly I knew thee; and before thou camest forth out of the womb I sanctified thee, and I ordained thee a prophet unto the nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani nena ne aayee uluwan tilanaappe kase eraas. Neeni uluwaappe yelettanaappe kase taani nena geeshshada dummaya wottaas. Qassi kawotettatuyyo hananabaa yootiyaagaa oottada nena sunttaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said I, Ah, Lord GOD! behold, I cannot speak: for I am a child.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin taani, "Hai Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, taani na7a. Taani waati haasayiyaakko erikke" yaagaas.

English Sentences: But the LORD said unto me, Say not, I am a child: for thou shalt go to all that I shall send thee, and whatsoever I command thee thou shalt speak.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI tana hagaadan yaagiis; "Taani na7a gooppa. Taani nena kiittiyo asa ubbaakko ba. Taani azaziyoogaa ubbaakka yoota.

English Sentences: Be not afraid of their faces: for I am with thee to deliver thee, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etau yayyoppa. Aissi giikko, taani nena ashshanau nenaara issippe de7ana. Taani GODAI hagaa odaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then the LORD put forth his hand, and touched my mouth. And the LORD said unto me, Behold, I have put my words in thy mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ba kushiyaa yeddidi, ta doonaa bochchiis. Bochchidi, "Be7a; taani ta qaalaa ne doonan wottaas.

English Sentences: See, I have this day set thee over the nations and over the kingdoms, to root out, and to pull down, and to destroy, and to throw down, to build, and to plant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni shoddanaunne qolanau, xaissanaunne aatta yegganau, keexxanaunne tokkanau, dere asaa bollinne kawotettatu bolli taani hachchi nena sunttaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Moreover the word of the LORD came unto me, saying, Jeremiah, what seest thou? And I said, I see a rod of an almond tree.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai taakko yiidi, "Ermmaasaa, neeyyo aibi beettii?" yaagiis. Yaagin taani zaarada, "Lauze giyo mittaappe kiyida gatimai beettees" yaagaas.

English Sentences: Then said the LORD unto me, Thou hast well seen: for I will hasten my word to perform it.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI tana, "Neeni likke be7adasa. Aissi giikko, taanikka ta qaalai polettin, hegaadan be7anau naagais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the word of the LORD came unto me the second time, saying, What seest thou? And I said, I see a seething pot; and the face thereof is toward the north.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77anttuwaakka GODAA qaalai taakko yiidi, "Harabai qassi aibi beettii?" yaagiis. Yaagin taani zaarada, "Issi penttiya xaaroi huuphessa baggappe haa simmidi, geddi gi uttidaagee beettees" yaagaas.

English Sentences: Then the LORD said unto me, Out of the north an evil shall break forth upon all the inhabitants of the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI tana, "Huuphessa baggappe bashshai poridi, biittan de7iya asaa ubbaa bolli gukkana.

English Sentences: For, lo, I will call all the families of the kingdoms of the north, saith the LORD; and they shall come, and they shall set every one his throne at the entering of the gates of Jerusalem, and against all the walls thereof round about, and against all the cities of Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani huuphessa bagga kawotettatun de7iya asaa ubbaa xeesana hanais. Taani GODAI hagaa odaas. Eta kawoti yiidi, Yerusalaame geliyo penggetun, dirssaa yuushuwaa ubbaaninne Yihudaa katamatu ubban bantta araatata wottana.

English Sentences: And I will utter my judgments against them touching all their wickedness, who have forsaken me, and have burned incense unto other gods, and worshipped the works of their own hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa asai tana aggidi, hara xoossatuyyo yarshshiiddinne bantta kushiyan eti oottidobaayyo goinniiddi, oottido eta iitatettaa ubbaa gishshau, taani ta pirddaa eta bolli yootana.

English Sentences: Thou therefore gird up thy loins, and arise, and speak unto them all that I command thee: be not dismayed at their faces, lest I confound thee before them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin neeni ne huuphiyau giiga! Dendda eqqada, taani nena azaziyoogaa ubbaa etayyo oda. Etayyo yayyoppa. Neeni etayyo yayyikko, taani nena eta sinttan gujja yashissana.

English Sentences: For, behold, I have made thee this day a defenced city, and an iron pillar, and brasen walls against the whole land, against the kings of Judah, against the princes thereof, against the priests thereof, and against the people of the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hachchi taani nena ha biittaa ubbaa bolli, Yihudaa kawotu bolli, halaqatu bolli, qeesetu bollinne ha biittaa asaa bolli gimbbettida katamadan, birata tuussadaaninne nahaase biratan dirido dirssadan oottada minttaas.

English Sentences: And they shall fight against thee; but they shall not prevail against thee; for I am with thee, saith the LORD, to deliver thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti nenaara olettana. SHin taani ashshanau nenaara issippe de7iyo gishshau, nena xoonokkona. Taani GODAI hagaa odaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Moreover the word of the LORD came to me, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai taayyo yiidi,

English Sentences: Go and cry in the ears of Jerusalem, saying, Thus saith the LORD; I remember thee, the kindness of thy youth, the love of thine espousals, when thou wentest after me in the wilderness, in a land that was not sown.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ba; baada Yerusalaame asaa haittan hagaadan yaagada awaajja; Neeni yelagatettan taayyo ai keena ammanettidaakko, qassi neeni biron mishiran de7iyo wode, tana ai keena siiqidaakko, taani GODAI hassayais. Neeni bazzo gidduwaara, zeretti zeretti erenna biittaara tana kaalladasa.

English Sentences: Israel was holiness unto the LORD, and the firstfruits of his increase: all that devour him shall offend; evil shall come upon them, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Israa7eeli GODAAYYO geeshsha. I shiishshiyo baira katta; appe miida ubbati mooranchcha gididosona. Yaatin, eta bolli iitabai yiis. Taani GODAI hagaa odaas yaaga" yaagees.

English Sentences: Hear ye the word of the LORD, O house of Jacob, and all the families of the house of Israel:
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, Yaaqooba asatoo, Israa7eela zaretoo, ubbaikka GODAA qaalaa siyite!

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD, What iniquity have your fathers found in me, that they are gone far from me, and have walked after vanity, and are become vain?
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Kase intte aawati tanan ai mooro demmidi, taappe haakkidi biidonaa? Eti pattenna eeqatuyyo goinniiddi, pattennabaa gididosona.

English Sentences: Neither said they, Where is the LORD that brought us up out of the land of Egypt, that led us through the wilderness, through a land of deserts and of pits, through a land of drought, and of the shadow of death, through a land that no man passed through, and where no man dwelt?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti, Nuna Gibxxeppe kessidaagee, qa77enne aafo gidida bazzuwaara, koshainne sakkana xumai de7iyo biittaara, ai asinne aadhdhenna woikko de7enna sohuwaara kaalettida GODAI awan de7ii? yaagibookkona.

English Sentences: And I brought you into a plentiful country, to eat the fruit thereof and the goodness thereof; but when ye entered, ye defiled my land, and made mine heritage an abomination.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte appe teeraanne lo77obaa maana mala, taani inttena aradda biittau ehaas; shin intte yiidi, ta biittaa tunissidetanne tana sheneyiyaabaa oottideta.

English Sentences: The priests said not, Where is the LORD? and they that handle the law knew me not: the pastors also transgressed against me, and the prophets prophesied by Baal, and walked after things that do not profit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeesetikka, GODAI awan de7ii? yaagibookkona. Ta higgee eta kushiyan de7iyo asatikka tana eribookkona. Deriyaa haariyaageetikka ta bolli makkalidosona. Hananabaa yootiyaageetikka Ba7aala sunttan hananabaa yootidi, pattenna eeqatuyyo goinnidosona" yaagees.

English Sentences: Wherefore I will yet plead with you, saith the LORD, and with your children's children will I plead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Hegaa gishshau, taani inttena bironkka mootana; intte naatu naatakka mootana.

English Sentences: For pass over the isles of Chittim, and see; and send unto Kedar, and consider diligently, and see if there be such a thing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ane arggo baggi biidi, Qophphiroosa giyo haruuruwaa xeellite. Woikko arshsho baggi Qeedaare giyo biittaa asa kiittidi xomoosissite. Yaatidi ane hagaa malabai hagaappe kase baggan hanidaakkonne be7ite.

English Sentences: Hath a nation changed their gods, which are yet no gods? but my people have changed their glory for that which doth not profit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti tumu xoossata gidana xayikkonne, deree ba xoossata laammibeenna. SHin ta asai tana ba bonchchuwaa pattenna eeqatun laammiis" yaagees.

English Sentences: Be astonished, O ye heavens, at this, and be horribly afraid, be ye very desolate, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Salotoo, Poora! giite; dagammidi kokkorite!

English Sentences: For my people have committed two evils; they have forsaken me the fountain of living waters, and hewed them out cisterns, broken cisterns, that can hold no water.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ta asai naa77u iitabata oottiis; hegeetinne, de7o haattaa pulttuwaa tana aggiis; haattaa oiqqanau danddayenna, xoo7etiichchida ollaa baayyo bookkiis.

English Sentences: Is Israel a servant? is he a homeborn slave? why is he spoiled?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eeli ashkkaranne gidenna; son yelettida aillenne gidenna. Yaatin, i aissi do7i oiqqiyoobaa gididee?

English Sentences: The young lions roared upon him, and yelled, and they made his land waste: his cities are burned without inhabitant.
Wolaitta Sentences: A morkketi gaammodan, a bollan gudidosona. Eti bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi daaridosona; eti a biittaa booddila kessidosona; a katamatikka laalettidi, de7iyaabaa xayidosona.

English Sentences: Also the children of Noph and Tahapanes have broken the crown of thy head.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa bollikka Memppisanne Xaafinaasa asati a liiphiyaa meedidosona.

English Sentences: Hast thou not procured this unto thyself, in that thou hast forsaken the LORD thy God, when he led thee by the way?
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenoo Israa7eelaa, i nena ogiyan kaalettishin, GODAA ne Xoossaa aggidoogan hagaa ne bolli ehiidai nena gidikkii?

English Sentences: And now what hast thou to do in the way of Egypt, to drink the waters of Sihor? or what hast thou to do in the way of Assyria, to drink the waters of the river?
Wolaitta Sentences: Naile SHaafaappe haattaa uyanau Gibxxe biyoogee nena ai maaddanee? Woikko Efiraaxiisa SHaafaappe haattaa uyanau Asoore biittaa biyoogee nena ai go77anee?

English Sentences: Thine own wickedness shall correct thee, and thy backslidings shall reprove thee: know therefore and see that it is an evil thing and bitter, that thou hast forsaken the LORD thy God, and that my fear is not in thee, saith the Lord GOD of hosts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi ne iitatettai nena qaxxayana; neeni tana aggidoogee ne bolli pirddana" yaagees. Godai, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Neeni tana GODAA ne Xoossaa aggidoogee ai keena iitanne camo gidiyaakko, ane eranne be7a. Neeni taayyo yayyiyo yashshi nenan baawa.

English Sentences: For of old time I have broken thy yoke, and burst thy bands; and thou saidst, I will not transgress; when upon every high hill and under every green tree thou wanderest, playing the harlot.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani ne qambbaraa beni menttaas; ne qashuwaakka duuttaas. Yaatinkka, Taani neeyyo oottikke yaagadasa. Yaagada dere ubbaa bollinne daashsha mittaa ubbaa garssan shaaramuxadan zin77adasa.

English Sentences: Yet I had planted thee a noble vine, wholly a right seed: how then art thou turned into the degenerate plant of a strange vine unto me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena muruta zerettaappe ekkada, lo77o woine turadan tokkaas. Yaatin, waana guyye simmada, woran mokkida, moorettida woine tura gidadii?" yaagees.

English Sentences: For though thou wash thee with nitre, and take thee much soap, yet thine iniquity is marked before me, saith the Lord GOD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Neeni hancciiciyan meecettiyaakkokka, saamunaa darissada gorppettiyaakkokka, ne mooruwaa qitai ha77ikka ta sinttaana.

English Sentences: How canst thou say, I am not polluted, I have not gone after Baalim? see thy way in the valley, know what thou hast done: thou art a swift dromedary traversing her ways;
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni waanada, Taani tunabeikke; taani Ba7aala eeqatuyyo goinnanau woxxabeikke gaanau danddayai? Ane neeni wombban hanidobaa xeella; neeni oottidobaanne akeeka. Neeni yaanne haanne wottaa jaamiya gaameelee mala.

English Sentences: A wild ass used to the wilderness, that snuffeth up the wind at her pleasure; in her occasion who can turn her away? all they that seek her will not weary themselves; in her month they shall find her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni bazzuwaa meezetida, ba ziitaa wode carkkuwaa singgettiya haree mala. A birassau eqqaichchin, ooni o teqqanau danddayii? O ziittiya ai wodala hareenne daafurenna; i i ceggenan o demmi aggees.

English Sentences: Withhold thy foot from being unshod, and thy throat from thirst: but thou saidst, There is no hope: no; for I have loved strangers, and after them will I go.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenoo, Israa7eelaa, ne caammai wurana gakkanaashiininne ne kookkee melana gakkanaashin, hara xoossatu geeduwaa hagaadan woxxoppa. SHin neeni, Ixxisi, hegee tana ainne maaddenna. Aissi giikko, taani imatta xoossata siiqarggaas; taani etau goinnana yaagadasa.

English Sentences: As the thief is ashamed when he is found, so is the house of Israel ashamed; they, their kings, their princes, and their priests, and their prophets,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Kaisoi ohettido wode yeellatiyoogaadan, Israa7eela asai yeellatees; etikka, eta kawoti, eta halaqati, eta qeesetinne eta hananabaa yootiyaageeti ubbai yeellatoosona.

English Sentences: Saying to a stock, Thou art my father; and to a stone, Thou hast brought me forth: for they have turned their back unto me, and not their face: but in the time of their trouble they will say, Arise, and save us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti mittaa, Neeni ta aawaa yaagoosona; qassi shuchchaa, Neeni tana yeladasa yaagoosona. Eti taayyo bantta som77uwaa aggidi, bantta zokkuwaa zaaridosona. SHin eti metootiyo wode tana, Dendda! Denddada nuna ashsha! yaagoosona.

English Sentences: But where are thy gods that thou hast made thee? let them arise, if they can save thee in the time of thy trouble: for according to the number of thy cities are thy gods, O Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin anee, intte intteyyo medhdhido xoossati awan de7iyoonaa? Intte metootiyo wode inttena ashshanau danddayikko, ane denddona! Inttenoo, Yihudaa asatoo, intte xoossati intte katamatu keena cora" yaagees.

English Sentences: Wherefore will ye plead with me? ye all have transgressed against me, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Intte tanaara aissi mootetteetii? Intte ubbaikka taayyo makkalideta.

English Sentences: In vain have I smitten your children; they received no correction: your own sword hath devoured your prophets, like a destroying lion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttena coo mela qaxxayaas; qaxxayinkka intte baayibeekketa. Namisettida gaammuwaadan, intte bisoi intte hananabaa yootiyaageeta mirggiis" yaagees.

English Sentences: O generation, see ye the word of the LORD. Have I been a wilderness unto Israel? a land of darkness? wherefore say my people, We are lords; we will come no more unto thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, ha wodiyaa yeletatoo, GODAA qaalaa siyite! I hagaadan yaagees; "Taani intteyyo, Israa7eelatuyyo bazzo mala woi sakkana xuma biittaa mala gididanaayye? Yaatin, aissi ta asai, Nuuni nu shenedan baana; naa77antto mulekka neekko simmokko yaagii?

English Sentences: Can a maid forget her ornaments, or a bride her attire? yet my people have forgotten me days without number.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geela7iyaa ba alleequwaa woikko bullashettiyaara ba bullachchaa maayuwaa dogai? SHin ta asai tana qoodi bainna gallassaa dogiis.

English Sentences: Why trimmest thou thy way to seek love? therefore hast thou also taught the wicked ones thy ways.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne laggettotu geeduwaa woxxiyoogaa aiba meezetadii! Keehi iita maccaasatikka ne ogiyaappe tamaaranau danddayoosona.

English Sentences: Also in thy skirts is found the blood of the souls of the poor innocents: I have not found it by secret search, but upon all these.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi menttidi gelishin oiqqido asaa suuttan gidennan, xillo hiyyeesatu suuttaa xacan ne maayoi mooretti uttiis. "Neeni hagaa ubbaa oottadakka,

English Sentences: Yet thou sayest, Because I am innocent, surely his anger shall turn from me. Behold, I will plead with thee, because thou sayest, I have not sinned.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani xillo; tumuppe GODAI ta bolli hanqqettenna yaagaasa. Neeni, Taani nagara oottabeikke giyo gishshau, taani ne bollan pirddana.

English Sentences: Why gaddest thou about so much to change thy way? thou also shalt be ashamed of Egypt, as thou wast ashamed of Assyria.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaanin neeni ne ogiyaa laammanau aissi bichchaarai? Kase nena Asoore biittai yeellayidoogaadan, Gibxxe biittaikka yeellayana.

English Sentences: Yea, thou shalt go forth from him, and thine hands upon thine head: for the LORD hath rejected thy confidences, and thou shalt not prosper in them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni hagaappekka ne huuphiyaa oiqqada kiyana. Aissi giikko, GODAI neeni ammanettiyoogeeta ixxiis. Neeni etan maadettakka" yaagees.

English Sentences: They say, If a man put away his wife, and she go from him, and become another man's, shall he return unto her again? shall not that land be greatly polluted? but thou hast played the harlot with many lovers; yet return again to me, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Issi asi ba keettaayyiyo yeddin, a baada hara azinaa gelikko, he bitanee naa77antto o zaarii? Zaarikko he biittai aadhdhida tunaa tunees! SHin neeni shaaramuxadan, cora laggettotuura de7adasa; yaanadakka ha77i neeni taakko simmuutee!

English Sentences: Lift up thine eyes unto the high places, and see where thou hast not been lien with. In the ways hast thou sat for them, as the Arabian in the wilderness; and thou hast polluted the land with thy whoredoms and with thy wickedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ane xoqqu gaada, aibinne bainna dereta xeella. Neeni shaaramuxadan zin77abeennasi hegan de7ii? Arabai bazzon bonqqanau uttidi naagiyoogaadan, neeni laggettota naagaidda ogiyaa xaphon uttadasa. Yaatada ne shaaramuxaaninne ne iitatettan biittaa tunissadasa.

English Sentences: Therefore the showers have been withholden, and there hath been no latter rain; and thou hadst a whore's forehead, thou refusedst to be ashamed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, badhdheesai teqettiis; silaa iraikka bukkennan aggiis. Hegaa hanikkokka, neeyyo shaaramuxiyo merai de7ees; neeni yeellatennan ixxadasa.

English Sentences: Wilt thou not from this time cry unto me, My father, thou art the guide of my youth?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha77i neeni tana, Ta aawau, ta naatettaasappe doommin, neeni tana siiqaasa.

English Sentences: Will he reserve his anger for ever? will he keep it to the end? Behold, thou hast spoken and done evil things as thou couldest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ubbaton ta bolli yiillotuutee? Ne hanqqoi merinaukka aggennee? yaagaasa. Ee, neeni hagaa yaagaasa; shin neeni oottanau danddayiyo iitaa ubbaa oottaasa" yaagees.

English Sentences: The LORD said also unto me in the days of Josiah the king, Hast thou seen that which backsliding Israel hath done? she is gone up upon every high mountain and under every green tree, and there hath played the harlot.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Yoosiyaasi kawotido laitti, GODAI tana hagaadan yaagiis; "Hanna ammanoi bainna Israa7eela oottidobaa neeni be7adii? A dere ubbaa bollinne daashsha mittatu ubbaa garssi baada, yan shaaramuxaasu.

English Sentences: And I said after she had done all these things, Turn thou unto me. But she returned not. And her treacherous sister Judah saw it.
Wolaitta Sentences: A hagaa ubbaa oottadakka, taakko simmausu gaada qoppaas, shin simmabeikku. Qassi i michchiyaa, ammanettenna Yihudakka hegaa be7aasu.

English Sentences: And I saw, when for all the causes whereby backsliding Israel committed adultery I had put her away, and given her a bill of divorce; yet her treacherous sister Judah feared not, but went and played the harlot also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ammanoi bainna Israa7eela daroton shaaramuxido gishshau, paramaa immada o yeddaas. Hegaa gidinkka Israa7eeli michchiyaa, ammanettenna Yihuda yayyennaagaa taani be7aas; akka kiyada shaaramuxaasu.

English Sentences: And it came to pass through the lightness of her whoredom, that she defiled the land, and committed adultery with stones and with stocks.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaaramuxiyoogee iyyo qii laafabaa gidiyo gishshau, mittaaranne shuchchaara shaaramuxada biittaa tunissaasu.

English Sentences: And yet for all this her treacherous sister Judah hath not turned unto me with her whole heart, but feignedly, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan ubbankka i michchiyaa, ammanettenna Yihuda, coo simmidabaa milatausuppe attin, kumetta wozanaappe taakko simmabeikku. Taani GODAI hagaa odaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto me, The backsliding Israel hath justified herself more than treacherous Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI taayyo hagaadan yaagiis; "Ammanettenna Yihudippe ammanoi bainna Israa7eela xillo.

English Sentences: Go and proclaim these words toward the north, and say, Return, thou backsliding Israel, saith the LORD; and I will not cause mine anger to fall upon you: for I am merciful, saith the LORD, and I will not keep anger for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba; baada huuphessa baggaassi hagaadan yaagada awaajja; GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Bii, ammanoi bainna Israa7eelee, simma! Taani maarotai kumidoogaa gidiyo gishshau, taani nena iita aifiyan xeellikke. Merinau hanqqettikke.

English Sentences: Only acknowledge thine iniquity, that thou hast transgressed against the LORD thy God, and hast scattered thy ways to the strangers under every green tree, and ye have not obeyed my voice, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, neeni, Taani GODAA ta Xoossaa bolli makkalaas. Allaga xoossatuura daashsha mittaa ubbaa garssan shaaramuxaas. Ne qaalaayyo azazettabeikke gaada ne mooruwaa ammananau koshshees. Taani GODAI hagaa odaas" yaagees yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Turn, O backsliding children, saith the LORD; for I am married unto you: and I will take you one of a city, and two of a family, and I will bring you to Zion:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Inttenoo, ammanettenna asatoo, simmite; aissi giikko, taani intte azinaa. Taani inttena issuwaa issi katamaappe, naa77aa issi yaraappe doorada ekkana; ekkada inttena Xiyoone ehaana.

English Sentences: And I will give you pastors according to mine heart, which shall feed you with knowledge and understanding.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, taani ta wozanaadan, inttena heemmiya henttanchchata intteyyo immana. Eti inttena eratettaaninne akeekan heemmana" yaagees.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass, when ye be multiplied and increased in the land, in those days, saith the LORD, they shall say no more, The ark of the covenant of the LORD: neither shall it come to mind: neither shall they remember it; neither shall they visit it; neither shall that be done any more.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI, "He gallassatun intte he biittan corattiyo wode, asati, GODAA Maachchaa Taabootaa giidi haasayokkona. I etayyo karihinne geenna, woikko hassayettenna, woikko bainnaageekka etau qofettenna; qassi harai oosettenna.

English Sentences: At that time they shall call Jerusalem the throne of the LORD; and all the nations shall be gathered unto it, to the name of the LORD, to Jerusalem: neither shall they walk any more after the imagination of their evil heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wodiyan eti Yerusalaame GODAA Kawotaa Araataa giidi xeesana. Kawotetta ubbaappe asai GODAA sunttaa bonchchanau Yerusalaame shiiqana. Hegaappe sinttan eti ixxisi giidi, bantta iita qofaa kaallokkona.

English Sentences: In those days the house of Judah shall walk with the house of Israel, and they shall come together out of the land of the north to the land that I have given for an inheritance unto your fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassatun Yihudaa asati Israa7eela asatuura issippe gaittidi, huuphessa bagga biittaappe taani kase intte aawata laatissido biittaa issippe yaana" yaagees.

English Sentences: But I said, How shall I put thee among the children, and give thee a pleasant land, a goodly heritage of the hosts of nations? and I said, Thou shalt call me, My father; and shalt not turn away from me.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani inttena attuma naatudan waata wottanaakkonne,

English Sentences: Surely as a wife treacherously departeth from her husband, so have ye dealt treacherously with me, O house of Israel, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: payya biittaa, kawotetta ubbaappe aadhdhidi, lo77iya biittaa waata laatissanaakkonne qoppaas. Qassi tana, Ta aawau giidi xeesananne tana kaalliyoosaappe guyye simmokkona gaada qoppaas. SHin Israa7eela asatoo, intte ba azinaayyo ammanettenna maccaaseedan taayyo ammanettibeekketa" yaagees.

English Sentences: A voice was heard upon the high places, weeping and supplications of the children of Israel: for they have perverted their way, and they have forgotten the LORD their God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aibakko bainna xoqqa deretu bollan cenggurssai siyettees; hegeenne, Israa7eela asaa yeehuwaanne watiwatuwaa. Aissi giikko, eti bantta ogiyaa geellayidosonanne GODAA bantta Xoossaa dogidosona.

English Sentences: Return, ye backsliding children, and I will heal your backslidings. Behold, we come unto thee; for thou art the LORD our God.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI eta, "Inttenoo, ammanoi bainna asatoo, taakko simmite. Intte ammanettana mala, taani inttena pattana" yaagiis. Yaagin eti, "Eeno, nuuni neekko simmana. Aissi giikko, neeni GODAA nu Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Truly in vain is salvation hoped for from the hills, and from the multitude of mountains: truly in the LORD our God is the salvation of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni keratu huuphiyaaninne deretu huuphiyan eeqau goinniyoogee tumuppe cimo. Tumuppe nuuyyo, Israa7eelatuyyo atotettai GODAANA, nu Xoossaana.

English Sentences: For shame hath devoured the labour of our fathers from our youth; their flocks and their herds, their sons and their daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu yelagatettaasappe doommin, nu aawati daafuridi demmidobaa, eta dorssaanne miizzaa, eta maccanne attuma naata, yeellayiya eeqati mi xaissidosona.

English Sentences: We lie down in our shame, and our confusion covereth us: for we have sinned against the LORD our God, we and our fathers, from our youth even unto this day, and have not obeyed the voice of the LORD our God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu yelagatettaasappe doommidi, hachchi gakkanaassi, nuunikka nu aawatikka GODAA nu Xoossaa bolli nagaraa oottida. GODAA nu Xoossaa qaalaassi azazettibookko. Hegaa gishshau, ane nuuni yeellau duge gufannoos; qassi kaushshai nuna afaladan kammo" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: If thou wilt return, O Israel, saith the LORD, return unto me: and if thou wilt put away thine abominations out of my sight, then shalt thou not remove.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Israa7eela asau, simmikko, haa taakko simmite. Intte taani shenetiyo intte eeqata ta sinttappe diggikko, taappe wora baana xayikkonne

English Sentences: And thou shalt swear, The LORD liveth, in truth, in judgment, and in righteousness; and the nations shall bless themselves in him, and in him shall they glory.
Wolaitta Sentences: intte tuman, suuretettaaninne xillotettan, GODAI ero! giidi caaqqikko, he wode kawotettati an anjjettananne an ceeqqana" yaagees.

English Sentences: For thus saith the LORD to the men of Judah and Jerusalem, Break up your fallow ground, and sow not among thorns.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Yihudaa asaayyoonne Yerusalaamen de7iyaageetuyyoo hagaadan yaagees; "Intte otta biittaa goyite; agunttaa bolli zeroppite.

English Sentences: Circumcise yourselves to the LORD, and take away the foreskins of your heart, ye men of Judah and inhabitants of Jerusalem: lest my fury come forth like fire, and burn that none can quench it, because of the evil of your doings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, Yihudaa asatoo, Yerusalaamen de7iyaageetoo, intte intte huuphen Xoossaayyo qaxxarettite; intte wozanaa shoohuwaa diggite. Hegee xayikko, intte oottido iitatettaa gishshau, ta hanqqoi tamaadan eexxi kiyana. A ooninne toissanau danddayenna" yaagees.

English Sentences: Declare ye in Judah, and publish in Jerusalem; and say, Blow ye the trumpet in the land: cry, gather together, and say, Assemble yourselves, and let us go into the defenced cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Yihudan yootite. Yerusalaamen, Biitta ubban malkkataa punnite! yaagidi awaajjite. Intte qaalaa xoqqissidi, hagaadan giidi waassite! Issippe shiiqite! Ane gimbbee yuuyi aadhdhido katamaa hinddite! yaagite.

English Sentences: Set up the standard toward Zion: retire, stay not: for I will bring evil from the north, and a great destruction.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai Xiyoone baana mala malaatite! Intteyyo saro attanau baqatite! Gam77oppite! Aissi giikko, taani huuphessa bagga biittaappe iitabaanne gita bashshaa ehais.

English Sentences: The lion is come up from his thicket, and the destroyer of the Gentiles is on his way; he is gone forth from his place to make thy land desolate; and thy cities shall be laid waste, without an inhabitant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaammoi ba de7iyo buuraappe kiyiyoogaadan, kawotettata xaissiyaagee ba sohuwaappe denddiis. Denddidi intte biittaa xaissanau yiis. Intte katamati moorettidi ona gidana.

English Sentences: For this gird you with sackcloth, lament and howl: for the fierce anger of the LORD is not turned back from us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, waaruwaa maayidi, Aayyee! Aayyee! yaagidi zilaalitenne yeekkite. Aissi giikko, GODAA hanqqoi suulliyaagee nu bollappe kichchiichchibeenna" yaagees.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass at that day, saith the LORD, that the heart of the king shall perish, and the heart of the princes; and the priests shall be astonished, and the prophets shall wonder.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI, "He gallassi, kawuwaa wozanainne halaqatu wozanai taahana. Qeesetikka dagammana. Hananabaa yootiyaageetikka, Poora! giidi doonaa oiqqana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Then said I, Ah, Lord GOD! surely thou hast greatly deceived this people and Jerusalem, saying, Ye shall have peace; whereas the sword reacheth unto the soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin taani, "Hai Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, bisoi eta qooriyan wodhdhiyo wode, Intteyyo sa7i saro gidana yaagada, ha asaanne Yerusalaame pala cimo cimmadasa" yaagaas.

English Sentences: At that time shall it be said to this people and to Jerusalem, A dry wind of the high places in the wilderness toward the daughter of my people, not to fan, nor to cleanse,
Wolaitta Sentences: He wodiyan ha asaassinne Yerusalaamessi, GODAI hagaadan yaagees geetettana; "Bazzuwan de7iya aibinne bainna xoqqa deretuppe michchiyaa carkkoi ta asaa bolli carkkana; shin hegee kattaa suragganaassanne geeshshanaassa gidenna.

English Sentences: Even a full wind from those places shall come unto me: now also will I give sentence against them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe keehi wolqqaamiya carkkoi ta azazuwan carkkana; ha77i taani eta bolli pirddana" gees geetettana.

English Sentences: Behold, he shall come up as clouds, and his chariots shall be as a whirlwind: his horses are swifter than eagles. Woe unto us! for we are spoiled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7ite, morkkee shaaraadan kiyees. A paraa gaaretikka gote mala; a parati argganttaappekka aadhdhi eesotoosona. Aayye7ana nunoo! Baa xayida!

English Sentences: O Jerusalem, wash thine heart from wickedness, that thou mayest be saved. How long shall thy vain thoughts lodge within thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenoo Yerusalaamee, attana mala, ne wozanaa meeccada iitatettaappe geeshshargga! Iita qofai ne wozanan aude gakkanaashin gam77anee?

English Sentences: For a voice declareth from Dan, and publisheth affliction from mount Ephraim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daana katamaappenne Efireema Deriyaappe yiidaageeti iitabaa awaajjoosona.

English Sentences: Make ye mention to the nations; behold, publish against Jerusalem, that watchers come from a far country, and give out their voice against the cities of Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Kawotettatuyyo yootite; Yerusalaameyyookka hagaadan yaagidi awaajjite; Haaho biittaappe olai yees; yiidi Yihudaa katamatu bollan alaahees.

English Sentences: As keepers of a field, are they against her round about; because she hath been rebellious against me, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ta bolli makkalido gishshau, gaden de7iya kattaa naagiyaageetuugaadan, he olanchchati Yihudaa yuushuwan yuuyi aadhdhoosona yaagite" yaagees.

English Sentences: Thy way and thy doings have procured these things unto thee; this is thy wickedness, because it is bitter, because it reacheth unto thine heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa asatoo, intte hanoinne intte oosoi hagaa ubbaa intte bolli ehiis. Hagee intteyyo qixaate. I ai keesa cammiyaabee! Intte wozanaa ai keesa caddiyaabee!

English Sentences: My bowels, my bowels! I am pained at my very heart; my heart maketh a noise in me; I cannot hold my peace, because thou hast heard, O my soul, the sound of the trumpet, the alarm of war.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aayyee tanoo! Taani hagaa waata danddayanee! Aayyee ta wozanau! Ta wozanai diddiqees; taani co77u gaanau danddayikke. Aissi giikko, taani malkkataa punettaanne olaa alaassaa siyaas.

English Sentences: Destruction upon destruction is cried; for the whole land is spoiled: suddenly are my tents spoiled, and my curtains in a moment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitabai iitabaa kaallees; mule biittai moorettiis. Ta dunkkaanetinne magalashoti eesuwan xayidosona.

English Sentences: How long shall I see the standard, and hear the sound of the trumpet?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani aude gakkanau olaa malaataa xeellaneenne malkkataa punettaa siyanee?

English Sentences: For my people is foolish, they have not known me; they are sottish children, and they have none understanding: they are wise to do evil, but to do good they have no knowledge.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Ta asai eeyya; eti tana erokkona. Eti qofi bainna naata; etayyo akeeki baawa. Eti iitabaa oottanau eranchcha; shin lo77obaa oottanau erokkona" yaagees.

English Sentences: I beheld the earth, and, lo, it was without form, and void; and the heavens, and they had no light.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani sa7aa xeellaas; xeellada sa7ai giigiichchibeennaagaanne aibinne bainna mela gidiyoogaa be7aas. Qassi salota xeellaas; xeellada etan poo7oi bainnaagaa be7aas.

English Sentences: I beheld the mountains, and, lo, they trembled, and all the hills moved lightly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani dereta xeellaas; xeellada eti qaaxxiyoogaanne kerati ubbai guyyenne sinttau gajigajiyoogaa be7aas.

English Sentences: I beheld, and, lo, there was no man, and all the birds of the heavens were fled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani xeellaas; shin aiba asanne be7abeikke; saluwaa kafotikka ubbai paallidi baqatidosona.

English Sentences: I beheld, and, lo, the fruitful place was a wilderness, and all the cities thereof were broken down at the presence of the LORD, and by his fierce anger.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani xeellaas; xeellada aradda biittai qa77e gididoogaa be7aas; GODAA sinttan, a suulo hanqquwaa sinttan he biittaa katamatikka yoodettidosona.

English Sentences: For thus hath the LORD said, The whole land shall be desolate; yet will I not make a full end.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Mule biittai moorettana; shin taani a wurssa xaissikke.

English Sentences: For this shall the earth mourn, and the heavens above be black: because I have spoken it, I have purposed it, and will not repent, neither will I turn back from it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, sa7ai yeekkana; salotikka bollan xumana. Aissi giikko, taani garggaas; marssettikke. Taani qofaa qachchaichchaas; aggikke" yaagees.

English Sentences: The whole city shall flee for the noise of the horsemen and bowmen; they shall go into thickets, and climb up upon the rocks: every city shall be forsaken, and not a man dwell therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paraasatunne wonddafiyaasatu garmmaamuwan, asai katama ubbaappe goossiis. Baggati woxxidi woraa garssi gelin, baggati qassi zaallaa shibboosona. Katamai ubbai onidi, de7iya asa xayiis.

English Sentences: And when thou art spoiled, what wilt thou do? Though thou clothest thyself with crimson, though thou deckest thee with ornaments of gold, though thou rentest thy face with painting, in vain shalt thou make thyself fair; thy lovers will despise thee, they will seek thy life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenoo, moorettaichchidaaree, neeni ai oottai? Ne zo7o maayuwaanne aissi maayai? Worqqa alleeqonne aissi wottai? Ne aifiyaa ciruwaanne aissi tiyai? Neeni coo mela nena loittaasa. Ne laggettoti nena karidosona; eti nena woranau koyoosona.

English Sentences: For I have heard a voice as of a woman in travail, and the anguish as of her that bringeth forth her first child, the voice of the daughter of Zion, that bewaileth herself, that spreadeth her hands, saying, Woe is me now! for my soul is wearied because of murderers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani maareta ohettida maccaasiyaa waassiyoogaa mala waasuwaa siyaas. I waasoi koiro na7a yeliya maccaasee ooliyaa mala. He waasoi, Yerusalaama shemppuwaa teqettada, ba kushiyaa zohaidda, "Aayyee tanoo! Hekko tana woranau hanoosona!" yaagada waassiyo waasuwaa.

English Sentences: Run ye to and fro through the streets of Jerusalem, and see now, and know, and seek in the broad places thereof, if ye can find a man, if there be any that executeth judgment, that seeketh the truth; and I will pardon it.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Ane Yerusalaame ogiyaa pudenne duge hemettite; ane yuuyi aadhdhidi xeellitenne akeekite; a gutarankka koyite. Xillo pirddiyaanne tumaa koyiya issi asa intte demmikko, taani Yerusalaame maarana.

English Sentences: And though they say, The LORD liveth; surely they swear falsely.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti, GODAI ero giikkokka, eti tumuppe wordduwan caaqqoosona" yaagees.

English Sentences: O LORD, are not thine eyes upon the truth? thou hast stricken them, but they have not grieved; thou hast consumed them, but they have refused to receive correction: they have made their faces harder than a rock; they have refused to return.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne aifeti tumaa xeellokkonaayye? Neeni eta dechchadasa, shin eta sakkibeenna. Neeni eta kinchcherettadasa, shin eti seeraa ekkennan ixxidosona. Eti bantta som77uwaa zaallaappe aatti minttidi, bantta nagaraappe simmennan ixxidosona.

English Sentences: Therefore I said, Surely these are poor; they are foolish: for they know not the way of the LORD, nor the judgment of their God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, taani hagaadan yaagada qoppaas; "Hageeti hiyyeesa kanchche; hageeti eeyya. Aissi giikko, eti GODAA ogiyaa, bantta Xoossaa higgiyaa erokkona.

English Sentences: I will get me unto the great men, and will speak unto them; for they have known the way of the LORD, and the judgment of their God: but these have altogether broken the yoke, and burst the bonds.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi taani gita asatukko baananne etau odana. Aissi giikko, eti GODAA ogiyaa, bantta Xoossaa higgiyaa eroosona" yaagada qoppaas. SHin eti ubbaikka issippe a qambbaraa menttidosonanne qashuwaakka duuttidosona.

English Sentences: Wherefore a lion out of the forest shall slay them, and a wolf of the evenings shall spoil them, a leopard shall watch over their cities: every one that goeth out thence shall be torn in pieces: because their transgressions are many, and their backslidings are increased.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, gaammoi ba woraappe kiyidi, eta worana. Suilaalee bazzoppe kiyidi, eta mi xaissana. Maahee eta katamata zuggidi naagana. He katamatuppe kiyiya ubbai puuzetti wurana. Aissi giikko, eta makkalai dalggiis; eta hereecaikka dariis.

English Sentences: How shall I pardon thee for this? thy children have forsaken me, and sworn by them that are no gods: when I had fed them to the full, they then committed adultery, and assembled themselves by troops in the harlots' houses.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani intte nagaraa aissi atto goo? Intte naati tana aggidi, worddo xoossatun caaqqidosona. Taani eta mizada kalissaas; shin eti shaaramuxidosonanne shaaramuxatu keettaa ziiridosona.

English Sentences: They were as fed horses in the morning: every one neighed after his neighbour's wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti xiikettida korima paradan ziittiiddi, hara asa machcho laggettanau jaamoosona.

English Sentences: Shall I not visit for these things? saith the LORD: and shall not my soul be avenged on such a nation as this?
Wolaitta Sentences: Tumu taani ha yohotu gishshau, eta qaxxayanau bessikkinaa? Hagaa mala kawotettaassi ta haluwaa kessikkinaa?" yaagees.

English Sentences: Go ye up upon her walls, and destroy; but make not a full end: take away her battlements; for they are not the LORD's.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "I woiniyaa turaa maaraa giddoora biiddi bashshite; shin wurssi xaissoppite.

English Sentences: For the house of Israel and the house of Judah have dealt very treacherously against me, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: I tasheta kari olite; aissi giikko, eti GODAASSA gidokkona. Israa7eela asatinne Yihudaa asati mulekka ammanettibookkona" yaagees.

English Sentences: They have belied the LORD, and said, It is not he; neither shall evil come upon us; neither shall we see sword nor famine:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hagaadan giidi, GODAA bolli wordduwaa haasayidosona; "I ainne oottenna; qohiyaabi aibinne nu bolli yeenna. Morkkiyaa bisuwaa woikko koshaa nuuni mulekka be7okko.

English Sentences: And the prophets shall become wind, and the word is not in them: thus shall it be done unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiyaageeti carkko mala; etan Xoossaa qaalai baawa. Hegaa gishshau, eti giyoobai ubbai eta gakko" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: Wherefore thus saith the LORD God of hosts, Because ye speak this word, behold, I will make my words in thy mouth fire, and this people wood, and it shall devour them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAI, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama Xoossai Israa7eela asaa hagaadan yaagees; "Eti ha qaalaa haasayido gishshau, taani ta qaalaa ne doonan tama kessana. Ha asaakka mitta kessana; he tamai eta mi xaissana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Lo, I will bring a nation upon you from far, O house of Israel, saith the LORD: it is a mighty nation, it is an ancient nation, a nation whose language thou knowest not, neither understandest what they say.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI inttena hagaadan yaagees; "Inttenoo, Israa7eela asatoo, taani intte bolli haaho biittaappe issi kawotettaa ehais. Inne wolqqaamanne beni kawotetta. Eta qaalaa intte erenna, eta haasayaikka intteyyo gelenna kawotetta.

English Sentences: Their quiver is as an open sepulchre, they are all mighty men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta zubbiyaa shoohoi dooya de7iya duufo mala. Eti ubbaikka wolqqaama asa.

English Sentences: And they shall eat up thine harvest, and thy bread, which thy sons and thy daughters should eat: they shall eat up thy flocks and thine herds: they shall eat up thy vines and thy fig trees: they shall impoverish thy fenced cities, wherein thou trustedst, with the sword.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti intte kattaanne qumaa dafidi maana. Intte attuma naatakka macca naatakka worana. Intte dorssaakka miizzaakka dafidi maana. Intte woiniyaa turaa teeraakka balasiyaa giyo mittaa teeraakka dafidi maana. Intte ammanettiyo, gimbbettida katamatakka eti bantta bisuwan olidi bashshana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Nevertheless in those days, saith the LORD, I will not make a full end with you.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Ermmaasa hagaadan yaagees; "SHin he gallassatun gidikkokka, taani ta asaa muleera wurssa xaissikke.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass, when ye shall say, Wherefore doeth the LORD our God all these things unto us? then shalt thou answer them, Like as ye have forsaken me, and served strange gods in your land, so shall ye serve strangers in a land that is not yours.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai nena, GODAI nu Xoossai nu bolli hagaa ubbaa aissi oottidee? giidi oichchiyo wode, neeni etayyo, Intte tana, GODAA aggidi, inttesan imatta xoossatussi oottidoogaadan, hegaadan inttekka asasan imatta asatussi oottana yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Declare this in the house of Jacob, and publish it in Judah, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI, "Hagaa Yaaqooba asatuyyo oda; Yihudaa biittankka hagaadan yaagada awaajja;

English Sentences: Hear now this, O foolish people, and without understanding; which have eyes, and see not; which have ears, and hear not:
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, aifee de7ishin xeellennaageetoo, haittai de7ishin siyennaageetoo, eeyyanne damma asatoo, hagaa siyite!

English Sentences: Fear ye not me? saith the LORD: will ye not tremble at my presence, which have placed the sand for the bound of the sea by a perpetual decree, that it cannot pass it: and though the waves thereof toss themselves, yet can they not prevail; though they roar, yet can they not pass over it?
Wolaitta Sentences: Laa intte taayyo aissi yayyekketii? Intte ta sinttan aissi kokkorekketii? Aissi giikko, taani shaaheetaa abbaayyo zawa, merinau a pinttenna dirssa oottaas. Beetati pushakettikkokka xoonanau danddayokkona. Eti guummikkokka pinnanau danddayokkona.

English Sentences: But this people hath a revolting and a rebellious heart; they are revolted and gone.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ha asatuyyo muumenne makkala wozanai de7ees. Eti issi baggi simmidi, wora biidosona.

English Sentences: Neither say they in their heart, Let us now fear the LORD our God, that giveth rain, both the former and the latter, in his season: he reserveth unto us the appointed weeks of the harvest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta wozanan, "Nuussi silaa iraara gabbaa iraara wodiyan wodiyan immiya, nuna nu kattaa dabarssissennan shiishissiya GODAASSI, nu Xoossaassi, ane yayyoos" gibookkona.

English Sentences: Your iniquities have turned away these things, and your sins have withholden good things from you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte iita oosoi hageeta teqqiis. Intte nagarai inttena lo77obaappe ashshiis yaaga" yaagees.

English Sentences: For among my people are found wicked men: they lay wait, as he that setteth snares; they set a trap, they catch men.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Ta asaa giddon iita asati de7oosona. Kafota oiqqanau naagiya asatudan zuggidi naagoosona. Eti gitiyaa yeggoosona; yeggidi asata oiqqoosona.

English Sentences: As a cage is full of birds, so are their houses full of deceit: therefore they are become great, and waxen rich.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koottan kafoi kumidoogaadan, eta keettan cimoi kumiis. Hegaa gishshau, eti gitanne dure gididosona.

English Sentences: They are waxen fat, they shine: yea, they overpass the deeds of the wicked: they judge not the cause, the cause of the fatherless, yet they prosper; and the right of the needy do they not judge.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti orddenne modhdho gididi diccidosona. Eta iita oosuwaassi zawai baawa. Eti aawi bainna naata shatinttanau eta gishshaa mootettokkona; hiyyeesatu maataakka naagibookkona.

English Sentences: Shall I not visit for these things? saith the LORD: shall not my soul be avenged on such a nation as this?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, taani GODAI eta hegaa gishshau, qaxxayanau bessikkinaa? Hagaa mala kawotettaa bolli ta haluwaa kessanau bessikkinaa?" yaagees.

English Sentences: A wonderful and horrible thing is committed in the land;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Daro iitabainne daganttiyaabai biittaa bollan haniis.

English Sentences: The prophets prophesy falsely, and the priests bear rule by their means; and my people love to have it so: and what will ye do in the end thereof?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiyaageeti wordduwaa yootoosona; qeesetikka eta zoriyan aissoosona. Ta asaikka hegaa malabaa dosees! SHin wurssettan waanuuteetii?" yaagees.

English Sentences: O ye children of Benjamin, gather yourselves to flee out of the midst of Jerusalem, and blow the trumpet in Tekoa, and set up a sign of fire in Bethhaccerem: for evil appeareth out of the north, and great destruction.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI, "Inttenoo, Biniyaama asatoo, intte shemppuwaa ashshanau baqatite! Yerusalaameppe kiyite! Taqo7a kataman malkkataa punnite! Beeti-Hakkareema giyoosan malaataa bessite! Aissi giikko, huuphessa baggappe iitabainne hanttaara bashshai yaana hanees.

English Sentences: I have likened the daughter of Zion to a comely and delicate woman.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani lo77iyaanne ufaissiya Xiyoone katamata xaissana.

English Sentences: The shepherds with their flocks shall come unto her; they shall pitch their tents against her round about; they shall feed every one in his place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Morkketi henttanchchatudan bantta wudiyaa ekkidi, a bolli yaana. Yiidi a yuushuwan bantta dunkkaaniyaa dunkkaanana; bantta wudiyaanne bantta sohuwan sohuwan heemmana.

English Sentences: Prepare ye war against her; arise, and let us go up at noon. Woe unto us! for the day goeth away, for the shadows of the evening are stretched out.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti issoi issuwaa, Yerusalaameera olettanau giigite! Denddite! Ane nuuni a seeta gallassi oloos. SHin aayye7ana! Sa7ai qammees; omarssaa kuwai aduqqi aduqqi bees.

English Sentences: Arise, and let us go by night, and let us destroy her palaces.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, denddite! Denddidi ane qamma oloos; olidi a qatuwaa laaloos yaagidi maqettoosona" yaagees.

English Sentences: For thus hath the LORD of hosts said, Hew ye down trees, and cast a mount against Jerusalem: this is the city to be visited; she is wholly oppression in the midst of her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Mittata qanxxite. Yerusalaame gimbbiyaa lanqqen biittaa dooridi diddiqite. He kataman naaqoi kumido gishshau, i qaxxayettanau bessees.

English Sentences: As a fountain casteth out her waters, so she casteth out her wickedness: violence and spoil is heard in her; before me continually is grief and wounds.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ollai ba haattaa pulttiyoogaadan, ikka ba iitatettaa pulttees. Makkalabainne bashshabai a giddon siyettees. Muletoo a sahoinne masunttai ta sinttan beettees.

English Sentences: Be thou instructed, O Jerusalem, lest my soul depart from thee; lest I make thee desolate, a land not inhabited.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenoo Yerusalaamee, taani nena seeriyoogaa ekka. Ekkennan ixxikko, taani neeppe shaahettananne ne biittaa issi asinne de7enna baadine biitta kessana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, They shall throughly glean the remnant of Israel as a vine: turn back thine hand as a grapegatherer into the baskets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Woiniyaa teeraa poshiliyoogaadan, Israa7eela asaa atettata loittidi poshilite. Woiniyaa teeraa qoriya asadan, intte kushiyaa daashshatu giddo naa77anttuwaakka yeddite" yaagees.

English Sentences: To whom shall I speak, and give warning, that they may hear? behold, their ear is uncircumcised, and they cannot hearken: behold, the word of the LORD is unto them a reproach; they have no delight in it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani oossi odooshsha? Oona seerooshsha? Ooni siyanddeeshsha? Be7ite, eti siyenna mala, eta haittai baretti uttiis. Be7ite, GODAA qaalai etayyo qilliicciyoobaa gidiis; eti an ufaittokkona.

English Sentences: Therefore I am full of the fury of the LORD; I am weary with holding in: I will pour it out upon the children abroad, and upon the assembly of young men together: for even the husband with the wife shall be taken, the aged with him that is full of days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAA hanqqoi tanan kumi uttiis. Taani ha hanqquwaa teqqanau danddayikke. Yaatin, GODAI tana hagaadan yaagees; "Ta hanqquwaa ogiyan de7iya naatu bollinne shiiqida yelaga asaa bolli tiga. Maccaasiyookka azinaakka, ceeggi wurida asaakka i ekki baana.

English Sentences: And their houses shall be turned unto others, with their fields and wives together: for I will stretch out my hand upon the inhabitants of the land, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani he biittan de7iyaageetu bolli ta kushiyaa yeddiyo wode, eta keettati, eta goshshaarakka eta maccaasaarakka ubbai haratuyyo imettana" yaagees.

English Sentences: For from the least of them even unto the greatest of them every one is given to covetousness; and from the prophet even unto the priest every one dealeth falsely.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Guuttaikka gitaikka ubbai woriyaa maanau yiiqetees. Hananabaa yootiyaageetikka qeesetikka ubbai asa cimmoosona.

English Sentences: They have healed also the hurt of the daughter of my people slightly, saying, Peace, peace; when there is no peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta asaa masunttaa sakkennabaa giidi, guutta xaliyaa wottoosona. Saroi bainnan, Saro; saro! yaagoosona.

English Sentences: Were they ashamed when they had committed abomination? nay, they were not at all ashamed, neither could they blush: therefore they shall fall among them that fall: at the time that I visit them they shall be cast down, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha sheneyiya oosuwaa oottidi, eti yeellatidonaa? CHii, eti mulekka yeellatibookkona. Eti yeelli aibakkokka erokkona. Hegaa gishshau, etikka kunddidaageetu giddon kunddana. Taani eta qaxxayiyo wode, eta kaushshana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD, Stand ye in the ways, and see, and ask for the old paths, where is the good way, and walk therein, and ye shall find rest for your souls. But they said, We will not walk therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Ogiyan eqqidi xeellite; beni loossoti de7iyoosaa oichchite. Lo77o ogee awan de7ii? yaagidi oichchitenne an hemettite. Yaatidi intteyyo shemppi ekkite. Yaagin intte, Nuuni he ogiyan hemettokko! yaagideta.

English Sentences: Also I set watchmen over you, saying, Hearken to the sound of the trumpet. But they said, We will not hearken.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani naagiyaageeta intte bolli sunttada, Malkkatai punettiyo wode siyite! yaagada odaas. SHin intte, Nuuni siyokko yaagideta.

English Sentences: Therefore hear, ye nations, and know, O congregation, what is among them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, kawotettatoo, siyite! Maabaratoo, taani ta asaa oottiyoobaa erite!

English Sentences: Hear, O earth: behold, I will bring evil upon this people, even the fruit of their thoughts, because they have not hearkened unto my words, nor to my law, but rejected it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7an de7iya asatoo, hagaa siyite! Taani eta iita qofaa gishshau, iitabaa ha asaa bolli ehais. Aissi giikko, eti ta qaalaa siyennan ixxidosona; ta higgiyaakka oli bayidosona.

English Sentences: To what purpose cometh there to me incense from Sheba, and the sweet cane from a far country? your burnt offerings are not acceptable, nor your sacrifices sweet unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saaba giyo biittaappe yiida ixaani woikko haaho biittaappe yiida sawiya qimamee tau aissee? Intte xuuggiyo yarshshoikka ekettenna. Intte yarshshoi tana ufaissenna" yaagees.

English Sentences: Therefore thus saith the LORD, Behold, I will lay stumblingblocks before this people, and the fathers and the sons together shall fall upon them; the neighbour and his friend shall perish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Be7ite, taani ha asaa sinttan xubeta wottana. Wottin aawatinne naati issippe etan xubettana. SHoorotinne laggeti xayana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD, Behold, a people cometh from the north country, and a great nation shall be raised from the sides of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Be7ite, huuphessa bagga biittaappe olanchchati woraajjoosona; issi gita kawotettai sa7aa gaxaappe denddiis.

English Sentences: They shall lay hold on bow and spear; they are cruel, and have no mercy; their voice roareth like the sea; and they ride upon horses, set in array as men for war against thee, O daughter of Zion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti wonddafiyaanne tooraa oiqqidosona. Eti qareti bainnaageetanne yeddi maarennaageeta. Eti bantta paran piriixiyo wode, abbai guummiyoogaadan guummoosona. Inttenoo, Xiyoone katamaa asatoo, eti inttena olanau issi asadan salppidosona" yaagees.

English Sentences: We have heard the fame thereof: our hands wax feeble: anguish hath taken hold of us, and pain, as of a woman in travail.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni he oduwaa siyin, nu kushee hilssi giis. Maccaasiyo maaretai oiqqiyoogaadan, nuna metoi un77iis.

English Sentences: Go not forth into the field, nor walk by the way; for the sword of the enemy and fear is on every side.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHooqaa kiyoppite; ogiyaarakka hemettoppite. Aissi giikko, morkkee bisuwaa oiqqiis; yaara haarakka daganttiyaabai de7ees.

English Sentences: O daughter of my people, gird thee with sackcloth, and wallow thyself in ashes: make thee mourning, as for an only son, most bitter lamentation: for the spoiler shall suddenly come upon us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hai ta asau, waaruwaa maayidi, bidinttan gonddorettite; ba mexi issi na7aassi yeekkiyaabaadan misho yeehuwaa yeekkite. Aissi giikko, xaissiyaagee akeekennan de7ishin, nu bolli yaana.

English Sentences: I have set thee for a tower and a fortress among my people, that thou mayest know and try their way.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Ermmaasa hagaadan yaagees; "Ermmaasaa, neeni eta ogiyaa xomoosana malanne paaccana mala, taani nena birataa paacciya asa kessaas; ta asaakka paacettiya birataa kessaas.

English Sentences: They are all grievous revolters, walking with slanders: they are brass and iron; they are all corrupters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ubbai zigiri yuuyiya, odin ekkenna makkalanchcha. Eti nahaasenne birata; eti ubbaikka mooruwaa oottoosona.

English Sentences: The bellows are burned, the lead is consumed of the fire; the founder melteth in vain: for the wicked are not plucked away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Birataa bollan de7iya kinssaa xuuggidi geeshshana mala, womppiinai wolqqappe womppiinettiis. SHin geeshshanau waayido waayee ubbaikka mela; ta asaa giddon de7iya iitati kichchibookkona.

English Sentences: Reprobate silver shall men call them, because the LORD hath rejected them.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI eta oli aggido gishshau, eti Olettida Biraa geetettoosona" yaagees.

English Sentences: The word that came to Jeremiah from the LORD, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAPPE Ermmaasassi yiida qaalai hagaa;

English Sentences: Stand in the gate of the LORD's house, and proclaim there this word, and say, Hear the word of the LORD, all ye of Judah, that enter in at these gates to worship the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa penggen eqqa. Eqqada, ha qaalaa hagaadan yaagada awaajja; Inttenoo, GODAAYYO goinnanau ha penggetuura geliya Yihudaa asatoo, ubbaikka GODAA qaalaa siyite!

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel, Amend your ways and your doings, and I will cause you to dwell in this place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; "Intte ogiyaanne intte oosuwaa laammite; laammikko, taani inttena ha sohuwan wottana.

English Sentences: Trust ye not in lying words, saying, The temple of the LORD, The temple of the LORD, The temple of the LORD, are these.
Wolaitta Sentences: Cimo qaalan, Hagee GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa! Hagee GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa! Hagee GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa! yaagidi ammanettoppite.

English Sentences: For if ye throughly amend your ways and your doings; if ye throughly execute judgment between a man and his neighbour;
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte intte ogiyaanne oosuwaa tumuppe laammikko, issoi issuwaassi tumaa pirddikko,

English Sentences: If ye oppress not the stranger, the fatherless, and the widow, and shed not innocent blood in this place, neither walk after other gods to your hurt:
Wolaitta Sentences: betetanne aawai bainna naata, azinai haiqqido am77e maccaasaa naaqqennan aggikko, ha sohuwan xillo asatu suuttaa gussennan aggikkonne, intte qohettennaadan, hara xoossatuyyo goinnennan aggikko,

English Sentences: Then will I cause you to dwell in this place, in the land that I gave to your fathers, for ever and ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: yaanikko, taani intte maizza aawatuyyo meri merinau immido biittan inttena wottana.

English Sentences: Behold, ye trust in lying words, that cannot profit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7ite! Intte ainne pattenna cimo qaalan ammanetteeta" yaagees yaaga" yaagees.

English Sentences: Will ye steal, murder, and commit adultery, and swear falsely, and burn incense unto Baal, and walk after other gods whom ye know not;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Intte wuuqqeeta, woreeta, shaaramuxeeta, caaqqidi wordduwaa markkatteeta, Ba7aala giyo eeqaayyo yarshshuwaa yarshsheeta, hagaappe kase intte erenna hara xoossatuyyo goinneeta.

English Sentences: And come and stand before me in this house, which is called by my name, and say, We are delivered to do all these abominations?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi ta sunttan xeegettida Beeta Maqidasiyaa yiidi, ta sinttan eqqidi, Nuuni saro attida! yaageeta. SHin ha sheneyiya oosuwaa ubbaa oottanau saro attidetii?

English Sentences: Is this house, which is called by my name, become a den of robbers in your eyes? Behold, even I have seen it, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta sunttan xeegettida ha Beeta Maqidasee intteyyo panggati qosettiyo gonggolo giidetiiyye? Intte oottiyoobaa ubbaa taani ta huuphen be7aas" yaagees.

English Sentences: But go ye now unto my place which was in Shiloh, where I set my name at the first, and see what I did to it for the wickedness of my people Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani ta sunttaassi de7iyoosaa oottada koiro doorido, Seelon de7iya ta sohuwaa ane biite. Ta asaa Israa7eela iitatettaa gishshau, taani he sohuwaa waatidaakko be7ite.

English Sentences: And now, because ye have done all these works, saith the LORD, and I spake unto you, rising up early and speaking, but ye heard not; and I called you, but ye answered not;
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte ha ubbabaa oottideta. Taani intteyyo zaara zaarada odaas; shin siyennan ixxideta. Taani inttena xeesaas; shin taayyo koyibeekketa.

English Sentences: Therefore will I do unto this house, which is called by my name, wherein ye trust, and unto the place which I gave to you and to your fathers, as I have done to Shiloh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani Seelo bolli oottidoogaa, hagan intte ammanettiyo, ta sunttan xeegettida ha Beeta Maqidasiyaa bollikka oottana. Intteyyoonne kase intte aawatuyyo immido sohuwan hagan, taani Seelo bolli oottidoogaa malaa zaarettada oottana.

English Sentences: And I will cast you out of my sight, as I have cast out all your brethren, even the whole seed of Ephraim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte dabbota, Efireema zerettata taani diggidoogaadan, ta sinttappe inttenakka diggana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Therefore pray not thou for this people, neither lift up cry nor prayer for them, neither make intercession to me: for I will not hear thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Ermmaasaa, hegaa gishshau, ha asatuyyo woossoppa; eta gishshataa oichchoppa woikko waassoppa; neeni etabaa gaannatoppa. Aissi giikko, taani neeyyo siyikke.

English Sentences: Seest thou not what they do in the cities of Judah and in the streets of Jerusalem?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yihudaa katamatuuninne Yerusalaame ogetun oottiyoobi aibakko be7ikkiiyye?

English Sentences: The children gather wood, and the fathers kindle the fire, and the women knead their dough, to make cakes to the queen of heaven, and to pour out drink offerings unto other gods, that they may provoke me to anger.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naati mittaa mixoosona; aawati tamaa eettoosona; maccaasati, Saluwaa kawiyo giyo xoosseessi oittaa uukkanau xiilliyaa munaqqoosona. Eti tana qohana giidi, ushshaa yarshshuwaa hara xoossatuyyo gussoosona.

English Sentences: Do they provoke me to anger? saith the LORD: do they not provoke themselves to the confusion of their own faces?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagan tumu qohettiyai tanee? Hagan qohettidi yeellatiyai bantta huuphiyau eta gidokkonaa?" yaagees.

English Sentences: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, mine anger and my fury shall be poured out upon this place, upon man, and upon beast, and upon the trees of the field, and upon the fruit of the ground; and it shall burn, and shall not be quenched.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Ubbaa Haariya GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Be7ite, ta yiilloinne ta hanqqoi ha sohuwaa bolli, asaa bollinne mehiyaa bolli, gaden de7iya mittaa bollinne biittan de7iya kattaa bolli gukkana. Gukkidi eexxana; to77anaukka danddayenna" yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; Put your burnt offerings unto your sacrifices, and eat flesh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; "Intte xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa hara yarshshotuura gujjidi, he ashuwaa intteyyo miite.

English Sentences: For I spake not unto your fathers, nor commanded them in the day that I brought them out of the land of Egypt, concerning burnt offerings or sacrifices:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta Gibxxe biittaappe kessiyo gallassi, xuuggiyo yarshshobaa gidin, hara yarshshotubaa gidin, intte maizza aawatussi odabeikke woikko azazabeikke.

English Sentences: But this thing commanded I them, saying, Obey my voice, and I will be your God, and ye shall be my people: and walk ye in all the ways that I have commanded you, that it may be well unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani etayyo ha azazuwaa immaas; Taayyo azazettite. Yaatikko, taani intte Xoossaa gidana; inttekka ta asaa gidana. Intteyyo lo77ana mala, taani inttena azaziyo oge ubban hemettite yaagaas.

English Sentences: But they hearkened not, nor inclined their ear, but walked in the counsels and in the imagination of their evil heart, and went backward, and not forward.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti taayyo siyennan woikko ezggennan ixxidosona. Eti bantta iita wozanaa muumetettaadan hemettidosona; eti sinttau biyoogaa aggidi, guyye biidosona.

English Sentences: Since the day that your fathers came forth out of the land of Egypt unto this day I have even sent unto you all my servants the prophets, daily rising up early and sending them:
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte maizza aawati Gibxxe biittaappe kiyido gallassaappe doommidi, hachchi gakkanaassi, taani ta ashkkarata, hananabaa yootiyaageeta wonttin wonttin intteyyo kiittaidda takkaas.

English Sentences: Yet they hearkened not unto me, nor inclined their ear, but hardened their neck: they did worse than their fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte taayyo siyennan woikko ezggennan ixxideta. Intte morggiyaa zozzidetanne intte maizza aawatuppekka aadhdhidi, iitabaa oottideta.

English Sentences: Therefore thou shalt speak all these words unto them; but they will not hearken to thee: thou shalt also call unto them; but they will not answer thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hagaa ubbaa neeni etayyo yootana; shin eti ne giyoobaa siyokkona. Neeni eta xeesana; shin eti neeyyo koyokkona.

English Sentences: But thou shalt say unto them, This is a nation that obeyeth not the voice of the LORD their God, nor receiveth correction: truth is perished, and is cut off from their mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Ermmaasaa, neeni etayyo hagaadan yaaga; GODAU ba Xoossau azazettenna woikko seerin simmenna kawotettai hagaa. Tumai xayiis; tumai eta inxxarssaappe bayiis.

English Sentences: Cut off thine hair, O Jerusalem, and cast it away, and take up a lamentation on high places; for the LORD hath rejected and forsaken the generation of his wrath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte huuphiyaa meedissidi olite. Aibinne bainna xoqqa deretu bolli kiyidi zilaalite. Aissi giikko, GODAI bana yiilloyida yeletaa ixxiisinne aggi bayiis yaaga" yaagees.

English Sentences: For the children of Judah have done evil in my sight, saith the LORD: they have set their abominations in the house which is called by my name, to pollute it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Yihudaa asati ta sinttan iitabaa oottidosona. Eti ta sunttan xeegettida Beeta Maqidasiyaa tunissanau, tana sheneyiya eeqata ehiidi, a giddon wottidosona.

English Sentences: And they have built the high places of Tophet, which is in the valley of the son of Hinnom, to burn their sons and their daughters in the fire; which I commanded them not, neither came it into my heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta attuma naatanne macca naata taman xuuggidi yarshshanau, Hinnooma Zanggaaraa xoqqan Toofeeta giyo yarshsho sohuwaa gimbbidosona. SHin hegee taani eta azazabeennabaanne ta qofan bainnabaa.

English Sentences: Therefore, behold, the days come, saith the LORD, that it shall no more be called Tophet, nor the valley of the son of Hinnom, but the valley of slaughter: for they shall bury in Tophet, till there be no place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, he sohoi Hinnooma Zanggaaraa woikko Toofeeta geetettiyoogee attidi, SHuha Zanggaaraa yaagettidi xeesettana gallassati yoosona. Aissi giikko, moogiyo sohoi bainna gishshau, Toofeeti eti bantta ahaa moogiyo soho gidana.

English Sentences: And the carcases of this people shall be meat for the fowls of the heaven, and for the beasts of the earth; and none shall fray them away.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode he asatu ahai saluwaa kafotuyyoonne sa7aa do7atuyyo quma gidana; eta yashissidi yedettiyaabi de7enna.

English Sentences: Then will I cause to cease from the cities of Judah, and from the streets of Jerusalem, the voice of mirth, and the voice of gladness, the voice of the bridegroom, and the voice of the bride: for the land shall be desolate.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ililssaanne ufaissaa cenggurssai, bullachchiyaagaanne bullashettiyaari cenggurssai Yihudaa katamatuuninne Yerusalaame ogetun siyettennaadan teqqana. Aissi giikko, biittai baisa attana" yaagees.

English Sentences: At that time, saith the LORD, they shall bring out the bones of the kings of Judah, and the bones of his princes, and the bones of the priests, and the bones of the prophets, and the bones of the inhabitants of Jerusalem, out of their graves:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "He wodiyan Yihudaa kawotu meqettai, halaqatu meqettai, qeesetu meqettai, hananabaa yootiyaageetu meqettainne Yerusalaamen de7iya asatu meqettai ubbai duufuwaappe maxettidi kiyana.

English Sentences: And they shall spread them before the sun, and the moon, and all the host of heaven, whom they have loved, and whom they have served, and after whom they have walked, and whom they have sought, and whom they have worshipped: they shall not be gathered, nor be buried; they shall be for dung upon the face of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiyidi eti siiqido, kiitettido, kaallido, zoriyaa oichchidonne goinnido awau, aginaunne saluwaa xoolintte ubbau micettana. Eta meqettai shiiqenna woikko moogettenna; shin biittaa bollan pito mala gidana.

English Sentences: And death shall be chosen rather than life by all the residue of them that remain of this evil family, which remain in all the places whither I have driven them, saith the LORD of hosts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani laalidosan de7iya, ha iita kawotettaappe attida asati ubbai de7uwaappe haiquwaa doorana. Taani Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: Moreover thou shalt say unto them, Thus saith the LORD; Shall they fall, and not arise? shall he turn away, and not return?
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI tana hagaadan yaagiis; "Asatuyyo yaaga; GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Issi asi kunddikko, simmidi denddenneeyye? Woikko issi asi wora biikko, guyye simmenneeyye?

English Sentences: Why then is this people of Jerusalem slidden back by a perpetual backsliding? they hold fast deceit, they refuse to return.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, ha asai aissi wora biidee? Yerusalaamee aissi ubbatoo wora bii? Eti cimuwaa baqqi oiqqidosona; haa simmennan ixxidosona.

English Sentences: I hearkened and heard, but they spake not aright: no man repented him of his wickedness, saying, What have I done? every one turned to his course, as the horse rusheth into the battle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani minttada ezggaas; shin eti tumaa haasayokkona. Ta ai oottidanaashsho? giidi ba iita oosuwaa paaxiyaabi issoinne baawa. Ubbaikka olayyo piriixiya paraadan bau bau woxxees.

English Sentences: Yea, the stork in the heaven knoweth her appointed times; and the turtle and the crane and the swallow observe the time of their coming; but my people know not the judgment of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Harai atto, shimalaa giyo kafoti bantta wodiyaa eroosona; haraphpheti, dagicetinne waaliyaa giyo kafoti bantta simmiyo wodiyaa naagoosona; shin ta asai GODAA wogaa erenna.

English Sentences: How do ye say, We are wise, and the law of the LORD is with us? Lo, certainly in vain made he it; the pen of the scribes is in vain.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Yaatin, waanidi, Nuuni aadhdhida eranchcha; aissi giikko, GODAA higgee nunaara de7ees gaanau danddayettii? Worddanchcha xaafeti bantta biiriyan ta higgiyaa worddo kessidoogaa be7ekketiiyye?

English Sentences: The wise men are ashamed, they are dismayed and taken: lo, they have rejected the word of the LORD; and what wisdom is in them?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aadhdhida eranchchati yeellatana; eti kauyyananne oiqettana. Eti GODAA qaalaa olirggin, etayyo aiba eratetti de7ii?

English Sentences: Therefore will I give their wives unto others, and their fields to them that shall inherit them: for every one from the least even unto the greatest is given to covetousness, from the prophet even unto the priest every one dealeth falsely.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani eta machcheta haratuyyo, eta gadiyaakka eta xoonidaageetuyyo immana. Aissi giikko, guuttaikka gitaikka ubbai woriyaa maanau yiiqetoosona. Hananabaa yootiyaageetikka qeesetikka ubbai asaa cimmoosona.

English Sentences: For they have healed the hurt of the daughter of my people slightly, saying, Peace, peace; when there is no peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ta asaa masunttaa sakkennabaa giidi, guutta xaliyaa wottoosona. Saroi bainnan, Saro, saro! yaagoosona.

English Sentences: Were they ashamed when they had committed abomination? nay, they were not at all ashamed, neither could they blush: therefore shall they fall among them that fall: in the time of their visitation they shall be cast down, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha sheneyiya oosuwaa oottidi, eti yeellatidonaa? CHii, eti mulekka yeellatibookkona. Eti yeelli aibakkokka erokkona. Hegaa gishshau, etikka kunddidaageetu giddon kunddana; eti qaxxayettiyo wode kauyyana. Taani GODAI hagaa odaas" yaagees yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: I will surely consume them, saith the LORD: there shall be no grapes on the vine, nor figs on the fig tree, and the leaf shall fade; and the things that I have given them shall pass away from them.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani eta tumuppe dafa ekkana. Eta woiniyaa turan aifee xayana; balasiyaa giyo mittankka aifee xayana. Ayyo bonccoikka shullana; taani etayyo immidobai etappe ekettiichchana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Why do we sit still? assemble yourselves, and let us enter into the defenced cities, and let us be silent there: for the LORD our God hath put us to silence, and given us water of gall to drink, because we have sinned against the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin asati hagaadan yaagoosona; "Nuuni co77u giidi aissi uttiyoonii? Ane issippe shiiqite; hini gimbbettida katamata gelidi, yan haiqqoos. GODAI nu Xoossai nuna haiquwau pirddirggiis; nuuni a bolli nagaraa oottido gishshau, nuuyyo uyanau woriya haattaa immirggiis.

English Sentences: We looked for peace, but no good came; and for a time of health, and behold trouble!
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7i saro gidana giidi ufaissan naagida; shin lo77obi yibeenna. Nuuni paxana giidi naagida; shin dagama gidiis.

English Sentences: The snorting of his horses was heard from Dan: the whole land trembled at the sound of the neighing of his strong ones; for they are come, and have devoured the land, and all that is in it; the city, and those that dwell therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu morkketu paraa daarettai Daana giyo kataman siyettees; eta korima paratu caagettan biittai ubbai qaaxxees. Biittaanne biittan de7iyaabaa ubbaa, katamaanne kataman de7iya asaa ubbaa mi xaissanau yiidosona" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: For, behold, I will send serpents, cockatrices, among you, which will not be charmed, and they shall bite you, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Be7ite, taani shooshshata intte giddo yeddana. Murunniyaageetu daadumatai teqqanau danddayenna hasota intte giddo yeddana; yeddin eti inttena dukkana" yaagees.

English Sentences: When I would comfort myself against sorrow, my heart is faint in me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paxanau danddayenna keenaa taani azzanaas; ta wozanaikka ta giddon seerees.

English Sentences: Behold the voice of the cry of the daughter of my people because of them that dwell in a far country: Is not the LORD in Zion? is not her king in her? Why have they provoked me to anger with their graven images, and with strange vanities?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta asai haaho biittan waassiyo waasuwaa siyite. Eti, "GODAI Xiyoonen baawee? Ha Xiyoone Kawoi naa77antto yan de7ennee?" yaagidi waassoosona. Waassin GODAI eta Kawoi, "Eti bantta massido misiletun, bantta pattenna allaga eeqatun woni tana aissi yiilloyidonaa?" yaagees.
