Aissi giikko, eti intteyyo yootiyoogee worddo.

English Sentences: Hearken not unto them; serve the king of Babylon, and live: wherefore should this city be laid waste?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti giyoobaa siyoppite; Baabiloone kawuwaassi haarettitenne paxa de7ite! Ha katamainne aissi qolettiichchida soho gidanee?

English Sentences: But if they be prophets, and if the word of the LORD be with them, let them now make intercession to the LORD of hosts, that the vessels which are left in the house of the LORD, and in the house of the king of Judah, and at Jerusalem, go not to Babylon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hananabaa yootiyaageeta gidikkonne GODAA qaalai etan de7ikko, GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyan, Yihudaa kawuwaa keettaaninne Yerusalaamen attida keena miishshai Baabiloone beennaadan tana, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAA woossona yaagees.

English Sentences: For thus saith the LORD of hosts concerning the pillars, and concerning the sea, and concerning the bases, and concerning the residue of the vessels that remain in this city,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Baabiloone Kawoi Naabukadanaxoori Yo7aqeema na7aa, Yihudaa Kawuwaa Yo7aakiinanne Yihudaaninne Yerusalaamen de7iya gita asaa ubbaa omooddidi efiido wode, ha kataman attida tuussatubaa,

English Sentences: Which Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon took not, when he carried away captive Jeconiah the son of Jehoiakim king of Judah from Jerusalem to Babylon, and all the nobles of Judah and Jerusalem;
Wolaitta Sentences: Abba-Sainiyaabaa, gaaretubaanne hara miishshatu ubbatubaa Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI hagaadan yaagees.

English Sentences: Yea, thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel, concerning the vessels that remain in the house of the LORD, and in the house of the king of Judah and of Jerusalem;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ee, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyan, Yihudaa kawuwaa keettaaninne Yerusalaamen attida miishshatubaa hagaadan yaagees;

English Sentences: They shall be carried to Babylon, and there shall they be until the day that I visit them, saith the LORD; then will I bring them up, and restore them to this place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Baabiloone biittau miyettana; taani eta gishshau yaana gallassai gakkanaassi, eti yan de7ana. He wode taani eta guyye zaarada eta sohuwan wottana. Taani GODAI hagaa odaas yaagees" yaagaas.

English Sentences: And it came to pass the same year, in the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah king of Judah, in the fourth year, and in the fifth month, that Hananiah the son of Azur the prophet, which was of Gibeon, spake unto me in the house of the LORD, in the presence of the priests and of all the people, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: He laitti, Yihudaa Kawoi Sedeqiyaasi kawotaa doommido heeran, oiddantto laittan, ichchashantto aginan Gabaa7oonappe yiida Azuura na7ai hananabaa yootiya Hanaanee, GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyan qeesetunne asatu ubbaa sinttan taayyo hagaadan yaagidi haasayiis;

English Sentences: Thus speaketh the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel, saying, I have broken the yoke of the king of Babylon.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; Taani Baabiloone kawuwaa qambbaraa menttana.

English Sentences: Within two full years will I bring again into this place all the vessels of the LORD's house, that Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon took away from this place, and carried them to Babylon:
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloone Kawoi Naabukadanaxoori hagaappe denttidi, Baabiloone efiido, GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa miishsha ubbaa taani naa77u laittaa giddon zaarada, ha sohuwaa ehaana.

English Sentences: And I will bring again to this place Jeconiah the son of Jehoiakim king of Judah, with all the captives of Judah, that went into Babylon, saith the LORD: for I will break the yoke of the king of Babylon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi taani Yo7aqeema na7aa Yihudaa Kawuwaa Yo7aakiinakka, Yihudaappe omoodettidi, Baabiloone biida asaa ubbaa zaarada ha sohuwaa ehaana. Aissi giikko, taani Baabiloone kawuwaa qambbaraa menttana. Taani GODAI hagaa odaas yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then the prophet Jeremiah said unto the prophet Hananiah in the presence of the priests, and in the presence of all the people that stood in the house of the LORD,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddon eqqida qeesetunne asatu ubbatu sinttan hananabaa yootiya Ermmaasi hananabaa yootiya Hanaaniyaassi

English Sentences: Even the prophet Jeremiah said, Amen: the LORD do so: the LORD perform thy words which thou hast prophesied, to bring again the vessels of the LORD's house, and all that is carried away captive, from Babylon into this place.
Wolaitta Sentences: hagaadan yaagiis; "Amin77i! GODAI yaato! GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa miishshatanne omoodettidi biida asaa ubbaa Baabilooneppe zaaridi, ha sohuwaa ehiidi, neeni odido qaalaa GODAI polo!

English Sentences: Nevertheless hear thou now this word that I speak in thine ears, and in the ears of all the people;
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, ane taani neessikka ha asaa ubbaassikka yootiyoogaa siya.

English Sentences: The prophets that have been before me and before thee of old prophesied both against many countries, and against great kingdoms, of war, and of evil, and of pestilence.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beni neeppenne taappe kase de7ida hananabaa yootiyaageeti olai, iitabainne boshai daro biittatu bollinne gita kawotettatu bolli hananaagaa yootidosona.

English Sentences: The prophet which prophesieth of peace, when the word of the prophet shall come to pass, then shall the prophet be known, that the LORD hath truly sent him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin, Sarobai hanana giidi yootiya hananabaa yootiyaagaabaa gidikko, he yootiyaagaa qaalai polettiyo wode, he wode tumuppe GODAI a kiittidoogee erettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Hananiah the prophet took the yoke from off the prophet Jeremiah's neck, and brake it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, hananabaa yootiya Hanaanee hananabaa yootiya Ermmaasa morggiyaappe qambbaraa ekkidi menttiis.

English Sentences: And Hananiah spake in the presence of all the people, saying, Thus saith the LORD; Even so will I break the yoke of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon from the neck of all nations within the space of two full years. And the prophet Jeremiah went his way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Menttidi Hanaanee asaa ubbaa sinttan hagaadan yaagidi haasayiis; "GODAI hagaadan yaagees; Taani naa77u laittatu giddon Baabiloone Kawuwaa Naabukadanaxoora qambbaraa kawotettatu ubbaa morggiyaappe denttada hagaadan menttana yaagees" yaagiis. Yaatin, hananabaa yootiya Ermmaasi denddidi, ba biyoosaa biis.

English Sentences: Then the word of the LORD came unto Jeremiah the prophet, after that Hananiah the prophet had broken the yoke from off the neck of the prophet Jeremiah, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiya Hanaanee hananabaa yootiya Ermmaasa morggiyaappe qambbaraa menttidoogaappe guyyiyan, GODAA qaalai hananabaa yootiya Ermmaasassi yiis;

English Sentences: Go and tell Hananiah, saying, Thus saith the LORD; Thou hast broken the yokes of wood; but thou shalt make for them yokes of iron.
Wolaitta Sentences: yiidi, "Ba; baada Hanaaniyaassi yoota; GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Neeni mitta qambbaraa menttadasa; shin taani a gishshaa birata qambbaraa medhdhana" yaagees.

English Sentences: For thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; I have put a yoke of iron upon the neck of all these nations, that they may serve Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon; and they shall serve him: and I have given him the beasts of the field also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; "Eti Baabiloone Kawuwaa Naabukadanaxoorayyo haarettana mala, taani ha kawotettatu ubbaa morggiyan birata qambbaraa wottana; etikka ayyo haarettana. Taani harai attin, bazzo do7atakka ayyo immaas" yaagees yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said the prophet Jeremiah unto Hananiah the prophet, Hear now, Hananiah; The LORD hath not sent thee; but thou makest this people to trust in a lie.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, hananabaa yootiya Ermmaasi hananabaa yootiya Hanaaniyaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Hanaaniyaa, siya! GODAI nena kiittibeenna; shin neeni ha asai worddoban ammanettana mala oottadasa.

English Sentences: Therefore thus saith the LORD; Behold, I will cast thee from off the face of the earth: this year thou shalt die, because thou hast taught rebellion against the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAI hagaadan yaagees; Taani nena ha sa7aa bollaappe diggana. Neeni ha asai ta bollan makkalanaadan zorido gishshau, neeni ha laitti haiqqana yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Hananiah the prophet died the same year in the seventh month.
Wolaitta Sentences: He laittikka laappuntta aginan hananabaa yootiya Hanaanee haiqqiis.

English Sentences: Now these are the words of the letter that Jeremiah the prophet sent from Jerusalem unto the residue of the elders which were carried away captives, and to the priests, and to the prophets, and to all the people whom Nebuchadnezzar had carried away captive from Jerusalem to Babylon;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiya Ermmaasi omoodettidaageetu giddon de7iya attida cimatussi, qeesetussi, hananabaa yootiyaageetussinne Naabukadanaxoori Yerusalaameppe omooddidi, Baabiloone efiido hara asatussi ubbaassi Yerusalaameppe yeddido dabddaabbee hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaagaa.

English Sentences: (After that Jeconiah the king, and the queen, and the eunuchs, the princes of Judah and Jerusalem, and the carpenters, and the smiths, were departed from Jerusalem;)
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee hanidoogee, Kawoi Yo7aakiini, kawiyaa a aayyiyaa, a oosanchchati, Yihudaanne Yerusalaame halaqati, kushe oosuwaa hiillatinne birataa qoxxiyaageeti Yerusalaameppe kiyi simmiina.

English Sentences: By the hand of Elasah the son of Shaphan, and Gemariah the son of Hilkiah, (whom Zedekiah king of Judah sent unto Babylon to Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon) saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ermmaasi Yihudaa Kawoi Sedeqiyaasi Baabiloone Kawuwaa Naabukadanaxoorayyo kiittiyo Saafaana na7aa El77aasanne Hilqqiyaa na7aa Gamaariyaa bollan he dabddaabbiyaa kiittiis. Dabddaabbee hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel, unto all that are carried away captives, whom I have caused to be carried away from Jerusalem unto Babylon;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai, taani Yerusalaameppe Baabiloone omoodissada yeddido asau ubbau hagaadan yaagais;

English Sentences: Build ye houses, and dwell in them; and plant gardens, and eat the fruit of them;
Wolaitta Sentences: Keettata keexxidi, etan de7ite. Kattaa zeridi, aifiyaa miite.

English Sentences: Take ye wives, and beget sons and daughters; and take wives for your sons, and give your daughters to husbands, that they may bear sons and daughters; that ye may be increased there, and not diminished.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maccaasaa ekkite; ekkidi maccaa attumaa yelite. Intte naatussikka maccaasaa giigissidi immite; intte macca naatakka azinau immite. Etikka maccaa attumaa yelona. Yan qoodaa corattite; guuxxoppite.

English Sentences: And seek the peace of the city whither I have caused you to be carried away captives, and pray unto the LORD for it: for in the peace thereof shall ye have peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi taani inttena omooduwau yeddido katamaassi saroi de7anaadan koyite. He katamaayyo GODAA woossite. Aissi giikko, ayyo saroi de7ikko, intteyyookka saroi de7ana yaagais.

English Sentences: For thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; Let not your prophets and your diviners, that be in the midst of you, deceive you, neither hearken to your dreams which ye cause to be dreamed.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ee, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; Intte giddon de7iya intte hananabaa yootiyaageetinne shareechchoti yootiyooban cimettoppite. Eti aimottiyo aimokka siyoppite.

English Sentences: For they prophesy falsely unto you in my name: I have not sent them, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti ta sunttan "Hananabaa" giidi worddobaa yootoosona; taani eta kiittabeikke yaagees.

English Sentences: For thus saith the LORD, That after seventy years be accomplished at Babylon I will visit you, and perform my good word toward you, in causing you to return to this place.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI hagaadan yaagees; Baabiloone laittai laappun tammai polettiyo wode, taani intte gishshau yaana; yaada, "Taani inttena intte biitti zaarada ehaana" giido lo77o qaalaa polana.

English Sentences: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani intteyyo halchchiyo halchchuwaa taani GODAI erais; hegeenne, intteyyo sintta wodiyaanne ufaissaa immana mala, saro halchchoppe attin, iita halchcho gidenna.

English Sentences: Then shall ye call upon me, and ye shall go and pray unto me, and I will hearken unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, intte tana xeegana; taakko yaananne tana woossana; taanikka intteyyo siyana.

English Sentences: And ye shall seek me, and find me, when ye shall search for me with all your heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte tana koyana; intte tana intte polo wozanaappe koyido wode demmana.

English Sentences: And I will be found of you, saith the LORD: and I will turn away your captivity, and I will gather you from all the nations, and from all the places whither I have driven you, saith the LORD; and I will bring you again into the place whence I caused you to be carried away captive.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo beettana. Taani inttena omooduwaappe zaarana. Taani inttena laalido kawotettatu ubbaappenne soho ubbaappe shiishshana. SHiishshada taani inttena omooduwau yeddanaappe kase intte de7ido sohuwaa guyye zaarada ehaana. Taani GODAI hagaa odaas yaagees.

English Sentences: Because ye have said, The LORD hath raised us up prophets in Babylon;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte, GODAI hananabaa yootiyaabaa nuuyyo Baabiloonen denttiis yaagideta.

English Sentences: Know that thus saith the LORD of the king that sitteth upon the throne of David, and of all the people that dwelleth in this city, and of your brethren that are not gone forth with you into captivity;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagido gishshau, Daawita kawotaa araatan uttiya kawuwaabaa, ha kataman de7iya asaa ubbaabaanne inttenaara omooduwan kiyibeenna intte dabbotubaa GODAI hagaadan yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; Behold, I will send upon them the sword, the famine, and the pestilence, and will make them like vile figs, that cannot be eaten, they are so evil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ee, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI hagaadan yaagees; Taani eta bolli bisuwaa, koshaanne boshaa ehaana. Qassi taani eta maanau giigenna wooqqida balasiyaa teeraa mala oottana.

English Sentences: And I will persecute them with the sword, with the famine, and with the pestilence, and will deliver them to be removed to all the kingdoms of the earth, to be a curse, and an astonishment, and an hissing, and a reproach, among all the nations whither I have driven them:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta bisuwan, koshaaninne boshan yedettana; yedettada taani eta sa7an de7iya kawotetta ubbaayyo bollai caaliyoobaa oottana. Qassi taani eta kessada yeddido biitta ubban qanggetta, dagama, borenne cashsha oottana.

English Sentences: Because they have not hearkened to my words, saith the LORD, which I sent unto them by my servants the prophets, rising up early and sending them; but ye would not hear, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, hananabaa yootiya ta ashkkaratu bolli taani etayyo zaara zaarada kiittido ta qaalaa eti siyennan ixxidosona. Inttekka omoodetti biidaageeti siyennan ixxideta.

English Sentences: Hear ye therefore the word of the LORD, all ye of the captivity, whom I have sent from Jerusalem to Babylon:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Yerusalaameppe Baabiloone omoodissada yeddido asatoo, intte ubbaikka ta qaalaa, GODAA qaalaa siyite yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel, of Ahab the son of Kolaiah, and of Zedekiah the son of Maaseiah, which prophesy a lie unto you in my name; Behold, I will deliver them into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon; and he shall slay them before your eyes;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hananabaa giidi intteyyo GODAA sunttan worddobaa yootiya Qolaaya na7aa Akaababaanne Ma7iseeya na7aa Xidiqiyaabaa Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; Taani eta Baabiloone Kawuwaa Naabukadanaxoorayyo aattada immana. Intte xeellishin, i eta worana.

English Sentences: And of them shall be taken up a curse by all the captivity of Judah which are in Babylon, saying, The LORD make thee like Zedekiah and like Ahab, whom the king of Babylon roasted in the fire;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yihudaappe omoodettidi, Baabiloone biida asai issi uraa qangganau koyikko, "GODAI nena Baabiloone kawoi taman xuuggido Xidiqiyaadaaninne Akaabadan ootto" yaagana.

English Sentences: Because they have committed villany in Israel, and have committed adultery with their neighbours' wives, and have spoken lying words in my name, which I have not commanded them; even I know, and am a witness, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti Israa7eelan pala nagaraa oottidosona. Eti bantta shoorotu maccaasaa laggettidosona; yaatidi taani eta azazabeenna worddobaa ta sunttan haasayoosona. Hegaa eriyaagee tana; hegau taani markka. Taani GODAI hagaa odaas yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Thus shalt thou also speak to Shemaiah the Nehelamite, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Nehelaamiyaa SHamaa7iyaayyo ha kiitaa kiittana mala, Ermmaasayyo odiis.

English Sentences: Thus speaketh the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel, saying, Because thou hast sent letters in thy name unto all the people that are at Jerusalem, and to Zephaniah the son of Maaseiah the priest, and to all the priests, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; Neeni ne sunttan dabddaabbiyaa Yerusalaamen de7iya asaayyo ubbaayyo, Ma7iseeya na7aa qeesiyaa Xafaaniyaayyoonne hara qeesetu ubbaayyo yeddadasa. Neeni Xafaaniyaa hagaadan yaagadasa;

English Sentences: The LORD hath made thee priest in the stead of Jehoiada the priest, that ye should be officers in the house of the LORD, for every man that is mad, and maketh himself a prophet, that thou shouldest put him in prison, and in the stocks.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyan halaqa gidana mala, nena GODAI Yoodaahe gishshaa qeese oottidi sunttiis. Hananabaa yootoos giya gooyiya asata, qaphiyaaninne toollan gelissanau bessees.

English Sentences: Now therefore why hast thou not reproved Jeremiah of Anathoth, which maketh himself a prophet to you?
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni Baabiloonen de7ishin, Ermmaasi xaafidi, nuuyyo hagaadan yaagidi kiittiis; Yan intte gam77ana. Keettata keexxidi, de7ite. Kattaa zeridi, aifiyaa miite yaagiis.

English Sentences: For therefore he sent unto us in Babylon, saying, This captivity is long: build ye houses, and dwell in them; and plant gardens, and eat the fruit of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, intte giddon hananabaa yootiya Anatootappe yiida Ermmaasa aissi hegaadan oottabeikkii?" yaagadasa yaagees" yaagidi kiittiis.

English Sentences: And Zephaniah the priest read this letter in the ears of Jeremiah the prophet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeesiyaa Xafaanee hananabaa yootiya Ermmaasayyo ha dabddaabbiyaa nabbabiis.

English Sentences: Then came the word of the LORD unto Jeremiah, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Nabbabin GODAA qaalai Ermmaasassi hagaadan giidi yiis;

English Sentences: Send to all them of the captivity, saying, Thus saith the LORD concerning Shemaiah the Nehelamite; Because that Shemaiah hath prophesied unto you, and I sent him not, and he caused you to trust in a lie:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Kiitaa omooduwan de7iya asaayyo ubbaayyo hagaadan yaagada kiitta; Nehelaamiyaa SHamaa7iyaabaa GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani kiittennan SHamaa7ee intteyyo, Hananabaa giidi yootido gishshaunne inttena wordduwaa ammanttido gishshau,

English Sentences: Therefore thus saith the LORD; Behold, I will punish Shemaiah the Nehelamite, and his seed: he shall not have a man to dwell among this people; neither shall he behold the good that I will do for my people, saith the LORD; because he hath taught rebellion against the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani GODAI Nehelaamiyaa SHamaa7iyaanne a so asaa qaxxayana. Ta bolli i makkalabaa haasayido gishshau, ha asaa giddon ayyo issi urinne paxa attenna. Qassi i ba huuphenkka taani ta asaassi oottana kehatettaa be7enna. Taani GODAI hagaa odaas" yaagees yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The word that came to Jeremiah from the LORD, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAPPE Ermmaasassi yiida qaalai hagaa.

English Sentences: Thus speaketh the LORD God of Israel, saying, Write thee all the words that I have spoken unto thee in a book.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; "Ermmaasaa, taani neeyyo odido qaalaa ubbaa xaatta maxaafan xaafa.

English Sentences: For, lo, the days come, saith the LORD, that I will bring again the captivity of my people Israel and Judah, saith the LORD: and I will cause them to return to the land that I gave to their fathers, and they shall possess it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta asaa Israa7eelanne Yihudaa omooduwaappe guyye zaarada ishalissiyo gallassati yaana; taani eta maizza aawatussi immido biittau eta zaarana; etikka laattana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: And these are the words that the LORD spake concerning Israel and concerning Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Israa7eela asaabaanne Yihudaa asaabaa yootido qaalai hagaa.

English Sentences: For thus saith the LORD; We have heard a voice of trembling, of fear, and not of peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani asai yashshau waassiyo waasuwaa siyaas; dagama waasoppe attin, hagee saro waaso gidenna.

English Sentences: Ask ye now, and see whether a man doth travail with child? wherefore do I see every man with his hands on his loins, as a woman in travail, and all faces are turned into paleness?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ane lal77itenne wochchite! Attumaasi bannakkidi, na7a yelanau danddayii? Yaatin, attumaasai ubbai maaretai oiqqido maccaasadan, ba kushiyan ba uluwaa oiqqidaashin taani be7iyoogee aibee? Asaa ubbaa som77oi aissi tossu giidee?

English Sentences: Alas! for that day is great, so that none is like it: it is even the time of Jacob's trouble, but he shall be saved out of it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aayye7ana! He gallassai hanttaara gallassa; hegaa mala gallassi mulekka baawa. He gallassai Yaaqooba zaretussi meto wode gidana. Gidikkonne eti hegaappe attana" yaagees.

English Sentences: For it shall come to pass in that day, saith the LORD of hosts, that I will break his yoke from off thy neck, and will burst thy bonds, and strangers shall no more serve themselves of him:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "He gallassi taani eta morggiyaappe qambbaraa menttana; eti qashettido sanssalataakka duuttana. Hagaappe sinttanau allaga biittaa asai eta ailleyenna.

English Sentences: But they shall serve the LORD their God, and David their king, whom I will raise up unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa aggidi eti GODAASSI, bantta Xoossaassi, oottana; taani etayyo denttiyo Kawuwaa Daawitassi eti haarettana.

English Sentences: Therefore fear thou not, O my servant Jacob, saith the LORD; neither be dismayed, O Israel: for, lo, I will save thee from afar, and thy seed from the land of their captivity; and Jacob shall return, and shall be in rest, and be quiet, and none shall make him afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, ta ashkkaratoo, Yaaqooba zaretoo, yayyoppite! Inttenoo, Israa7eelatoo, dagammoppite! Intte haahosan de7ishin, taani inttena ashshana; intte zaretakka eti omoodettido biittaappe yedissana. Yaaqooba zareti simmidi, aibakko bochchennan saro de7ana; eta ai asinne yashissenna. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: For I am with thee, saith the LORD, to save thee: though I make a full end of all nations whither I have scattered thee, yet will I not make a full end of thee: but I will correct thee in measure, and will not leave thee altogether unpunished.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttena ashshanau inttenaara de7ais. Taani GODAI hagaa odais. Taani inttena laalido kawotettata ubbaa muleera xaissana; shin inttena muleera xaissikke. Taani inttena likke pirddan qaxxayana; qixaatee bainnan inttena muleera coo yeddikke" yaagees.

English Sentences: For thus saith the LORD, Thy bruise is incurable, and thy wound is grievous.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Intte deshettai paxennaagaa; intte masunttaikka hanttaara.

English Sentences: There is none to plead thy cause, that thou mayest be bound up: thou hast no healing medicines.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte yohuwan inttena maaddiyaabi baawa; intte masunttaukka xalee baawa; intteyyo paxoi baawa.

English Sentences: All thy lovers have forgotten thee; they seek thee not; for I have wounded thee with the wound of an enemy, with the chastisement of a cruel one, for the multitude of thine iniquity; because thy sins were increased.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte siiqoti ubbati inttena dogidosona; eti inttebaa wudokkona. Taani inttena morkkedan shocaas; meqetti bainna asi qaxxayiyoogaadan qaxxayaas. Aissi giikko, intte mooroi dalggiis; intte nagaraikka dariis.

English Sentences: Why criest thou for thine affliction? thy sorrow is incurable for the multitude of thine iniquity: because thy sins were increased, I have done these things unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha paxenna intte deshettau aibissi waasseetii? Intte mooroi dalggido gishshaunne intte nagarai darido gishshau, hagaa intte bolli taani oottais.

English Sentences: Therefore all they that devour thee shall be devoured; and all thine adversaries, every one of them, shall go into captivity; and they that spoil thee shall be a spoil, and all that prey upon thee will I give for a prey.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin inttena biittaa kessi miida ubbati meetettana; intte morkketi ubbatikka omooduwau baana. Inttena bonqqidaageeti bonqqettana; inttebaa olan ekkidaageetubaakka olan ekkana.

English Sentences: For I will restore health unto thee, and I will heal thee of thy wounds, saith the LORD; because they called thee an Outcast, saying, This is Zion, whom no man seeketh after.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo kehissana; intte masunttaakka pattana. Aissi giikko, eti inttena, Hageeti olettidaageeta; Xiyoone asaabaa wudiyaabi baawa yaagoosona. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD; Behold, I will bring again the captivity of Jacob's tents, and have mercy on his dwellingplaces; and the city shall be builded upon her own heap, and the palace shall remain after the manner thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani Yaaqooba zaretu keettaa omoodettosaappe guyye zaarada, ishalissana; eti de7iyo sohuwaukka qarettana. Yerusalaame katamaikka kase ba qolettidosan, kawo keettaikka kase ba sohuwan simmidi keexettana.

English Sentences: And out of them shall proceed thanksgiving and the voice of them that make merry: and I will multiply them, and they shall not be few; I will also glorify them, and they shall not be small.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yan de7iya asai ubbai galataa mazamuriyaanne ufaissaa yettaa yexxana. Taani eta qoodaa darissana; eta qoodai naa77antto guuxxenna. Taani eta bonchchettida dere oottana; eti guuxxokkona.

English Sentences: Their children also shall be as aforetime, and their congregation shall be established before me, and I will punish all that oppress them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta zerettai beni wode de7uwaadan de7ana; eta maabaraikka ta sinttan minni eqqana. Eta un77ettiyaageeta ubbaakka taani qaxxayana.

English Sentences: And their nobles shall be of themselves, and their governor shall proceed from the midst of them; and I will cause him to draw near, and he shall approach unto me: for who is this that engaged his heart to approach unto me? saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta halaqai eta asaappe issuwaa gidana; eta haariyaagee eta giddoppe kiyana. Taani a ta mati ehaana; ehin i taakko shiiqana. Taani shiishshennan de7ishin, xalidi taakko shiiqanau danddayiyai oonee? Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: And ye shall be my people, and I will be your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, intte ta asa gidana; taanikka intte Xoossaa gidana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Behold, the whirlwind of the LORD goeth forth with fury, a continuing whirlwind: it shall fall with pain upon the head of the wicked.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7ite, GODAA hanqqoi gotiyaadan hanees; ikka sirimettiiddi, iitatu huuphiyan yaana.

English Sentences: The fierce anger of the LORD shall not return, until he have done it, and until he have performed the intents of his heart: in the latter days ye shall consider it.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ba wozanaa halchchuwaa wurssidi polana gakkanaashin, a eexxiya hanqqoi guyye simmenna. Hegaa guyyeppe yiya wodetun intte akeekana.

English Sentences: At the same time, saith the LORD, will I be the God of all the families of Israel, and they shall be my people.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "He wode taani Israa7eela yaratussi ubbaassi Xoossaa gidana; etikka ta asa gidana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD, The people which were left of the sword found grace in the wilderness; even Israel, when I went to cause him to rest.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Bisuwaappe palahida asai taappe aaro kehatettaa bazzuwan demmiis. Israa7eela asai shemppi ekkanau koyido wode,

English Sentences: The LORD hath appeared of old unto me, saying, Yea, I have loved thee with an everlasting love: therefore with lovingkindness have I drawn thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani GODAI etau haahosaappe hagaadan yaagaidda qonccaas; Israa7eela asau, taani inttena merinaa siiquwan siiqais; ta aggenna siiquwan taani inttena taakko shiishshaas.

English Sentences: Again I will build thee, and thou shalt be built, O virgin of Israel: thou shalt again be adorned with thy tabrets, and shalt go forth in the dances of them that make merry.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geeshsha Israa7eela asau, taani inttena zaarettada keexxana; inttekka keexettana. Zaarettidikka karaabiyaa oikkidi, ufaittiyaageetuura yexxananne durana.

English Sentences: Thou shalt yet plant vines upon the mountains of Samaria: the planters shall plant, and shall eat them as common things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte zaarettidikka Samaariyaa keratu bolli woiniyaa turata tokkana; tokkidaageeti a teeran ufaittana.

English Sentences: For there shall be a day, that the watchmen upon the mount Ephraim shall cry, Arise ye, and let us go up to Zion unto the LORD our God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema gezziyan naagiyaageeti, "Haayite; GODAAKKO, nu Xoossaakko, pude Xiyoone ane boos!" yaagidi xeesiyo wodee yaana yaagaas" yaagees.

English Sentences: For thus saith the LORD; Sing with gladness for Jacob, and shout among the chief of the nations: publish ye, praise ye, and say, O LORD, save thy people, the remnant of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Yaaqooba asaassi ufaissan yexxite; kawotettatu ubbaappe aadhdhiya Israa7eelassi hombbocite. GODAI Israa7eela asaappe attidaageeta ashshiis yaagidi galataa mazamuriyaa yexxite.

English Sentences: Behold, I will bring them from the north country, and gather them from the coasts of the earth, and with them the blind and the lame, the woman with child and her that travaileth with child together: a great company shall return thither.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7ite, taani eta huuphessa bagga biittaappe ehaana; sa7aa gaxaappekka taani eta shiishshana. Qooqeti, wobbeti, abbe ixeta maccaasatinne maaretai oiqqido maccaasati etaara issippe yaana; keehi daro asai ba biittaa simmana.

English Sentences: They shall come with weeping, and with supplications will I lead them: I will cause them to walk by the rivers of waters in a straight way, wherein they shall not stumble: for I am a father to Israel, and Ephraim is my firstborn.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta zaarada ehiyo wode, eti ufaissaa daruwan yeekkiiddinne woossiiddi yaana. Taani eta shaafaa lanqqiyaara, eta xubbenna sitta ogiyaara kaalettana. Aissi giikko, taani Israa7eela asaassi aawa; Efireemikka taassi baira na7a.

English Sentences: Hear the word of the LORD, O ye nations, and declare it in the isles afar off, and say, He that scattered Israel will gather him, and keep him, as a shepherd doth his flock.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo, kawotettatoo, GODAA qaalaa siyite! Siyidi haahosan, abbaa doonan de7iya biittatun hagaadan yaagidi awaajjite; Israa7eelata laalidaagee i eta shiishshana; qassi henttanchchai ba wudiyaa dorssaa heemmiyoogaadan, i eta heemmana yaagite.

English Sentences: For the LORD hath redeemed Jacob, and ransomed him from the hand of him that was stronger than he.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAI Yaaqooba zareta woziis; i eta etappe minniyaageetu kushiyaappe ashshiis.

English Sentences: Therefore they shall come and sing in the height of Zion, and shall flow together to the goodness of the LORD, for wheat, and for wine, and for oil, and for the young of the flock and of the herd: and their soul shall be as a watered garden; and they shall not sorrow any more at all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti yiidi Xiyoone Deriyan ufaissau yexxana; eti GODAI immiyo kehatettan, kattan, woine eessan, zaitiyan, dorssaa maratuuninne miizzaa maratun ufaittana. Eti haattaa loitti ushshido ataakiltte soho mala gidana; eti naa77antto shullokkona.

English Sentences: Then shall the virgin rejoice in the dance, both young men and old together: for I will turn their mourning into joy, and will comfort them, and make them rejoice from their sorrow.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode geela7oti ufaittidi durana; wodallatikka cimatikka ufaittana. Taani eta yeehuwaa ufaissau laammana; taani eta minttettana; eta azzanuwaa gishshaa taani eta ufaissana.

English Sentences: And I will satiate the soul of the priests with fatness, and my people shall be satisfied with my goodness, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani qeesetussi daro qumaa immana; ta asaikka ta kehatettan kaallana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD; A voice was heard in Ramah, lamentation, and bitter weeping; Rahel weeping for her children refused to be comforted for her children, because they were not.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Yeehoinne zilaassai Raama giyo kataman siyettiis; Raaheela ba naatuyyo yeekkausu; eti xayido gishshau, agga gin, aggennan ixxaasu" yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD; Refrain thy voice from weeping, and thine eyes from tears: for thy work shall be rewarded, saith the LORD; and they shall come again from the land of the enemy.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Yeekkiyoogaa aggidi, intte aifiyaa afuttaa quccite. Aissi giikko, intte oottido oosuwau woituwaa intte ekkana; morkkiyaa biittaappe intte naatikka simmana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: And there is hope in thine end, saith the LORD, that thy children shall come again to their own border.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte naati bantta biitti simmanau de7iyo gishshau, intteyyo sinttanau ufaissai de7ees. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: I have surely heard Ephraim bemoaning himself thus; Thou hast chastised me, and I was chastised, as a bullock unaccustomed to the yoke: turn thou me, and I shall be turned; for thou art the LORD my God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Efireema zareti azzanidi, hagaadan yaagidi odiyoogaa tumuppe taani siyaas; Neeni nuna xurqqayettibeenna mirgguwaadan wadhdhadasa; nuunikka keedida. Neeni GODAA nu Xoossaa gidiyo gishshau, ane nuna zaara; nuuni neekko simmana.

English Sentences: Surely after that I was turned, I repented; and after that I was instructed, I smote upon my thigh: I was ashamed, yea, even confounded, because I did bear the reproach of my youth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni kase neeppe wora simmidi biida; shin ha77i paaxida. Neeni nuna qaxxaya simmin yeellatidi, nu tiraa baqqida; nuuni nu yelagatettaa laittaa nagaraa gishshau, kauyyidanne yeellatida yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Is Ephraim my dear son? is he a pleasant child? for since I spake against him, I do earnestly remember him still: therefore my bowels are troubled for him; I will surely have mercy upon him, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tumu Israa7eeli taayyo al77o na7ee? I taani siiqiyo na7ee? Ee! Taani darotoo a bolli iitabaa haasayikkokka, a hassayiyoogaa aggabeikke. Hegaa gishshau, ta wozanai a laamotees; taani assi keehi qarettais. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: Set thee up waymarks, make thee high heaps: set thine heart toward the highway, even the way which thou wentest: turn again, O virgin of Israel, turn again to these thy cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ogiyan malaataa wottite; malaatiyo mittatakka essite. Yaatidi intte biido ogiyaa akeekite. Geeshsha Israa7eela asau, simmite; intte katamatukko simmite.

English Sentences: How long wilt thou go about, O thou backsliding daughter? for the LORD hath created a new thing in the earth, A woman shall compass a man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, ammanoi bainna Israa7eelatoo, aude gakkanaashin toilattuuteetii? GODAI sa7aa bollan issi oorattabaa medhdhana; hegeenne, maccaasi attumaasaassi eqettidi, saro ashshiyoogaa mala oorattabaa" yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; As yet they shall use this speech in the land of Judah and in the cities thereof, when I shall bring again their captivity; The LORD bless thee, O habitation of justice, and mountain of holiness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai, hagaadan yaagees; "Taani Israa7eela asaa omooduwaappe zaarada ishalissiyo wode, Yihudaa biittaaninne a katamatun eti naa77anttuwaa, Nenoo xillotettai de7iyo sohuwau, nenoo geeshsha deriyau, GODAI nena anjjo yaagana.

English Sentences: And there shall dwell in Judah itself, and in all the cities thereof together, husbandmen, and they that go forth with flocks.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaanne Yihudan de7iya katamatun ubban asai de7ana; goshshanchchatikka wudiyaara yuuyiya henttanchchatikka yan de7ana.

English Sentences: For I have satiated the weary soul, and I have replenished every sorrowful soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani daafuranchchata gazddissana; qassi namisettidi gilqqidaageetakka kalissana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Upon this I awaked, and beheld; and my sleep was sweet unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan beegottada ta yuushuwaa xeellaas; ta xiskkoikka taayyo mal77o xiskko gidiis.

English Sentences: Behold, the days come, saith the LORD, that I will sow the house of Israel and the house of Judah with the seed of man, and with the seed of beast.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani Israa7eela biittaaninne Yihudaa biittan asaanne mehiyaa kunttiyo wodee yaana.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass, that like as I have watched over them, to pluck up, and to break down, and to throw down, and to destroy, and to afflict; so will I watch over them, to build, and to plant, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta xoqollanau, qolanau, aatta aatta yegganau, xaissanaunne bashshaa ehaanau wudada naagidoogaa keenaa, eta zaarada gimbbanaunne tokkanau wudada naagana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: In those days they shall say no more, The fathers have eaten a sour grape, and the children's teeth are set on edge.
Wolaitta Sentences: "He wode asai, Aawati caala woiniyaa teeraa min, naatu achchai zil77iis yaagidi haasayiyoogaa aggana.

English Sentences: But every one shall die for his own iniquity: every man that eateth the sour grape, his teeth shall be set on edge.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin asai issoi issoi ba nagaran nagaran haiqqana; caala woiniyaa teeraa miya asa ubbau a achchai achchai zil77ana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Behold, the days come, saith the LORD, that I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel, and with the house of Judah:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani Israa7eela asaaranne Yihudaa asaara ooratta maachchaa maacettiyo gallassati yaana.

English Sentences: Not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day that I took them by the hand to bring them out of the land of Egypt; which my covenant they brake, although I was an husband unto them, saith the LORD:
Wolaitta Sentences: He maachchai taani eta Gibxxeppe kessanau eta kushiyaa oiqqido wode, eta maizza aawatuura maacettido maachchaa mala gidenna; taani etayyo azina mala gida uttinkka eti ta maachchaa kanttidosona. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: But this shall be the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel; After those days, saith the LORD, I will put my law in their inward parts, and write it in their hearts; and will be their God, and they shall be my people.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani GODAI he gallassatuppe guyyiyan Israa7eela asaara maacettana maachchai hagaa: taani ta higgiyaa eta giddon wottana; qassi eta wozanankka xaafana. Taani eta Xoossaa gidana; qassi etikka ta asa gidana.

English Sentences: And they shall teach no more every man his neighbour, and every man his brother, saying, Know the LORD: for they shall all know me, from the least of them unto the greatest of them, saith the LORD: for I will forgive their iniquity, and I will remember their sin no more.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi ba shooruwaa woikko ba ishaa, GODAA era yaagidi tamaarissiyoogaa aggana; aissi giikko, guuttaappe doommidi, gitaa gakkanaashin, eti ubbai tana erana. Taani eta naaquwaa atto gaana; eta nagaraakka naa77antto hassayikke. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD, which giveth the sun for a light by day, and the ordinances of the moon and of the stars for a light by night, which divideth the sea when the waves thereof roar; The LORD of hosts is his name:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI, awaa gallassan poo7issidaagee, aginainne xoolintteti qamman poo7anaadan higgiyaa wottidaagee, abbaakka qaattidi, beetai guummanaadan oottiyaagee, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAA geetettiyaagee, hagaadan yaagees;

English Sentences: If those ordinances depart from before me, saith the LORD, then the seed of Israel also shall cease from being a nation before me for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha eqqidi de7iya mereta higgee ta sinttappe kichchikko, he wode Israa7eela zerettati ta sinttan merinau kawotetta gididi de7iyoogee attana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD; If heaven above can be measured, and the foundations of the earth searched out beneath, I will also cast off all the seed of Israel for all that they have done, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Bolla saloti likettanau, woikko garssa sa7aa baasoikka erettanau danddayikko, he wode taani Israa7eela zerettata ubbaa, eti oottido mooruwaa ubbaa gishshau, ta sinttappe diggana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: Behold, the days come, saith the LORD, that the city shall be built to the LORD from the tower of Hananeel unto the gate of the corner.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Hanaani7eela Adussa Gimbbiyaappe doommidi, Zooziyaa Penggiyaa gakkanaashin, Yerusalaame katamai taayyo, GODAAYYO, katama gididi, simmidi keexettiyo gallassati yaana.

English Sentences: And the measuring line shall yet go forth over against it upon the hill Gareb, and shall compass about to Goath.
Wolaitta Sentences: He katamaa zawaikka arggo baggaappe kaallidi biidi, Gaareeba Keraanne Go77a yuushuwaa gakkanaassi aakkana.

English Sentences: And the whole valley of the dead bodies, and of the ashes, and all the fields unto the brook of Kidron, unto the corner of the horse gate toward the east, shall be holy unto the LORD; it shall not be plucked up, nor thrown down any more for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ahaa moogiyoonne bidinttaa oliyo zanggaarainne Qediroona Zanggaaraappe qommoora arshsho baggaara biidi, Paraa Penggiyaa zooziyaa gakkanaashin de7iya gade ubbai GODAASSI dummatidi, geeshsha gidana. Hagaappe sinttanau katamai merinau shodettennanne qolettenna" yaagees.

English Sentences: The word that came to Jeremiah from the LORD in the tenth year of Zedekiah king of Judah, which was the eighteenth year of Nebuchadrezzar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa Kawoi Sedeqiyaasi kawotido tammantta laittan, Baabiloone Kawoi Naabukadanaxoori kawotido tammanne hosppuntta laittan GODAAPPE Ermmaasayyo qaalai yiis.

English Sentences: For then the king of Babylon's army besieged Jerusalem: and Jeremiah the prophet was shut up in the court of the prison, which was in the king of Judah's house.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Baabiloone kawuwaa olanchchati Yerusalaame dooddidosona; hananabaa yootiya Ermmaasi Yihudaa kawuwaa keettan de7iya, naagiyaageetu dabaaban gorddetti uttiis.

English Sentences: For Zedekiah king of Judah had shut him up, saying, Wherefore dost thou prophesy, and say, Thus saith the LORD, Behold, I will give this city into the hand of the king of Babylon, and he shall take it;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa Kawoi Sedeqiyaasi a hegan qachchidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Neeni aissi hagaadan yaagada hananabaa yootai? GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Be7a, taani ha katamaa Baabiloone kawuwaa kushiyan aattada immana hanais; immin i omooddana.

English Sentences: And Zedekiah king of Judah shall not escape out of the hand of the Chaldeans, but shall surely be delivered into the hand of the king of Babylon, and shall speak with him mouth to mouth, and his eyes shall behold his eyes;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa Kawoi Sedeqiyaasi Baabiloonetu kushiyaappe kessi ekkenna; i tumaappe Baabiloone kawuwaa kushiyan gelana. I a sinttan eqqidi, aara haasayana; i a ba aifiyan be7ana.

English Sentences: And he shall lead Zedekiah to Babylon, and there shall he be until I visit him, saith the LORD: though ye fight with the Chaldeans, ye shall not prosper.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Naabukadanaxoori Sedeqiyaasa Baabiloone efaana; efin taani a bolli pirddana gakkanaashin, i yan de7ana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais. Neeni Baabiloonetuura olettiyaabaa gidikko, hegee nena kessenna" yaagees yaagadasa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jeremiah said, The word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Ermmaasi, "GODAA qaalai he wode taakko hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: Behold, Hanameel the son of Shallum thine uncle shall come unto thee, saying, Buy thee my field that is in Anathoth: for the right of redemption is thine to buy it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne aawaa ishaa SHaaluuma na7ai, Hanaami7eeli neekko yiidi, "Anatoota kataman de7iya ta gadiyaa shamma; aissi giikko, shammanau dabbotai gattiyoi nena" yaagana yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Hanameel mine uncle's son came to me in the court of the prison according to the word of the LORD, and said unto me, Buy my field, I pray thee, that is in Anathoth, which is in the country of Benjamin: for the right of inheritance is thine, and the redemption is thine; buy it for thyself. Then I knew that this was the word of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI giidoogaadan, ta aawaa ishaa na7ai Hanaami7eeli taakko naagiyaageetu dabaabaa yiidi, Biniyaama biittan Anatootan de7iya ta gadiyaa shamma; gadiyaa shammanaunne buzottanau gattiyoi nena yaagiis. Yaagin taani hegan GODAA qaala gidiyoogaa eraas.

English Sentences: And I bought the field of Hanameel my uncle's son, that was in Anathoth, and weighed him the money, even seventeen shekels of silver.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatada Anatoota kataman de7iya gadiyaa ta aawaa ishaa na7aa Hanaami7eelappe shammaas; shammada i ekkiyo waagaa ayyo meezaanan kilaas; kilin tammanne laappun xaqara bira gidiis.

English Sentences: And I subscribed the evidence, and sealed it, and took witnesses, and weighed him the money in the balances.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHamaa paramaa markkati de7iyoosan paramada, maatafaa an wottaas; miishshaakka meezaanan kilada immaas.

English Sentences: So I took the evidence of the purchase, both that which was sealed according to the law and custom, and that which was open:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan, taani attamettida shamaa paramaanne attamettibeenna shamaa paramaa ekkaas.

English Sentences: And I gave the evidence of the purchase unto Baruch the son of Neriah, the son of Maaseiah, in the sight of Hanameel mine uncle's son, and in the presence of the witnesses that subscribed the book of the purchase, before all the Jews that sat in the court of the prison.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ekkada ta aawaa ishaa na7ai Hanaami7eeli, shamaa paramaa paramida markkatinne naagiyaageetu dabaaban uttida Aihudati ubbai xeellishin, he shamaa paramaa Mahiseeya na7aa na7aa, Neeriyaa na7aa Baarukassi immaas.

English Sentences: And I charged Baruch before them, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Immada eta sinttan taani Baaruka hagaadan yaagada azazaas;

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; Take these evidences, this evidence of the purchase, both which is sealed, and this evidence which is open; and put them in an earthen vessel, that they may continue many days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai, hagaadan yaagees; "Daro wodiyaa gam77ana mala, ha attamettida paramaanne attamettibeenna paramaa ekka efaada, urqqaappe merettida otuwan wotta" yaagees.

English Sentences: For thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; Houses and fields and vineyards shall be possessed again in this land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai, hagaadan yaagees; "Ha biittan asai zaaridikka keettaa, gadiyaanne woiniyaa turaa tokkiyo sohuwaa shammana" yaagees yaagaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now when I had delivered the evidence of the purchase unto Baruch the son of Neriah, I prayed unto the LORD, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Neeriyaa na7aa Baarukayyo shamaa paramaa woraqataa immidoogaappe guyyiyan, GODAA hagaadan yaagada woossaas;

English Sentences: Ah Lord GOD! behold, thou hast made the heaven and the earth by thy great power and stretched out arm, and there is nothing too hard for thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Abeet Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, neeni salotanne sa7aa ne gita wolqqaaninne ne yeddido kushiyan medhdhadasa! Neessi danddayettennabi mulekka baawa.

English Sentences: Thou shewest lovingkindness unto thousands, and recompensest the iniquity of the fathers into the bosom of their children after them: the Great, the Mighty God, the LORD of hosts, is his name,
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni sha7atuyyo aggenna siiquwaa bessaasa; shin aawatu mooruwaa eta naatu bolli zaaraasa. Abeet gitanne wolqqaama Xoossau, ne sunttai Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAA geetettees.

English Sentences: Great in counsel, and mighty in work: for thine eyes are open upon all the ways of the sons of men: to give every one according to his ways, and according to the fruit of his doings:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne zoree gita; ne oottiyo oosoikka wolqqaama. Asaa ogiyaa ubbaa neeni be7aasa; asau ubbaukka a ogiyaadaaninne a oosuwaadan zaaraasa.

English Sentences: Which hast set signs and wonders in the land of Egypt, even unto this day, and in Israel, and among other men; and hast made thee a name, as at this day;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni Gibxxen malaataanne oorattabaa oottadasa; hachchi gakkanaassikka ha ooratta oosota Israa7eela asaa giddooninne hara kawotettatu ubbaa giddon oottiyoogaa aggabaakka. Hegaappe denddidaagan ne sunttai ubbasan erettiis.

English Sentences: And hast brought forth thy people Israel out of the land of Egypt with signs, and with wonders, and with a strong hand, and with a stretched out arm, and with great terror;
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne asaa Israa7eela Gibxxeppe malaataaninne oorattaban, ne mino qesiyaaninne ne yeddido kushiyan, qassi gita dagaman kessadasa.

English Sentences: And hast given them this land, which thou didst swear to their fathers to give them, a land flowing with milk and honey;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta maizza aawatuyyo neeni immanau caaqqido biittaa, maattainne eessai goggiyo ha biittaa etayyo immadasa;

English Sentences: And they came in, and possessed it; but they obeyed not thy voice, neither walked in thy law; they have done nothing of all that thou commandedst them to do: therefore thou hast caused all this evil to come upon them:
Wolaitta Sentences: immin eti ha biittaa gelidi laattidosona. SHin eti neeyyo azazettibookkona; ne higgiyaakka kaallibookkona; eti oottanaadan neeni azazidoba ubbaakka oottibookkona. Hegaa gishshau, neeni eta bolli ha bashsha ubbaa ehaadasa.

English Sentences: Behold the mounts, they are come unto the city to take it; and the city is given into the hand of the Chaldeans, that fight against it, because of the sword, and of the famine, and of the pestilence: and what thou hast spoken is come to pass; and, behold, thou seest it.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Be7a, Baabilooneti katamaa oiqqanau gimbbiyaa yuushuwan biittaa dooridi dooddidosona; olaappe, koshaappenne boshaappe denddidaagan, katamai etaara olettiya Baabiloonetu kushiyan aadhdhidi imettiis. Neeni ha77i be7iyoogaadan, ne giidobai ubbai polettiis.

English Sentences: And thou hast said unto me, O Lord GOD, Buy thee the field for money, and take witnesses; for the city is given into the hand of the Chaldeans.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, katamai Baabiloonetuyyo imettanau hanishinkka, neeni tana, Markkata xeesada, miishshan ha gadiyaa shamma yaagadasa" yaagada woossaas.

English Sentences: Then came the word of the LORD unto Jeremiah, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, GODAA qaalai Ermmaasayyo hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: Behold, I am the LORD, the God of all flesh: is there any thing too hard for me?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani GODAA, asaa ubbaa Xoossaa. Taassi danddayettennabi de7ii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Therefore thus saith the LORD; Behold, I will give this city into the hand of the Chaldeans, and into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, and he shall take it:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani ha katamaa Baabiloonetuyyoonne Baabiloone Kawuwaa Naabukadanaxoorayyo aattada immana; immin eti a oiqqana.

English Sentences: And the Chaldeans, that fight against this city, shall come and set fire on this city, and burn it with the houses, upon whose roofs they have offered incense unto Baal, and poured out drink offerings unto other gods, to provoke me to anger.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha katamaa bolli woraajjiya Baabilooneti yiidi, katamaa taman xuuggana; keettaa bollan dembbayidi oottidosan Ba7aalayyo ixaanaa cuwayidinne hara xoossatuyyo ushshaa yarshshuwaa gussidi, tana hanqqetissida asati de7ido keettatakka xuuggana.

English Sentences: For the children of Israel and the children of Judah have only done evil before me from their youth: for the children of Israel have only provoked me to anger with the work of their hands, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asainne Yihudaa asai bantta yelagatettaappe doommidi, ta sinttan iitabaa oottidosonappe attin, harabaa oottibookkona; eti bantta kushiyan oottido oosuwan tana hanqqetissidosona.

English Sentences: For this city hath been to me as a provocation of mine anger and of my fury from the day that they built it even unto this day; that I should remove it from before my face,
Wolaitta Sentences: Keexettido wodiyaappe hachchi gakkanaashin, ha katamaa asati tana hanqqetissidosonanne yiilloyidosona; hegaa gishshau, taani ha katamaa ta sinttappe xaissana.

English Sentences: Because of all the evil of the children of Israel and of the children of Judah, which they have done to provoke me to anger, they, their kings, their princes, their priests, and their prophets, and the men of Judah, and the inhabitants of Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asainne Yihudaa asai, eta kawotinne halaqati, eta qeesetinne hananabaa yootiyaageeti oottido iita ooso ubban tana hanqqetissidosona.

English Sentences: And they have turned unto me the back, and not the face: though I taught them, rising up early and teaching them, yet they have not hearkened to receive instruction.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta som77uwaa aggidi, bantta zokkuwaa taayyo zaaridosona. Taani eta zaara zaarada tamaarissikkokka, eti siyibookkonanne seeraakka ekkibookkona.

English Sentences: But they set their abominations in the house, which is called by my name, to defile it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti sheneyiya bantta eeqata ta sunttan xeesettida Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddon essidi tunissidosona.

English Sentences: And they built the high places of Baal, which are in the valley of the son of Hinnom, to cause their sons and their daughters to pass through the fire unto Molech; which I commanded them not, neither came it into my mind, that they should do this abomination, to cause Judah to sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta attuma naatanne macca naata Molooka eeqaayyo yarshshanau Hinnooma Zanggaaran Ba7aalayyo yarshshiyo xoqqa sohota giigissidosona. Eti hegaa oottana mala, taani eta azazabeikke; Yihudaa asaa eti nagaraa ootissanau hegaa mala sheneyiyaabaa oottanaagee ta wozanan mulekka aadhdhibeenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And now therefore thus saith the LORD, the God of Israel, concerning this city, whereof ye say, It shall be delivered into the hand of the king of Babylon by the sword, and by the famine, and by the pestilence;
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte Yerusalaame asai, "Ha katamai olan, koshaaninne boshan Baabiloone kawuwaa kushiyan aadhdhidi imettana" yaagido ha katamaabaa GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees;

English Sentences: Behold, I will gather them out of all countries, whither I have driven them in mine anger, and in my fury, and in great wrath; and I will bring them again unto this place, and I will cause them to dwell safely:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Be7ite, taani ta suulo hanqquwaaninne ta gita yiilluwan eta laalido biitta ubbaappe shiishshana; shiishshada ha sohuwaa zaarada ehaada, eti sarotettan de7anaadan oottana.

English Sentences: And they shall be my people, and I will be their God:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ta asa gidana; taanikka eta Xoossaa gidana.

English Sentences: And I will give them one heart, and one way, that they may fear me for ever, for the good of them, and of their children after them:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti taayyo merinau yayyana mala, taani etayyo issi wozanaanne issi ogiyaa immana; hegee etayyoonne etappe guyyiyan, eta naatuyyo lo77o gidana.

English Sentences: And I will make an everlasting covenant with them, that I will not turn away from them, to do them good; but I will put my fear in their hearts, that they shall not depart from me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani etaara merinau maachchaa maacettana. He maachchan taani etayyo lo77obaa oottiyoogaa aggikke; eti taappe wora simmenna mala, taani eti taayyo yayyanaadan oottana.

English Sentences: Yea, I will rejoice over them to do them good, and I will plant them in this land assuredly with my whole heart and with my whole soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani etayyo lo77obaa oottiyoogan ufaittana; qassi taani ta kumetta wozanaappenne ta kumetta shemppuwaappe ha biittan eta tumaappe tokkana" yaagees.

English Sentences: For thus saith the LORD; Like as I have brought all this great evil upon this people, so will I bring upon them all the good that I have promised them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani ha asaa bolli ha iita bashshaa ubbaa ehiidoogaadan, hegaadankka taani etayyo immana giido lo77obaa ubbaa immana.

English Sentences: And fields shall be bought in this land, whereof ye say, It is desolate without man or beast; it is given into the hand of the Chaldeans.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte, Ha biittai asaikka meheekka de7enna, baisa biitta gidana; i Baabiloonetussi imettiichchiis yaagido biittan asai zaarettidi, gadiyaa shammana.

English Sentences: Men shall buy fields for money, and subscribe evidences, and seal them, and take witnesses in the land of Benjamin, and in the places about Jerusalem, and in the cities of Judah, and in the cities of the mountains, and in the cities of the valley, and in the cities of the south: for I will cause their captivity to return, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai gadiyaa miishshan shammana; markkaa sinttan paramaa paramidi, maatafaa wottana. Hagee ubbai Biniyaama biittan, Yerusalaame yuushuwan de7iya heeratun, Yihudaa katamatun, gezziyan de7iya katamatun, bargguwan de7iya katamatuuninne Neegeeba Bazzuwan de7iya katamatu ubban hanana. Aissi giikko, taani eta zaarada ishalissana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: Moreover the word of the LORD came unto Jeremiah the second time, while he was yet shut up in the court of the prison, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ermmaasi biron naagiyaageetu dabaaban de7ishin, GODAA qaalai naa77anttuwaakka yiis.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD the maker thereof, the LORD that formed it, to establish it; the LORD is his name;
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7aa medhdhida GODAI, giigissidi a sohuwan wottida GODAI, a sunttaikka GODAA geetettiyoogee tana hagaadan yaagees;

English Sentences: Call unto me, and I will answer thee, and shew thee great and mighty things, which thou knowest not.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni tana xeesa; taani neeyyo koyana; neeni erenna gitabaanne wolqqaamabaa taani neeyyo yootana.

English Sentences: For thus saith the LORD, the God of Israel, concerning the houses of this city, and concerning the houses of the kings of Judah, which are thrown down by the mounts, and by the sword;
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloonetu biittaa doorettaa, doodettaanne bisuwaa teqqana mala, dirssaa gimbbiyaa minttanau qolido ha katamaa keettatubaanne Yihudaa kawotu keettatubaa taani GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai odais.

English Sentences: They come to fight with the Chaldeans, but it is to fill them with the dead bodies of men, whom I have slain in mine anger and in my fury, and for all whose wickedness I have hid my face from this city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenaara olettanaunne taani ta hanqquwaaninne yiilluwan shocana asatu ahaa he sohotun kunttanau Baabilooneti geloosona. Aissi giikko, eta iitatettaa ubbaa gishshau, taani ha katamaappe ta som77uwaa genttaas.

English Sentences: Behold, I will bring it health and cure, and I will cure them, and will reveal unto them the abundance of peace and truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gidikkonne, taani ha katamaanne an de7iya asaa zaarada pattana; eta payyatettaakka zaarana; keehi daro saruwaanne woppa de7uwaa taani etayyo immana.

English Sentences: And I will cause the captivity of Judah and the captivity of Israel to return, and will build them, as at the first.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Yihudaa asaanne Israa7eela asaa omooduwaappe zaarada ishalissana; eti kase de7idoogaadan oottada taani eta gimbbana.

English Sentences: And I will cleanse them from all their iniquity, whereby they have sinned against me; and I will pardon all their iniquities, whereby they have sinned, and whereby they have transgressed against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti tana naaqqido nagara ubbaappe taani eta geeshshana; geeshshada eti tana naaqqido naaquwaanne makkalido makkala ubbaa atto yaagana.

English Sentences: And it shall be to me a name of joy, a praise and an honour before all the nations of the earth, which shall hear all the good that I do unto them: and they shall fear and tremble for all the goodness and for all the prosperity that I procure unto it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yerusalaame katamai taayyo ufaissaa, bonchchuwaanne galataa sa7an de7iya kawotettatu ubbaa sinttan ehaana. Taani Yerusalaame asaassi oottiyo lo77obaanne he katamaassi ehiyo duretettaanne sarotettaa siyidi, kawotettati ubbai yashshan kokkorana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD; Again there shall be heard in this place, which ye say shall be desolate without man and without beast, even in the cities of Judah, and in the streets of Jerusalem, that are desolate, without man, and without inhabitant, and without beast,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Intte, Asainne mehee bainna bazzo giido ha sohotun, asainne mehee bainna Yihudaa katamatuuninne Yerusalaame ogetun,

English Sentences: The voice of joy, and the voice of gladness, the voice of the bridegroom, and the voice of the bride, the voice of them that shall say, Praise the LORD of hosts: for the LORD is good; for his mercy endureth for ever: and of them that shall bring the sacrifice of praise into the house of the LORD. For I will cause to return the captivity of the land, as at the first, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: ufaissaanne ililssaa cenggurssai, bullachchiyaagaanne bullashettiyaari cenggurssainne GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa galataa yarshshuwaa ehiiddi, hagaadan yaagidi yexxiya asaa cenggurssai siyettana; Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAA galatite; aissi giikko, i keha. Aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa yaagoosona. Aissi giikko, taani eta omooduwaappe zaarada eta biitti ehaana; eti kase de7idoogaadan oottada, taani ishalissada wottana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; Again in this place, which is desolate without man and without beast, and in all the cities thereof, shall be an habitation of shepherds causing their flocks to lie down.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Ha asainne mehee bainna baisa biittaaninne an de7iya katamatun henttanchchati bantta dorssaa wudiyaa allaxxissiyo gadee de7ana.

English Sentences: In the cities of the mountains, in the cities of the vale, and in the cities of the south, and in the land of Benjamin, and in the places about Jerusalem, and in the cities of Judah, shall the flocks pass again under the hands of him that telleth them, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gezziyan de7iya katamatun, bargguwan de7iya katamatun, Neegeeba Bazzuwan de7iya katamatun, Biniyaama biittan, Yerusalaame yuushuwan de7iya heeratuuninne Yihudaa katamatun henttanchchati bantta dorssaa zaarettidi qoodana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: Behold, the days come, saith the LORD, that I will perform that good thing which I have promised unto the house of Israel and to the house of Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani Israa7eela asaayyoonne Yihudaa asaayyo oottana giido lo77o qaalaa poliyo gallassati yaana;

English Sentences: In those days, and at that time, will I cause the Branch of righteousness to grow up unto David; and he shall execute judgment and righteousness in the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: he gallassatuuninne he wodetun taani Daawita zariyaappe issi xillo Aacaa denttana; i he biittan suure pirddaanne xillotettaa oottana.

English Sentences: In those days shall Judah be saved, and Jerusalem shall dwell safely: and this is the name wherewith she shall be called, The LORD our righteousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Yihudaa asai attana; Yerusalaame asaikka woppu giidi de7ana; ha katamaikka GODAA, Nu Xillotettaa yaagetti xeesettana.

English Sentences: For thus saith the LORD; David shall never want a man to sit upon the throne of the house of Israel;
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawita zerettaappe Israa7eela kawotaa araatan uttiya asi mulekka xayenna.

English Sentences: Neither shall the priests the Levites want a man before me to offer burnt offerings, and to kindle meat offerings, and to do sacrifice continually.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka, xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa, kattaa yarshshuwaunne hara yarshshuwaa ubbatoo yarshshanau Leewa zariyaappe qeese gidiya asi merinaukka ta sinttan xayenna. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: And the word of the LORD came unto Jeremiah, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai Ermmaasakko yiis.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD; If ye can break my covenant of the day, and my covenant of the night, and that there should not be day and night in their season;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani gallassaaranne qammaara maachchaa maacettaas; he maachchan eti banttau keerettida wodiyan simerettoosona. He gallassaanne qammaa maachchaa intte laammanau danddayikko,

English Sentences: Then may also my covenant be broken with David my servant, that he should not have a son to reign upon his throne; and with the Levites the priests, my ministers.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani a zariyaappe kawotaa araatan uttana asi mulekka xayennaadan, ta ashkkaraa Daawitaara maacettido maachchaa laammana; qassi ubbatoo taayyo oottiya, Leewa zare gidiya qeesetuura maacettido maachchaakka laammana.

English Sentences: As the host of heaven cannot be numbered, neither the sand of the sea measured: so will I multiply the seed of David my servant, and the Levites that minister unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta ashkkaraa Daawita zerettatanne ta sinttan oottiya Leewa zare qeeseta qoodanau danddayettenna saluwaa xoolinttetudaaninne makkin wurenna abbaa shafiyaadan corayana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Moreover the word of the LORD came to Jeremiah, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai qassikka Ermmaasakko hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: Considerest thou not what this people have spoken, saying, The two families which the LORD hath chosen, he hath even cast them off? thus they have despised my people, that they should be no more a nation before them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha asai, GODAI ba doorido naa77u kawotettata, Israa7eelanne Yihudaa aggi bayiis yaagidi haasayiyoogaa neeni akeekabeikkii? Eti ta asaa karidi, bana danddayida kawotetta kiyokkona giidi qoppoosona.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD; If my covenant be not with day and night, and if I have not appointed the ordinances of heaven and earth;
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAI gallassaaranne qammaara maacettido maachchaanne saluwaanne sa7aa higgiyaa minttabeennabaa gidiyaakko,

English Sentences: Then will I cast away the seed of Jacob, and David my servant, so that I will not take any of his seed to be rulers over the seed of Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob: for I will cause their captivity to return, and have mercy on them.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani Yaaqooba zerettatanne ta ashkkaraa Daawita zerettata agga bayana; yaatabeennabaa gidiyaakko, Abrahaama, Yisaaqanne Yaaqooba zaretu bolli kawoyanau Daawita zerettaa doorennan aggana. Taani ta asaa maarana; taani eta zaarada ishalissana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The word which came unto Jeremiah from the LORD, when Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, and all his army, and all the kingdoms of the earth of his dominion, and all the people, fought against Jerusalem, and against all the cities thereof, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloone Kawoi Naabukadanaxoori, a olanchchati ubbainne i haariyo kawotettatun de7iya asai ubbai, Yerusalaamenne Yerusalaame yuushuwan de7iya katamata ubbaa oliyo wode, ha qaalai GODAAPPE Ermmaasayyo yiis;

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD, the God of Israel; Go and speak to Zedekiah king of Judah, and tell him, Thus saith the LORD; Behold, I will give this city into the hand of the king of Babylon, and he shall burn it with fire:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagiis; "Ba; baada Yihudaa Kawuwaa Sedeqiyaasa hagaadan yaaga; GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Be7a, taani ha katamaa Baabiloone kawuwaa kushiyan aattada immana; immin i ha katamaa taman xuuggana.

English Sentences: And thou shalt not escape out of his hand, but shalt surely be taken, and delivered into his hand; and thine eyes shall behold the eyes of the king of Babylon, and he shall speak with thee mouth to mouth, and thou shalt go to Babylon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni a kushiyaappe kessa ekkakka; neeni omoodettananne ayyo aadhdha imettana. Neeni ne aifiyan Baabiloone kawuwaa be7ana; ikka nenaara haasayana. Hegaappe guyyiyan, neeni Baabiloone biitti baana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Yet hear the word of the LORD, O Zedekiah king of Judah; Thus saith the LORD of thee, Thou shalt not die by the sword:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gidikkonne, Yihudaa Kawuwau Sedeqiyaasaa, GODAI giyoobaa siya! Nebaa GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Neeni olan haiqqakka;

English Sentences: But thou shalt die in peace: and with the burnings of thy fathers, the former kings which were before thee, so shall they burn odours for thee; and they will lament thee, saying, Ah lord! for I have pronounced the word, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: neeni saro haiquwaa haiqqana. Neeppe kase de7ida kawotu bonchchuwaassi, ne maizza aawatussi ixaanaa cuwayidoogaadan, asai ne bonchchuwaassikka ixaanaa cuwayana. Yaatidi, Aayyee nu kawuwau! yaagidi neeyyo yeekkana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees yaagada yoota" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Jeremiah the prophet spake all these words unto Zedekiah king of Judah in Jerusalem,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, hananabaa yootiya Ermmaasi ha hiraagaa ubbaa Yihudaa Kawuwaa Sedeqiyaasayyo Yerusalaamen yootiis.

English Sentences: When the king of Babylon's army fought against Jerusalem, and against all the cities of Judah that were left, against Lachish, and against Azekah: for these defenced cities remained of the cities of Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Baabiloone kawuwaa olanchchati Yerusalaame katamaanne Yihudan attida katamata olidosona. Laakishanne Azeeqa geetettiya katamatu xalaalai Yihudan attida gimbbettida katamata.

English Sentences: This is the word that came unto Jeremiah from the LORD, after that the king Zedekiah had made a covenant with all the people which were at Jerusalem, to proclaim liberty unto them;
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Sedeqiyaasi ailleta ailletettaappe kessiyo awaajjuwaa awaajjanau Yerusalaamen de7iya asaa ubbaara maachchaa maacettidoogaappe guyyiyan, Ermmaasassi GODAAPPE qaalai yiis. He awaajjoi,

English Sentences: That every man should let his manservant, and every man his maidservant, being an Hebrew or an Hebrewess, go free; that none should serve himself of them, to wit, of a Jew his brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Asai ubbai ba Ibraawe attumaasatanne maccaasata ailletettaappe kesso; ooninne Aihuda asa gidida ba ishaa aille oottoppo" yaagees.

English Sentences: Now when all the princes, and all the people, which had entered into the covenant, heard that every one should let his manservant, and every one his maidservant, go free, that none should serve themselves of them any more, then they obeyed, and let them go.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, asai ubbainne halaqati ubbai maacettido maachchaadan, bantta attumanne macca ailleta ailletettaappe kessanaunne naa77antto zaaridi ailleyennan agganau maayidosona; maayidoogaadankka eta ailletettaappe kessidosona.

English Sentences: But afterward they turned, and caused the servants and the handmaids, whom they had let go free, to return, and brought them into subjection for servants and for handmaids.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin bantta qofaa laammidi, ailletettaappe kessido bantta attumanne macca ailleta zaaridi ailleyidosona.

English Sentences: Therefore the word of the LORD came to Jeremiah from the LORD, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, GODAA qaalai Ermmaasakko yiis.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD, the God of Israel; I made a covenant with your fathers in the day that I brought them forth out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of bondmen, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; "Taani intte maizza aawata Gibxxeppe, ailletettaa biittaappe kessido wode, etaara maachchaa maacetta uttaas.

English Sentences: At the end of seven years let ye go every man his brother an Hebrew, which hath been sold unto thee; and when he hath served thee six years, thou shalt let him go free from thee: but your fathers hearkened not unto me, neither inclined their ear.
Wolaitta Sentences: He maachchaa maaran, Ibraawe aillee de7iyo asai ubbai, ailleta usuppun laittaa ootissi simmidi, laappuntta laitti ailletettaappe kessi yeddite yaagada azazaas. SHin intte maizza aawati taani odiyoogaa siyennan ixxidosonanne taayyo azazettibookkona.

English Sentences: And ye were now turned, and had done right in my sight, in proclaiming liberty every man to his neighbour; and ye had made a covenant before me in the house which is called by my name:
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttekka mata wodiyaappe kase intte nagaraa aggidi, ailleta ailletettaappe kessanau awaajjideta; awaajjidi ta sinttan likkebaa oottideta. Qassi hegaa oottanau ta sinttan, ta sunttai xeesettiyo ta Beeta Maqidasiyan maachchaa maacettideta.

English Sentences: But ye turned and polluted my name, and caused every man his servant, and every man his handmaid, whom he had set at liberty at their pleasure, to return, and brought them into subjection, to be unto you for servants and for handmaids.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ha77ikka intte intte qofaa laammidi, ta sunttaa tunissideta. Waatidi giikko, eti koyidoogaadan, ailletettaappe kessido intte attumanne macca ailleta zaaridi ailleyideta.

English Sentences: Therefore thus saith the LORD; Ye have not hearkened unto me, in proclaiming liberty, every one to his brother, and every man to his neighbour: behold, I proclaim a liberty for you, saith the LORD, to the sword, to the pestilence, and to the famine; and I will make you to be removed into all the kingdoms of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, taani GODAI odiyoogee hagaa: intte taayyo azazettennan ixxidi, intte ishaa woikko intte shooruwaa ailletettaappe kessiyo awaajjuwaa awaajjibeekketa. Be7ite, intte bolli olai boshainne koshai kiyana mala, taani awaajjais. Taani inttena sa7aa bolli de7iya kawotettatussi dagama oottana.

English Sentences: And I will give the men that have transgressed my covenant, which have not performed the words of the covenant which they had made before me, when they cut the calf in twain, and passed between the parts thereof,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta maachchaa kanttida asaa, ta sinttan maacettido maachchaa qaalata naagennan ixxida asaa, eti maachchau shukkidi, baggaa baggaa kessi maaran wottidi, naa77u baggaappe gidduwaara kanttido, he maraadan taani eta oottana.

English Sentences: The princes of Judah, and the princes of Jerusalem, the eunuchs, and the priests, and all the people of the land, which passed between the parts of the calf;
Wolaitta Sentences: He asatikka Yihudaa halaqata, Yerusalaame halaqata, biittaa haariyaageeta, qeesetanne maaran wottido maraa ashuwaa giddoora kanttida asaa ubbaa.

English Sentences: I will even give them into the hand of their enemies, and into the hand of them that seek their life: and their dead bodies shall be for meat unto the fowls of the heaven, and to the beasts of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta eta morkketu kushiyaaninne eta woranau koyiya asatu kushiyan aattada immana; immin eta ahai saluwaa kafotuyyoonne sa7aa do7atuyyo quma gidana.

English Sentences: And Zedekiah king of Judah and his princes will I give into the hand of their enemies, and into the hand of them that seek their life, and into the hand of the king of Babylon's army, which are gone up from you.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani Yihudaa Kawuwaa Sedeqiyaasanne a halaqatakka eta morkketu kushiyan, eta woranau koyiyaageetu kushiyaaninne inttena oliyoogaa aggida Baabiloone kawuwaa olanchchatu kushiyan aattada immana.

English Sentences: Behold, I will command, saith the LORD, and cause them to return to this city; and they shall fight against it, and take it, and burn it with fire: and I will make the cities of Judah a desolation without an inhabitant.
