English Sentences: But we will certainly do whatsoever thing goeth forth out of our own mouth, to burn incense unto the queen of heaven, and to pour out drink offerings unto her, as we have done, we, and our fathers, our kings, and our princes, in the cities of Judah, and in the streets of Jerusalem: for then had we plenty of victuals, and were well, and saw no evil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni oottana giidobaa ubbaa oottana. Nuuni, nu maizza aawati, nu kawotinne nu halaqati Yihudaa katamatuuninne Yerusalaame ogetun kase oottidoogaadan, Saluwaa Kawiyo geetettiya nu xoosseessi ixaanaa cuwayana; ushshaa yarshshuwaakka iyyo gussana. Aissi giikko, nuuni kase hegaa oottiyo wode, nuuyyo daro qumai de7ees; he wode nuuyyo sa7ai keha; nuna aibinne metibeenna.

English Sentences: But since we left off to burn incense to the queen of heaven, and to pour out drink offerings unto her, we have wanted all things, and have been consumed by the sword and by the famine.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Saluwaa Kaweessi ixaanaa cuwayiyoogaanne ushshaa yarshshuwaa gussiyoogaa aggoosappe haa simmin, nuuyyo ubbabaikka pacciis; nuuni olaaninne koshan wurida" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And when we burned incense to the queen of heaven, and poured out drink offerings unto her, did we make her cakes to worship her, and pour out drink offerings unto her, without our men?
Wolaitta Sentences: Maccaasati gujjidikka hagaadan yaagidosona; "Nuuni Saluwaa Kawiyo milatiya oittaa uukkiyo wode, ixaanaa cuwayiyo wodenne ushshaa yarshshuwaa iyyo gussiyo wode ubban, nu azinati erennan de7ishin, nuuni oottidobi aibinne baawa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then Jeremiah said unto all the people, to the men, and to the women, and to all the people which had given him that answer, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ayyo hegaadan giidi zaarida asau ubbau, maccaunne attumau, Ermmaasi hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: The incense that ye burned in the cities of Judah, and in the streets of Jerusalem, ye, and your fathers, your kings, and your princes, and the people of the land, did not the LORD remember them, and came it not into his mind?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenne intte maizza aawati, intte kawotinne intte halaqati, qassi biittan de7iya asai ubbai Yihudaa katamatuuninne Yerusalaame ogetun ixaanaa cuwayidoogaa GODAI erenna woikko dogiis giidi qoppeetii?

English Sentences: So that the LORD could no longer bear, because of the evil of your doings, and because of the abominations which ye have committed; therefore is your land a desolation, and an astonishment, and a curse, without an inhabitant, as at this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte oottiyo iitanne sheneyiya oosuwaa GODAI co77u gaanau danddayibeenna gishshau, intte biittaa moorettida, baisanne qanggettida biitta oottiis. Hachchi intte be7iyoogaadan, intte biittai asi de7enna biitta gidiis.

English Sentences: Because ye have burned incense, and because ye have sinned against the LORD, and have not obeyed the voice of the LORD, nor walked in his law, nor in his statutes, nor in his testimonies; therefore this evil is happened unto you, as at this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha bashshai ubbai inttena gakkidoogee intte hara xoossatuyyo ixaanaa cuwayido gishshaassa, GODAA naaqqido gishshaassa, GODAA qaalaa siyennan ixxido gishshaassanne a higgiyaassinne a wogaassi azazettennan ixxido gishshaassa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Moreover Jeremiah said unto all the people, and to all the women, Hear the word of the LORD, all Judah that are in the land of Egypt:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Ermmaasi asau ubbau, maccaunne attumau hagaadan yaagiis; "Inttenoo, Yihudaappe yiidi, Gibxxe biittan de7iya asatoo, ubbaikka GODAI giyoobaa siyite!

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel, saying; Ye and your wives have both spoken with your mouths, and fulfilled with your hand, saying, We will surely perform our vows that we have vowed, to burn incense to the queen of heaven, and to pour out drink offerings unto her: ye will surely accomplish your vows, and surely perform your vows.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai, hagaadan yaagees; Inttenne intte keettaayeti, "Nuuni Saluwaa Kaweessi ixaanaa cuwayana; ushshaa yarshshuwaakka iyyo gussana" giidi caaqqido caaquwaa polidi, oosuwan bessideta. Ha77ikka gidikko, intte caaquwaa minttitenne polite yaagees.

English Sentences: Therefore hear ye the word of the LORD, all Judah that dwell in the land of Egypt; Behold, I have sworn by my great name, saith the LORD, that my name shall no more be named in the mouth of any man of Judah in all the land of Egypt, saying, The Lord GOD liveth.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gidikkonne, inttenoo, Gibxxe biittan de7iya Yihudaa asatoo, GODAI giyoobaa siyite! GODAI hagaadan yaagees; Hagaappe hini baggan Gibxxe biittan de7iya Yihudaa asaappe issoinne ta sunttan, "Ubbaa Haariya GODAI ero!" giidi caaqqenna mala, taani ta gita sunttan caaqqaas.

English Sentences: Behold, I will watch over them for evil, and not for good: and all the men of Judah that are in the land of Egypt shall be consumed by the sword and by the famine, until there be an end of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta bolli lo77obaa ehaanaassi gidennan, iitabaa ehaanaassi xeellais. Gibxxen de7iya Yihudaa asai muleera wurana gakkanaashin, olaaninne koshan haiqqana.

English Sentences: Yet a small number that escape the sword shall return out of the land of Egypt into the land of Judah, and all the remnant of Judah, that are gone into the land of Egypt to sojourn there, shall know whose words shall stand, mine, or theirs.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin olaappe attida issi amaridaageeti Gibxxeppe Yihudaa simmana. He wode Gibxxen de7iya Yihudaa asai ta qaalaappenne eta qaalaappe oogee tumattidaakkonne akeekidi erana.

English Sentences: And this shall be a sign unto you, saith the LORD, that I will punish you in this place, that ye may know that my words shall surely stand against you for evil:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani inttena ha sohuwan qaxxayanaagaunne, "Taani intte bolli iitabaa ehaana" giidoogee tumattanaagau, taani GODAI intteyyo malaataa immais:

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD; Behold, I will give Pharaohhophra king of Egypt into the hand of his enemies, and into the hand of them that seek his life; as I gave Zedekiah king of Judah into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, his enemy, and that sought his life.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani Yihudaa Kawuwaa Sedeqiyaasa ayyo morkke gididi, a woranau koyiya Baabiloone Kawuwaa Naabukadanaxoorassi aattada immidoogaadan, Gibxxe Kawuwaa Hofirakka a woranau koyiya a morkketussi aattada immana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The word that Jeremiah the prophet spake unto Baruch the son of Neriah, when he had written these words in a book at the mouth of Jeremiah, in the fourth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoosiyaasa na7ai Yo7aqeemi Yihudan kawotido oiddantto laittan, Neeriyaa na7ai Baaruki ha qaalata Ermmaasi yootin siyidi, maxaafan xaafiis. He wode Ermmaasi ayyo yootido qaalai hagaa.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD, the God of Israel, unto thee, O Baruch:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Baarukaa, nena GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees;

English Sentences: Thou didst say, Woe is me now! for the LORD hath added grief to my sorrow; I fainted in my sighing, and I find no rest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni, "GODAI ta sahuwaa bollan azzanuwaa gujjido gishshau, aayyee tanoo! Taani yeehuwan daafurada shemppuwaakka xayaas" yaagadasa yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus shalt thou say unto him, The LORD saith thus; Behold, that which I have built will I break down, and that which I have planted I will pluck up, even this whole land.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Baarukaa, nena GODAI hagaadan yaagees; Taani keexxidoogaa taani qolana; taani tokkidoogaakka taani shoddana. Hegaakka qassi taani biittan sa7an ubban oottana.

English Sentences: And seekest thou great things for thyself? seek them not: for, behold, I will bring evil upon all flesh, saith the LORD: but thy life will I give unto thee for a prey in all places whither thou goest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, neeni neeyyo gitabaa koyaiyye? Hegaa koyoppa. Aissi giikko, asaa ubbaa bollan taani iitabaa ehaana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais. SHin neeni biidosan ubban taani nena haiquwaappe ashshana yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The word of the LORD which came to Jeremiah the prophet against the Gentiles;
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettatubaa odanau GODAI Ermmaasassi kiittido qaalai hagaa.

English Sentences: Against Egypt, against the army of Pharaohnecho king of Egypt, which was by the river Euphrates in Carchemish, which Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon smote in the fourth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yo7aqeemi Yihudan kawotido oiddantto laittan, Efiraaxiisa SHaafaa matan, Karkkamiisha giyo sohuwan, Baabiloone Kawoi Naabukadanaxoori xoonido Gibxxe Kawuwaa Nako olanchchatubaa GODAI hagaadan yaagees;

English Sentences: Order ye the buckler and shield, and draw near to battle.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gibxxe ola gadaawati hagaadan yaagidi garmmaamoosona; Intte wogga gonddalliyaanne qeeri gonddalliyaa giigissite; giigissidi olau salppite!

English Sentences: Harness the horses; and get up, ye horsemen, and stand forth with your helmets; furbish the spears, and put on the brigandines.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte paraa bixaalidi toggite; intte huuphiyan birata qophiyaa wottidi, intte sohuwaa sohuwaa oiqqite! Intte tooraa leefite; intte ola maayuwaakka maayite! yaagoosona.

English Sentences: Wherefore have I seen them dismayed and turned away back? and their mighty ones are beaten down, and are fled apace, and look not back: for fear was round about, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin hagee taani be7iyoogee aibee? Gibxxe olanchchati yayyidi, guyye simmidosona. Wolqqaamati xoonettidosona; xoonettidi guyyenne xeellennan eesotidi baqatidosona. Eta yuusho ubban dagamai de7ees! Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: Let not the swift flee away, nor the mighty man escape; they shall stumble, and fall toward the north by the river Euphrates.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eesotidi woxxiyaageeti kessi ekkanau danddayokkona; mino olanchchatikka attanau danddayokkona. Huuphessa bagga biittan, Efiraaxiisa SHaafaa matan ubbaikka xubettidi kunddi aggoosona.

English Sentences: Who is this that cometh up as a flood, whose waters are moved as the rivers?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegee Naile SHaafai kixxidi, yuushuwaa ubbaa kumiyoogaadan, biitta ubbaa kumidaagee oonee?

English Sentences: Egypt riseth up like a flood, and his waters are moved like the rivers; and he saith, I will go up, and will cover the earth; I will destroy the city and the inhabitants thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee Naile SHaafai kixxidi, yuushuwaa ubbaa kumiyoogaadan, biitta ubbaa kumidaagee Gibxxe! Gibxxee hagaadan yaagees; Taani kixxada, biittan sa7an eellana; katamatanne katamatun de7iya asaa ubbaa bashshana.

English Sentences: Come up, ye horses; and rage, ye chariots; and let the mighty men come forth; the Ethiopians and the Libyans, that handle the shield; and the Lydians, that handle and bend the bow.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paratoo, piriixite! Paraa gaareta laaggiyaageetoo, eesuwan laaggite! Gonddalliyaa oiqqida Toophphiyaappenne Liibiyaappe yiida olanchchatoo, kiyite! Lidiyaappe yiida wonddafiyaa dukettan loohida olanchchatoo, woraajjite! yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: For this is the day of the Lord GOD of hosts, a day of vengeance, that he may avenge him of his adversaries: and the sword shall devour, and it shall be satiate and made drunk with their blood: for the Lord GOD of hosts hath a sacrifice in the north country by the river Euphrates.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassai Godai, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAA gallassa, GODAI ba morkketu bollan haluwaa kiyiyo gallassa. A bisoi kallana gakkanaashin, eta maana; alana gakkanaashinkka eta suuttaa uyana. Aissi giikko, Godai, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI huuphessa bagga biittan, Efiraaxiisa SHaafaa matan eta yarshsho oottidi ekkana.

English Sentences: Go up into Gilead, and take balm, O virgin, the daughter of Egypt: in vain shalt thou use many medicines; for thou shalt not be cured.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, Gibxxe asatoo, Gala7aade biittaa biidi, intteyyo tiyettiyo xaliyaa demmite. Gido shin, intte coo mela xaliyaa darisseetappe attin, intteyyo paxoi mule baawa.

English Sentences: The nations have heard of thy shame, and thy cry hath filled the land: for the mighty man hath stumbled against the mighty, and they are fallen both together.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte yeellaa kawotettati siyidosona; intte yeekkiyo yeehuwaa biittai sa7ai siyiis. Aissi giikko, intte olanchchati issoi issuwan xubettidi, mulee issippe kunddidosona.

English Sentences: The word that the LORD spake to Jeremiah the prophet, how Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon should come and smite the land of Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloone Kawoi Naabukadanaxoori Gibxxe biittaa olanau yiyo wode, GODAI hananabaa yootiya Ermmaasassi yootido qaalai hagaa:

English Sentences: Declare ye in Egypt, and publish in Migdol, and publish in Noph and in Tahpanhes: say ye, Stand fast, and prepare thee; for the sword shall devour round about thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hagaa Gibxxen yoota; qassi Gibxxe katamatun Migidoolan, Memppisaaninne Xaafinaasan awaajja. Olai intte yuushuwan de7iya asaa ubbaa wurssiiddi de7iyo gishshau, denddi eqqidi giigettite! yaaga.

English Sentences: Why are thy valiant men swept away? they stood not, because the LORD did drive them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte wolqqaama xoossai Aphphisi aissi kunddidee? GODAI a sugido gishshau kunddiis.

English Sentences: He made many to fall, yea, one fell upon another: and they said, Arise, and let us go again to our own people, and to the land of our nativity, from the oppressing sword.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte olanchchati xubettidi kunddidosona. Kunddidi issoi issuwaa, Denddite! Denddidi ha morkkiyaa bisuwaappe attanau, nu asaakko, nu biitti ane simmoos yaagoosona.

English Sentences: They did cry there, Pharaoh king of Egypt is but a noise; he hath passed the time appointed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti yan Gibxxe kawuwaa, Ba wodiyaa coo wurssiya odanchchaa giidi sunttana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: As I live, saith the King, whose name is the LORD of hosts, Surely as Tabor is among the mountains, and as Carmel by the sea, so shall he come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAA geetettiya Kawoi hagaadan yaagees; "Taani ta de7uwan caaqqais: deretu gidduwan Taaboora Deree, woikko abbaa lanqqiyan de7iya Qarmmeloosa Deree aduqqiyoogaadan aduqqiya morkkee intte bolli yaana.

English Sentences: O thou daughter dwelling in Egypt, furnish thyself to go into captivity: for Noph shall be waste and desolate without an inhabitant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, Gibxxe biittan de7iyaageetoo, omooduwan baanau giigite. Aissi giikko, Memppisa katamai kolettidi, ooninne de7enna bazzo gidana.

English Sentences: Egypt is like a very fair heifer, but destruction cometh; it cometh out of the north.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gibxxe biittai lo77iya ussee mala; shin huuphessa bagga biittaappe yiya boxiyan a saxettana.

English Sentences: Also her hired men are in the midst of her like fatted bullocks; for they also are turned back, and are fled away together: they did not stand, because the day of their calamity was come upon them, and the time of their visitation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxen qaxarettida olanchchati modhdhida mirggotu mala. Ee, etikka issippe guyye simmidi baqatidosona; eti bantta sohuwan eqqibookkona. Aissi giikko, eta bashshaa gallassai, eti qaxxayettana wodee gakkiichchiis.

English Sentences: The voice thereof shall go like a serpent; for they shall march with an army, and come against her with axes, as hewers of wood.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Morkketi wolqqan woraajjiyo wode, Gibxxe asai baqatiya shooshshaadan solddana; he morkketi mittaa qanxxiya asatudan, kalttaa ekkidi, a bolli yaana.

English Sentences: They shall cut down her forest, saith the LORD, though it cannot be searched; because they are more than the grasshoppers, and are innumerable.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yiidi asai sixima woraa qeexidi xaissiyoogaadan, Gibxxe asaa siifi wurssana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais. Morkketu qoodai booliyaappekka corattees; eta qoodanau danddayettenna.

English Sentences: The daughter of Egypt shall be confounded; she shall be delivered into the hand of the people of the north.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxe asai kauyyana; huuphessa baggappe yiya asatu kushiyankka aadhdhidi imettana" yaagees.

English Sentences: The LORD of hosts, the God of Israel, saith; Behold, I will punish the multitude of No, and Pharaoh, and Egypt, with their gods, and their kings; even Pharaoh, and all them that trust in him:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; "Taani Teebisa katamaa xoossaa Amoona, Gibxxe kawuwaa, Gibxxe biittaanne Gibxxe xoossata, Gibxxe kawotanne Gibxxe kawuwan zemppiyaageeta ubbaa qaxxayana.

English Sentences: And I will deliver them into the hand of those that seek their lives, and into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, and into the hand of his servants: and afterward it shall be inhabited, as in the days of old, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta woranau koyiya Baabiloone Kawuwaa Naabukadanaxoora kushiyaaninne a olanchchatu kushiyan aattada immana. "Hegaappe simmin, Gibxxe biittai kaseegaadan asi de7iyo biitta gidana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: But fear not thou, O my servant Jacob, and be not dismayed, O Israel: for, behold, I will save thee from afar off, and thy seed from the land of their captivity; and Jacob shall return, and be in rest and at ease, and none shall make him afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo, ta ashkkaratoo, Yaaqooba zaretoo, yayyoppite! Inttenoo, Israa7eelatoo, dagammoppite! Intte haahosan de7ishin, taani inttena ashshana; intte zaretakka eti omoodettido biittaappe yedissana. Yaaqooba zareti simmidi, aibakko bochchennan saro de7ana. Eta ai asinne yashissenna.

English Sentences: Fear thou not, O Jacob my servant, saith the LORD: for I am with thee; for I will make a full end of all the nations whither I have driven thee: but I will not make a full end of thee, but correct thee in measure; yet will I not leave thee wholly unpunished.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, ta ashkkaratoo, Yaaqooba zaretoo, taani GODAI inttenaara de7iyo gishshau, yayyoppite! Taani inttena laalido kawotettata ubbaa muleera xaissana; shin inttena muleera xaissikke. Taani inttena likke pirddan qaxxayana; qixaatee bainnan inttena muleera coo yeddikke. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: The word of the LORD that came to Jeremiah the prophet against the Philistines, before that Pharaoh smote Gaza.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxe kawoi Gaaza olanaappe kasetidi, Pilisxxeema biittaa xeelliyaagan GODAAPPE hananabaa yootiya Ermmaasakko yiida qaalai hagaa.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD; Behold, waters rise up out of the north, and shall be an overflowing flood, and shall overflow the land, and all that is therein; the city, and them that dwell therein: then the men shall cry, and all the inhabitants of the land shall howl.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Be7ite, huuphessa bagga biittappe haattai xuuqqananne di7oi gelido kixa haattadan goggana. Goggidi biittaanne biittaa bollan de7iyaabaa ubbaa, katamatanne katamatu giddon de7iya asaa ubbaakka muukkana. Yaatobare asai waassana; he biittan de7iya ubbai yeekkana.

English Sentences: At the noise of the stamping of the hoofs of his strong horses, at the rushing of his chariots, and at the rumbling of his wheels, the fathers shall not look back to their children for feebleness of hands;
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti paratu kottiyaa, paraa gaaretu giirettaanne gaaretu irzzotu gonddorssaa siyana; siyidi aawati bantta kushee arggaacido gishshau, bantta naata maaddanau guyye simmokkona.

English Sentences: Because of the day that cometh to spoil all the Philistines, and to cut off from Tyrus and Zidon every helper that remaineth: for the LORD will spoil the Philistines, the remnant of the country of Caphtor.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeema asaa xaissanaunne Xiiroosanne Sidoona maaddanau attidaageeta biittaappe xaissanau wodee gakkiis. GODAI Pilisxxeema asata, hegeetikka Meediteraane Abbaa xanxxan attida Kafttoore zareta xaissana hanees.

English Sentences: Baldness is come upon Gaza; Ashkelon is cut off with the remnant of their valley: how long wilt thou cut thyself?
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaaza asai gita kayyuwaa kayyottiis; Asqqaloona asaikka sirphphi giis. Inttenoo, abbaa xanxxa garan attidaageetoo, intte aude gakkanaashin, intte bollaa qanxxerettiiddi kayyottuuteetii?

English Sentences: O thou sword of the LORD, how long will it be ere thou be quiet? put up thyself into thy scabbard, rest, and be still.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte, Nenoo GODAA bisuwau, neeni co77u geennan ixxiyoogee aude gakkanaashiinee? Ne shoohuwau simma gela! Co77u gaada shemppa! yaageeta.

English Sentences: How can it be quiet, seeing the LORD hath given it a charge against Ashkelon, and against the sea shore? there hath he appointed it.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI a azazirggin, i waani co77u go geetii? Asqqaloona bollinne abbaa xanxxa biittan de7iya asaa bolli i a sunttirggiis" yaagees.

English Sentences: Against Moab thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; Woe unto Nebo! for it is spoiled: Kiriathaim is confounded and taken: Misgab is confounded and dismayed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Moo7aaba biittaa xeelliyaagan Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; "Nabo katamaassi aayye7ana! Aissi giikko, i bayana. Qiriyaataima katamai kauyyananne omoodettana; eta qatotikka kauyyananne meqerettana.

English Sentences: There shall be no more praise of Moab: in Heshbon they have devised evil against it; come, and let us cut it off from being a nation. Also thou shalt be cut down, O Madmen; the sword shall pursue thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaappe hini baggan Moo7aaba ceeqoi xayana. Aissi giikko, Haseboona kataman de7iya asai Moo7aaba bolli, Haayite! He biittaa ane muleera xaissoos yaagidi iitabaa maqettiis. Nenoo, Maadimeena katamau, nenakka sirphphi oottana; ne geeduwaa olai kaallana.

English Sentences: A voice of crying shall be from Horonaim, spoiling and great destruction.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Horonaima asai, Laalettainne wolqqaama bashshai gakkiis yaagidi waassiyo waasuwaa siyite!

English Sentences: Moab is destroyed; her little ones have caused a cry to be heard.
Wolaitta Sentences: Moo7aabi meqerettana; a naati yeekkiyo yeehuwaa siyite!

English Sentences: For in the going up of Luhith continual weeping shall go up; for in the going down of Horonaim the enemies have heard a cry of destruction.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti yeekkiiddi, Luhiita pudettaa kiyana; Horonaima dugettaakka bashshau waassiyaageetu waasuwaa siyiiddi wodhdhana.

English Sentences: Flee, save your lives, and be like the heath in the wilderness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti issoi issuwaa, Baqatite! Bazzon de7iya harddiidaadan woxxidi, intte shemppuwaa ashshite! yaagana.

English Sentences: For because thou hast trusted in thy works and in thy treasures, thou shalt also be taken: and Chemosh shall go forth into captivity with his priests and his princes together.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nenoo, Moo7aaba biittau, neeni ne wolqqaaninne ne duretettan ceeqettido gishshau, neenikka omoodettana. Qassi Kamoosha giyo xoossaikka ba qeesetuuranne ba halaqatuura issippe omoodettidi, harasaa baana.

English Sentences: And the spoiler shall come upon every city, and no city shall escape: the valley also shall perish, and the plain shall be destroyed, as the LORD hath spoken.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI yootidoogaadan, katamata ubbaa xaissiyaagee yaana; issi kataminne attenna; wombbainne dembbai ubbai issippe xayana.

English Sentences: Give wings unto Moab, that it may flee and get away: for the cities thereof shall be desolate, without any to dwell therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Moo7aabayyo i paallidi attiyo qefiyaa immite. A katamati ubbai baisa gidana; issi asinne etan de7enna.

English Sentences: Cursed be he that doeth the work of the LORD deceitfully, and cursed be he that keepeth back his sword from blood.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAA oosuwaa shenehoo giidi oottiya urai qanggettidaagaa gido! GODAI azazi wottin, suuttaa gussennaadan ba bisuwaa teqqiya uraikka qanggettidaagaa gido!

English Sentences: Moab hath been at ease from his youth, and he hath settled on his lees, and hath not been emptied from vessel to vessel, neither hath he gone into captivity: therefore his taste remained in him, and his scent is not changed.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Moo7aabi yelagatettaappe doommidi, ishaluwan de7ida asa mala; i hara biittau omoodettibeenna. Moo7aabi baattaappe baattau tigettennaaninne qaaxxennan, mal77oi laamettennaaninne sawoi aggennan, uttidi de7i bayida woine eessaa mala.

English Sentences: Therefore, behold, the days come, saith the LORD, that I will send unto him wanderers, that shall cause him to wander, and shall empty his vessels, and break their bottles.
Wolaitta Sentences: Moo7aaba aatti yeggiyaageeta taani GODAI kiittiyo gallassati yaana. Eti a aatti yeggidi, baattaappe cinggiriishana; cinggiriishidi, a baattaa mentterettana.

English Sentences: And Moab shall be ashamed of Chemosh, as the house of Israel was ashamed of Bethel their confidence.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Israa7eela asai ba ammanettido, Beeteelen de7iya eeqan kauyyidoogaadan, Moo7aaba asaikka ba xoossan Kamooshan kauyyana.

English Sentences: How say ye, We are mighty and strong men for the war?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte, Nuuni wolqqaama asanne mino olanchcha giidi aissi ceeqetteetii?

English Sentences: Moab is spoiled, and gone up out of her cities, and his chosen young men are gone down to the slaughter, saith the King, whose name is the LORD of hosts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7ite, Moo7aaba biittainne yan de7iya katamati bayidosona. A yelaga attumaasatikka shuhettanau duge biidosona. Taani Kawoi, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAA geetettiyaagee hagaa odais.

English Sentences: The calamity of Moab is near to come, and his affliction hasteth fast.
Wolaitta Sentences: Moo7aaba bashshai matattiis; tuggai a bollan yiyo wodeekka eesotiiddi gakkiis.

English Sentences: All ye that are about him, bemoan him; and all ye that know his name, say, How is the strong staff broken, and the beautiful rod!
Wolaitta Sentences: "A yuushuwan de7iya asau, a gitatettaakka eriya ubbau, Mino gidida kawotaa xam77ai waani meqqidee! Bonchchettida xam77ai waani kinchchettidee! yaagidi zilaalite.

English Sentences: Thou daughter that dost inhabit Dibon, come down from thy glory, and sit in thirst; for the spoiler of Moab shall come upon thee, and he shall destroy thy strong holds.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo, Diboona kataman de7iyaageetoo, intte bonchcho sohuwaappe wodhdhidi, mela biittan uttite. Aissi giikko, Moo7aaba xaissiyaagee intte bollankka yaana; intte qatuwaa ubbaakka laalana.

English Sentences: O inhabitant of Aroer, stand by the way, and espy; ask him that fleeth, and her that escapeth, and say, What is done?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Aaro7era kataman de7iyaageetoo, ogiyaa doonan eqqidi xeellite; kessi ekkidi baqatiya attumaasaanne maccaasaa, Aibee kiyidai? yaagidi oichchite.

English Sentences: Moab is confounded; for it is broken down: howl and cry; tell ye it in Arnon, that Moab is spoiled,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Oichchobare eti, Moo7aabi meqqido gishshau kauyyiis; ayyo yeekkitenne zilaalite! Moo7aabi bayidoogaa Arnnoona SHaafaa lanqqiyan awaajjite! yaagidi zaarana.

English Sentences: And judgment is come upon the plain country; upon Holon, and upon Jahazah, and upon Mephaath,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gezziyan de7iya Holoona, Yaahixa, Mefa7aata,

English Sentences: And upon Dibon, and upon Nebo, and upon Bethdiblathaim,
Wolaitta Sentences: Diboona, Nabo, Beeti-Dibilaataima,

English Sentences: And upon Kiriathaim, and upon Bethgamul, and upon Bethmeon,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qiriyaataima, Beeti-Gamuula, Beeti-Ma7oona,

English Sentences: And upon Kerioth, and upon Bozrah, and upon all the cities of the land of Moab, far or near.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qiriyootanne, Booxira geetettiya katamatu bollaaninne mataaninne haahuwan de7iya Moo7aaba katamatu bollan pirddai yiis.

English Sentences: The horn of Moab is cut off, and his arm is broken, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Moo7aaba kacee qanxxettiis; a qeseekka meqqiis. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: Make ye him drunken: for he magnified himself against the LORD: Moab also shall wallow in his vomit, and he also shall be in derision.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAA bollan otorettido gishshau, Moo7aaba ushshidi mattoyite. Mattoyin ba cooyido cooshshaa bollan gonddoretto; asai ubbaikka a bollan qilliicco.

English Sentences: For was not Israel a derision unto thee? was he found among thieves? for since thou spakest of him, thou skippedst for joy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kase neeni Israa7eela bollan qilliiccabeikkii? Abaa haasayiyo wode, neeni karada huuphiyaa qaattidoogee Israa7eeli kaisotu giddoppe oiqettiineeyye?

English Sentences: O ye that dwell in Moab, leave the cities, and dwell in the rock, and be like the dove that maketh her nest in the sides of the hole's mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo, Moo7aaban de7iyaageetoo, katamaappe kiyi biidi, shuchchaa kooppuwaa giddon de7ite. Aafuwaa doonan ba keettaa keexxiya haraphphee mala gidite.

English Sentences: We have heard the pride of Moab, (he is exceeding proud) his loftiness, and his arrogancy, and his pride, and the haughtiness of his heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Moo7aabi keehi otorettiis; Moo7aaba asai ai keenaa ayyiyaakko, minddattiyaakkonne otorettiyaakko, qassi banttana eti ai keenaa xoqqissi wottidaakko, taani siyaas.

English Sentences: I know his wrath, saith the LORD; but it shall not be so; his lies shall not so effect it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAI eta minddaa erais; shin ainne maaddenna; eta ceeqoikka aibakka oottenna.

English Sentences: Therefore will I howl for Moab, and I will cry out for all Moab; mine heart shall mourn for the men of Kirheres.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani Moo7aabassi waassais; Qiirihereesa asaassikka kayyottada yeekkais.

English Sentences: O vine of Sibmah, I will weep for thee with the weeping of Jazer: thy plants are gone over the sea, they reach even to the sea of Jazer: the spoiler is fallen upon thy summer fruits and upon thy vintage.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo, Siibima asau, Yaa7izeera asaassi yeekkiyoogaappe aattada taani inttessi yeekkais. Intte tashee daayidi, Maxine Abbaa pinnidi, Yaa7izeera gakkida woiniyaa turaa mala; shin intte ofintta teeraanne intte woiniyaa wurccuwaa bonqqiyaageeti yiidi xaissirggidosona.

English Sentences: And joy and gladness is taken from the plentiful field, and from the land of Moab; and I have caused wine to fail from the winepresses: none shall tread with shouting; their shouting shall be no shouting.
Wolaitta Sentences: Lo77o kattai aifiyo Moo7aaba biittaappe pashkkainne ufaissai ekettiichchiis. Woiniyaa teeraa gum77iyo sohotuppekka woine eessai goggennaadan teqqarggaas. Ooninne naa77antto a ililiiddi gum77enna. Asaa cenggurssai siyettikkokka, ufaissa cenggurssa gidenna.

English Sentences: From the cry of Heshbon even unto Elealeh, and even unto Jahaz, have they uttered their voice, from Zoar even unto Horonaim, as an heifer of three years old: for the waters also of Nimrim shall be desolate.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Eti Haseboonaaninne El77aalen waassiyo waasoi Yahaaxa gakkanaashin siyettees. Qassi Xoo7aaroppe biidi, Horonaimanne Egilaati-SHaliishiyaa gakkanaashin siyettees. Harai atto Nimiriima haattaikka meliis.

English Sentences: Moreover I will cause to cease in Moab, saith the LORD, him that offereth in the high places, and him that burneth incense to his gods.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani Moo7aaban asai goinniyo xoqqa sohotun yarshshiyaageetanne bantta xoossatussi ixaanaa cuwayiyaageeta xaissana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: Therefore mine heart shall sound for Moab like pipes, and mine heart shall sound like pipes for the men of Kirheres: because the riches that he hath gotten are perished.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti kase demmido duretettai ubbai ha77i xayiichchido gishshau, ta wozanai Moo7aabassinne Qiirihereesa asaassi baliyan yeekkiya asadan yeekkees.

English Sentences: For every head shall be bald, and every beard clipped: upon all the hands shall be cuttings, and upon the loins sackcloth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ubbai bantta huuphiyaanne bantta buuchchaa meedidosona; bantta kushiyaakka qanxxidi masunxxissidosona; qassi bantta xeessankka waaruwaa gixxidosona.

English Sentences: There shall be lamentation generally upon all the housetops of Moab, and in the streets thereof: for I have broken Moab like a vessel wherein is no pleasure, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Moo7aaban de7iya keetta ubbaaninne dabaaban yeehoppe attin, harabi baawa. Aissi giikko, Moo7aaba taani ooninne koyenna otodan menttaas. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: They shall howl, saying, How is it broken down! how hath Moab turned the back with shame! so shall Moab be a derision and a dismaying to all them about him.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Moo7aabi aiba meqo meqqidee! A asainne aiba waaso waassii! Moo7aabi yeellatiiddi, ba zokkuwaa wora aiba zaaro zaarii! Hegaa gishshau, Moo7aabi ba yuushuwan de7iya ubbatussi miicciyoobaanne dagammiyoobaa gidiis" yaagees.

English Sentences: For thus saith the LORD; Behold, he shall fly as an eagle, and shall spread his wings over Moab.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Argganttai ba qefiyaa piddi ootti paalliiddi yiyoogaadan, morkkee Moo7aaba bollan yaana.

English Sentences: Kerioth is taken, and the strong holds are surprised, and the mighty men's hearts in Moab at that day shall be as the heart of a woman in her pangs.
Wolaitta Sentences: A katamati ohettana; a qatotikka ekettana. He gallassi Moo7aaba mino olanchchatu wozanaikka maaretai oiqqido maccaasee wozanaa mala gidana.

English Sentences: And Moab shall be destroyed from being a people, because he hath magnified himself against the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Moo7aabi ta bollan, GODAA bollan makkalido gishshau xayana; hagaappe sinttau i kawotetta gidenna.

English Sentences: Fear, and the pit, and the snare, shall be upon thee, O inhabitant of Moab, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo, Moo7aaban de7iyaageetoo, yashshiyaabai, ollainne piree inttena naagees. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: He that fleeth from the fear shall fall into the pit; and he that getteth up out of the pit shall be taken in the snare: for I will bring upon it, even upon Moab, the year of their visitation, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yashshiyaabaappe baqatidi woxxiya ooninne ollan kunddana; qassi ollaappe pude kiyiya ooninne piriyan ohettana. Aissi giikko, taani Moo7aaba qaxxayiyo wodiyan hegaa oottana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: They that fled stood under the shadow of Heshbon because of the force: but a fire shall come forth out of Heshbon, and a flame from the midst of Sihon, and shall devour the corner of Moab, and the crown of the head of the tumultuous ones.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Baqatidi biidaageeti wolqqa xayidi, Haseboona katamaa kuwan eqqidosona. Aissi giikko, Haseboona katamaappe tamai, qassi Kawoi Sihooni beni de7ido keettaappe lacoi kiyidi, Moo7aaba biittaa ubbaanne an de7iya makkalanchcha asaa maana.

English Sentences: Woe be unto thee, O Moab! the people of Chemosh perisheth: for thy sons are taken captives, and thy daughters captives.
Wolaitta Sentences: Moo7aaba asau, intteyyo aayye7ana! Kamoosha giyo xoossaassi goinniyaageeti xayidosona; eta attuma naatinne macca naati omoodettidi biidosona.

English Sentences: Yet will I bring again the captivity of Moab in the latter days, saith the LORD. Thus far is the judgment of Moab.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gidikkonne, wurssetta wodetun taani Moo7aaba asaassi zaarada sa7aa ishalissana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees. Moo7aaba bolli odettida hiraagai hagan wuriis.

English Sentences: Concerning the Ammonites, thus saith the LORD; Hath Israel no sons? hath he no heir? why then doth their king inherit Gad, and his people dwell in his cities?
Wolaitta Sentences: Amoona asaa xeelliyaagan GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Israa7eelassi attuma na7i baawee? Woikko laattiyaabi baawee? Yaatin, Molooka giyo xoossau goinniya asati Gaada biittaa aissi oiqqidonaa? Eta katamankka aissi uttidonaa?

English Sentences: Therefore, behold, the days come, saith the LORD, that I will cause an alarm of war to be heard in Rabbah of the Ammonites; and it shall be a desolate heap, and her daughters shall be burned with fire: then shall Israel be heir unto them that were his heirs, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amoona asai de7iyo Raaba katamaa bollan olaa waasoi siyettanaadan, taani GODAI oottana gallassati yaana. He katamai qolettidi, baisa attana. A yuushuwan de7iya qeeri katamatikka taman xuugettana. Israa7eela asaikka bana ba laataappe yedettidaageeta yedettana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: Howl, O Heshbon, for Ai is spoiled: cry, ye daughters of Rabbah, gird you with sackcloth; lament, and run to and fro by the hedges; for their king shall go into captivity, and his priests and his princes together.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo, Haseboona asatoo, Aaya katamai kolettiichchido gishshau zilaalite! Inttenoo, Raaba asatoo, yeekkite! Waaruwaa maayidi kayyottite! Qassi wozanaa bayidi, katamaa gimbbiyaa giddon woxerettite! Aissi giikko, intte xoossai Molooki ba qeesetuuranne ba halaqatuura omoodettana.

English Sentences: Wherefore gloriest thou in the valleys, thy flowing valley, O backsliding daughter? that trusted in her treasures, saying, Who shall come unto me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, ammanoi bainna asatoo, intte, Nu bollan ooni woraajjii? yaagidi intte duretettaaninne intte aradda wombbatun aissi ceeqetteetii?

English Sentences: Behold, I will bring a fear upon thee, saith the Lord GOD of hosts, from all those that be about thee; and ye shall be driven out every man right forth; and none shall gather up him that wandereth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne yuushuwan de7iyaageeti ubbai nena daganttanaadan oottana. Taani Godai, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI hagaa odais. Intte ubbaikka kiyidi baqatana; qassi baqatidi biidaageeta shiishshiyaabai xayana.

English Sentences: And afterward I will bring again the captivity of the children of Ammon, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gidikkonne, wurssetta wodetun taani Amoona asaassi zaarada ishalissana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: Concerning Edom, thus saith the LORD of hosts; Is wisdom no more in Teman? is counsel perished from the prudent? is their wisdom vanished?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eedooma biittaa xeelliyaagan Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Temaana asaayyo aadhdhida eratettai baawee? Cincca asatuppe zoree xayiichchidee? Eta aadhdhida eratettai etappe goossiichchidee?

English Sentences: Flee ye, turn back, dwell deep, O inhabitants of Dedan; for I will bring the calamity of Esau upon him, the time that I will visit him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, Dadaanan de7iyaageetoo, baqatidi ciimma gonggoluwan qosettite! Aissi giikko, taani Eesawa zerettaa qaxxayiyo wodiyan, a bolli bashshaa ehaana.

English Sentences: If grapegatherers come to thee, would they not leave some gleaning grapes? if thieves by night, they will destroy till they have enough.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woiniyaa maxiyaageeti yiikko, maxiiddi poshiluwaa ashshokkonaa? Kaisoti qammi gelikkokka, banttana koshshiyaagaa xalaalaa ekkokkonaa?

English Sentences: But I have made Esau bare, I have uncovered his secret places, and he shall not be able to hide himself: his seed is spoiled, and his brethren, and his neighbours, and he is not.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani Eesawa zerettaa qaarada kallo ashshana; eti qosettanau danddayenna mala, eti qosettiyo sohotakka taani qaarada, qoncce soho oottana. Eesawa zerettai ubbai xayana; etappe issoinne attenna.

English Sentences: Leave thy fatherless children, I will preserve them alive; and let thy widows trust in me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte giddon de7iya aaya aawu haiqqiichchido naata taayyo aggi bayite; eta taani dichchana. Qassi intte am77etikka tanan ammanettona" yaagees.

English Sentences: For thus saith the LORD; Behold, they whose judgment was not to drink of the cup have assuredly drunken; and art thou he that shall altogether go unpunished? thou shalt not go unpunished, but thou shalt surely drink of it.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Simmi qaxxayettanau bessenna asati qixaatiyaa xuu7aa uyiyaageeta gidaappe attin, intte waani qaxxayettennan attana giidi qoppeetii? Tuma inttekka qixaatiyaa xuu7aappe uyeetappe attin, coo attekketa.

English Sentences: For I have sworn by myself, saith the LORD, that Bozrah shall become a desolation, a reproach, a waste, and a curse; and all the cities thereof shall be perpetual wastes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Booxira katamai baisa gididi attana; a be7ida asaassi ubbaassi daganttiyaabaa, qilliicciyoobaanne qanggiyoobaa gidana. Qassi a yuushuwan de7iya qeeri katamati ubbaikka merinau kolettidi attana. Hagaa taani GODAI ta sunttan caaqqais" yaagees.

English Sentences: I have heard a rumour from the LORD, and an ambassador is sent unto the heathen, saying, Gather ye together, and come against her, and rise up to the battle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAAPPE yiida issi kiitaa siyaas. Kawotettatu giddo kiitettidaagee, "Eedooma bolli woraajjanau shiiqite! Aara olettanau denddite!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: For, lo, I will make thee small among the heathen, and despised among men.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Simmi taani inttena kawotettatu giddon guuttana; asaa giddonkka karettidaageeta oottana.

English Sentences: Thy terribleness hath deceived thee, and the pride of thine heart, O thou that dwellest in the clefts of the rock, that holdest the height of the hill: though thou shouldest make thy nest as high as the eagle, I will bring thee down from thence, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, shuchchaa kooppuwaaninne deriyaa bollan de7iyaageetoo, intte yashissiyo yashshainne intte otoroi inttena cimmiis. Intte intte keettaa argganttaagaadan xoqqan keexxikkokka, taani inttena hegaappekka duge wottana.

English Sentences: Also Edom shall be a desolation: every one that goeth by it shall be astonished, and shall hiss at all the plagues thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Eedooma biittai asa daganttiya biitta gidana. Yaara aadhdhiya asai ubbai a bashshaa be7idi, dagammananne, Poora! gaana.

English Sentences: As in the overthrow of Sodom and Gomorrah and the neighbour cities thereof, saith the LORD, no man shall abide there, neither shall a son of man dwell in it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sadoominne Gamoori bantta yuushuwan de7iya katamatuura bayiyo wode hanidoogaadan, ooninne yan de7enna; asi mulekka yan uttenna. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: Behold, he shall come up like a lion from the swelling of Jordan against the habitation of the strong: but I will suddenly make him run away from her: and who is a chosen man, that I may appoint over her? for who is like me? and who will appoint me the time? and who is that shepherd that will stand before me?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa lanqqiyan de7iya woraappe lo77o qooroi de7iyoosaa qoppennan kiyiya gaammuwaadan, taani yaada, Eedooma asata qoppennan eta biittaappe yedettana. Hegaappe guyyiyan, ta doorido asa a bollan sunttana. Ta malai baawa; taani oottana giidobaakka teqqanau danddayiya asi baawa. Ai henttanchchi tanaara eqettanau danddayii?

English Sentences: Therefore hear the counsel of the LORD, that he hath taken against Edom; and his purposes, that he hath purposed against the inhabitants of Teman: Surely the least of the flock shall draw them out: surely he shall make their habitations desolate with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, taani GODAI Eedooma bollaaninne Temaana katamaa asaa bollan oottanau halchchidobaanne qoppidobaa siyite! Eta naata wolqqan goochchidi efaana; hegaa gaasuwan eta so asai ubbai dagammana.

English Sentences: The earth is moved at the noise of their fall, at the cry the noise thereof was heard in the Red sea.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eedooma kunddettaa giirettai biittaa qaattana; Eedoomatu waasoikka Zo7o Abbaa gakkanaashin siyettana.

English Sentences: Behold, he shall come up and fly as the eagle, and spread his wings over Bozrah: and at that day shall the heart of the mighty men of Edom be as the heart of a woman in her pangs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Argganttai ba qefiyaa piddi oottidi, bollappe duge eesuwan paallidi yiyoogaadan, morkkee Booxira bollan yaana. He gallassi Eedooma olanchchati maaretai oiqqido maccaaseedan hirggana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Concerning Damascus. Hamath is confounded, and Arpad: for they have heard evil tidings: they are fainthearted; there is sorrow on the sea; it cannot be quiet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Damasqqo xeelliyaagan GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Iita oduwaa siyido gishshau, Hamaatanne Arifaada katamatun de7iya asai yeellatiisinne yayyiis. Beetai shociyo abbaadan, eta wozanai shemppuwaa demmanau danddayibeenna.

English Sentences: Damascus is waxed feeble, and turneth herself to flee, and fear hath seized on her: anguish and sorrows have taken her, as a woman in travail.
Wolaitta Sentences: Damasqqo asai daafuriis; eti dagaman shabbirettidi baqatidosona; maccaasiyo maaretai oiqqiyoogaadan, metoinne tuggai eta oiqqiis.

English Sentences: How is the city of praise not left, the city of my joy!
Wolaitta Sentences: Ufaissai kumido he erettida katamai asi de7enna soho gidana!

English Sentences: Therefore her young men shall fall in her streets, and all the men of war shall be cut off in that day, saith the LORD of hosts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, he gallassan he kataman de7iya yelaga attumaasa ubbai katamaa giddo ogetun haiqqana; olanchchati ubbaikka wurana. Taani, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: And I will kindle a fire in the wall of Damascus, and it shall consume the palaces of Benhadad.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Damasqqo katamaa dirssaa gimbbiyan tamaa yeddana; he tamai Benihadaada qatota ubbaa maana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Concerning Kedar, and concerning the kingdoms of Hazor, which Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon shall smite, thus saith the LORD; Arise ye, go up to Kedar, and spoil the men of the east.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloone Kawoi Naabukadanaxoori olidi xoonido Qeedaarenne Haxoora kawotettata xeelliyaagan GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Denddite; denddidi Qeedaare asaa olite! He arshsho baggaara de7iya asaa wurssite!

English Sentences: Their tents and their flocks shall they take away: they shall take to themselves their curtains, and all their vessels, and their camels; and they shall cry unto them, Fear is on every side.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta dunkkaanetanne eta wudeta ekkite! Eta magalashota, eta aquwaa ubbaanne eta gaameelata ekkite! Yaatidi etau, Intte yuusho ubban shabbirssai denddiis! yaagidi odite.

English Sentences: Flee, get you far off, dwell deep, O ye inhabitants of Hazor, saith the LORD; for Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon hath taken counsel against you, and hath conceived a purpose against you.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo, Haxooran de7iyaageetoo, Baabiloone Kawoi Naabukadanaxoori intte bollan iitabaa oottanau maqetti uttido gishshau, baqatite; haahosaa biidi, ciimma gonggoluwan qosettite! Taani GODAI hagaa odaas.

English Sentences: Arise, get you up unto the wealthy nation, that dwelleth without care, saith the LORD, which have neither gates nor bars, which dwell alone.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Naabukadanaxooraa, dendda! Denddada hirggi bainnan saro de7iya kawotettatu bolli woraajja! Taani GODAI hagaa odais. Eta katamaa gimbbiyau ifitti woikko hiraqoi baawa. Eti banttarkka de7oosona.

English Sentences: And their camels shall be a booty, and the multitude of their cattle a spoil: and I will scatter into all winds them that are in the utmost corners; and I will bring their calamity from all sides thereof, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Eta gaameelati bonqqettana; eta wudeekka omoodettana. Bantta huuphiyaa shubeeriyaa meedissiyaageeta ubbaa taani carkkuwan laalana; taani ubbasaara eta bolli bashshaa ehaana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: And Hazor shall be a dwelling for dragons, and a desolation for ever: there shall no man abide there, nor any son of man dwell in it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haxoori merinaukka worakanati de7iyo bazzo gididi attana. Ooninne yan de7enna; asi mulekka yan uttenna" yaagees.

English Sentences: The word of the LORD that came to Jeremiah the prophet against Elam in the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah king of Judah, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa Kawoi Sedeqiyaasi koiro kawotido wode, Elaama biittaa xeelliyaagan GODAAPPE Ermmaasakko yiida qaalai hagaa.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; Behold, I will break the bow of Elam, the chief of their might.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Elaamassi waanna wolqqa gidiya eta wonddafiyaasata taani worana.

English Sentences: And upon Elam will I bring the four winds from the four quarters of heaven, and will scatter them toward all those winds; and there shall be no nation whither the outcasts of Elam shall not come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbasaara taani Elaama bollan carkkuwaa ehaana; etakka he carkkuwan ubbasaa laalana. Hegaa gishshau, Elaama asai laalettidi gakkenna biitti de7enna.

English Sentences: For I will cause Elam to be dismayed before their enemies, and before them that seek their life: and I will bring evil upon them, even my fierce anger, saith the LORD; and I will send the sword after them, till I have consumed them:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta morkketu sinttaaninne eta woranau koyiyaageetu sinttan taani Elaama daganttana. Taani ta gita hanqquwan eta bolli bashshaa ehaana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais. Taani eta xaissana gakkanaashin, bisuwan yedettana.

English Sentences: And I will set my throne in Elam, and will destroy from thence the king and the princes, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Elaama kawuwaanne eta halaqata xaissada, ta kawotaa araataa yan wottana.

English Sentences: But it shall come to pass in the latter days, that I will bring again the captivity of Elam, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gidikkonne, wurssetta wodetun taani Elaama asaa zaarada ishalissana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: The word that the LORD spake against Babylon and against the land of the Chaldeans by Jeremiah the prophet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloone biittaanne Baabiloone asaa xeelliyaagan hananabaa yootiya Ermmaasa baggaara GODAI odido qaalai hagaa:

English Sentences: Declare ye among the nations, and publish, and set up a standard; publish, and conceal not: say, Babylon is taken, Bel is confounded, Merodach is broken in pieces; her idols are confounded, her images are broken in pieces.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Kawotettatu giddon oditenne awaajjite. Banddiraa xoqqu ootti oiqqidi, aibanne qosennan, hagaadan yaagidi yootite; Baabiloonee kunddiis! Beelanne Mardduuka geetettiya a xoossatikka yeellatidosonanne meqerettidosona. Qassi a misiletinne a eeqati meqerettidosona.

English Sentences: For out of the north there cometh up a nation against her, which shall make her land desolate, and none shall dwell therein: they shall remove, they shall depart, both man and beast.
Wolaitta Sentences: Huuphessa bagga biittaappe issi kawotettai yaana; yiidi Baabiloone biittaa bashshana. Yaatobare asaikka meheekka ubbai baqatana; ooninne yan de7enna yaagite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: In those days, and in that time, saith the LORD, the children of Israel shall come, they and the children of Judah together, going and weeping: they shall go, and seek the LORD their God.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "He wodiyaaninne he gallassatun Israa7eela asainne Yihudaa asai issippe gididi, yeekkiiddi yaana; yiidi GODAA bantta Xoossaa koyana.

English Sentences: They shall ask the way to Zion with their faces thitherward, saying, Come, and let us join ourselves to the LORD in a perpetual covenant that shall not be forgotten.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Xiyoone efiya ogiyaa oichchidi, bantta sinttaa yaa zaaridi, Haayite! Nuuni mulekka dogettenna merinaa maachchaa GODAARA ane maacettoos yaagana.

English Sentences: My people hath been lost sheep: their shepherds have caused them to go astray, they have turned them away on the mountains: they have gone from mountain to hill, they have forgotten their restingplace.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta asai bayida dorssatu mala gidiis; eta henttanchchati eta balettidi, deriyan wora yeddidosona. Issi deriyaappe hara deriyaa toilattiiddi, bantta birddiyaa dogidosona.

English Sentences: All that found them have devoured them: and their adversaries said, We offend not, because they have sinned against the LORD, the habitation of justice, even the LORD, the hope of their fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Demmida ubbai eta dechchiis. Eta morkketi, Nuuni ainne mooribookko; hagee metoi ubbai eta gakkidoogee, eti GODAA, bantta shemppo sohuwaa, bantta maizza aawatu hidootaa naaqqido gishshaassa yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Remove out of the midst of Babylon, and go forth out of the land of the Chaldeans, and be as the he goats before the flocks.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo, Israa7eela asatoo, ha77i simmi Baabiloone asaa giddoppe kiyidi baqatite! Baabiloonetu biittaappe biite! Yaatidi wudiyaa kaalettiya deeshsha orggiyaa mala gidite.

English Sentences: For, lo, I will raise and cause to come up against Babylon an assembly of great nations from the north country: and they shall set themselves in array against her; from thence she shall be taken: their arrows shall be as of a mighty expert man; none shall return in vain.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani huuphessa bagga biittaappe gita gita kawotettatu citata denttada, Baabiloone bolli ehaidda de7ais. Eti a olana; olidikka oiqqana; eta zubbee dukkidi zambbiya olanchchaa mala.

English Sentences: And Chaldea shall be a spoil: all that spoil her shall be satisfied, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloone biittai bonqqettana; a bonqqiya ubbai kallana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: Because ye were glad, because ye rejoiced, O ye destroyers of mine heritage, because ye are grown fat as the heifer at grass, and bellow as bulls;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo, Baabiloone asatoo, ta asaa bonqqiyaageetoo, intte ufaittidi, poccu giideta. Qooruwaa kallida usseedan, intte phixxillideta; korima paraadan caaggideta.

English Sentences: Your mother shall be sore confounded; she that bare you shall be ashamed: behold, the hindermost of the nations shall be a wilderness, a dry land, and a desert.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ha77i intte waanna katamai yeellatananne kauyyana. Qassi kawotettatu giddonkka Baabiloonee ubbaappe wurssetta gidana; haatti bainna mela bazzo gidana.

English Sentences: Because of the wrath of the LORD it shall not be inhabited, but it shall be wholly desolate: every one that goeth by Babylon shall be astonished, and hiss at all her plagues.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA hanqquwaa gaasuwan, Baabiloonee asi de7ennasaa gidana; i muleera qolettana. A lanqqiyaara aadhdhiya ubbai a bollan gakkida boshaa be7idi, dagammananne, Poora! gaana.

English Sentences: Put yourselves in array against Babylon round about: all ye that bend the bow, shoot at her, spare no arrows: for she hath sinned against the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo, wonddafiyaa dukkiyaageetoo, Baabiloone olanau a yuushuwan salppite; i GODAA bollan nagaraa oottido gishshau, intte zubbetun ubban a dukkite.

English Sentences: Shout against her round about: she hath given her hand: her foundations are fallen, her walls are thrown down: for it is the vengeance of the LORD: take vengeance upon her; as she hath done, do unto her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubba baggaarakka Baabiloone bollan olaa waasuwaa waassite! Baabiloonee kushiyaa immiis; a adussa gimbbeti kunddidosona; a gimbbiyaa dirssaikka kolettiis. GODAI a bollan haluwaa kiyiiddi de7iyo gishshau, inttekka a bollan haluwaa kiyite! I haratu bollan oottidobaa inttekka a bollan oottite!

English Sentences: Cut off the sower from Babylon, and him that handleth the sickle in the time of harvest: for fear of the oppressing sword they shall turn every one to his people, and they shall flee every one to his own land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zerettaa zeriyaagaanne cahaa wode baacaara kiyiyaagaa ubbaa Baabilooneppe xaissite. Un77ettiyaageetu bisuwaassi yayyido gishshau, he biittan de7iya asai ubbai ba yaraakko yaraakko simmidi, ba biitti biitti baqatana.

English Sentences: Israel is a scattered sheep; the lions have driven him away: first the king of Assyria hath devoured him; and last this Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon hath broken his bones.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eeli gaammoi yedettidi laalido dorssaa mala. Koiro Asoore kawoi a ashuwaa miis; wurssettan qassi Baabiloone Kawoi Naabukadanaxoori a meqettaa xoggiis.

English Sentences: Therefore thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; Behold, I will punish the king of Babylon and his land, as I have punished the king of Assyria.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai, taani hagaa odais: Asoore kawuwaa taani qaxxayidoogaadan, Baabiloone kawuwaakka a biittaakka qaxxayana.

English Sentences: And I will bring Israel again to his habitation, and he shall feed on Carmel and Bashan, and his soul shall be satisfied upon mount Ephraim and Gilead.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Israa7eela i heemettiyo sohuwaa zaarana; Qarmmeloosanne Baasaane Deretun i heemettana. Qassi eti Efireema gezziyaaninne Gala7aade gezziyan kallidi maana.

English Sentences: In those days, and in that time, saith the LORD, the iniquity of Israel shall be sought for, and there shall be none; and the sins of Judah, and they shall not be found: for I will pardon them whom I reserve.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wodiyaaninne he gallassatun asai Israa7eelan mooruwaa koyana; shin mooroi xayana; Yihudan nagaraa koyana; shin beettenna. Aissi giikko, haiquwaappe taani ashshido Israa7eela asaa atettaa nagaraa taani atto yaagana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: Go up against the land of Merathaim, even against it, and against the inhabitants of Pekod: waste and utterly destroy after them, saith the LORD, and do according to all that I have commanded thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Miraataima biittaanne Piqooda biittan de7iya asaa bollan denddite; denddidi eta olite, woritenne eta mule xaissite. Taani inttena azazidoogaadan ubbabaa oottite.

English Sentences: A sound of battle is in the land, and of great destruction.
Wolaitta Sentences: He biittan olaa waasoi siyettees; gita bashshaikka gakkiis.

English Sentences: How is the hammer of the whole earth cut asunder and broken! how is Babylon become a desolation among the nations!
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittaa sa7aa ubbaa liiqissiya dijinoi aiba meqo meqqidee! Aiba liiqo liiqidee! Kawotettatu ubbaa giddon Baabiloonee aiba daganttiyaabaa gididee!

English Sentences: I have laid a snare for thee, and thou art also taken, O Babylon, and thou wast not aware: thou art found, and also caught, because thou hast striven against the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenoo, Baabiloonee, taani nena oiqqanau piriyaa wottaas; wottin neeni erennan de7aidda gelada oiqettadasa. Neeni tanaara, GODAARA gaaddetido gishshau oiqettadasa.

English Sentences: The LORD hath opened his armoury, and hath brought forth the weapons of his indignation: for this is the work of the Lord GOD of hosts in the land of the Chaldeans.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAI ta ola miishshaa wottiyo keettaa dooyaas; dooyada ta hanqquwaa ola miishshaa appe kessaas. Aissi giikko, taani Godai, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI Baabiloone biittan oottiyo oosoi de7ees.

English Sentences: Come against her from the utmost border, open her storehouses: cast her up as heaps, and destroy her utterly: let nothing of her be left.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaara haara a bolli woraajjite! Kattai de7iyo a gootarata pogite; omooduwaakka kattaadan issidiran guuppite! Aibanne ashshennan akka wurssi xaissite!

English Sentences: Slay all her bullocks; let them go down to the slaughter: woe unto them! for their day is come, the time of their visitation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Boorata shukkiyoogaadan, eta olanchchata siifite! Baabiloone asaayyo aayye7ana! Aissi giikko, eta gallassai, eti qaxxayettiyo wodee gakkiis.

English Sentences: The voice of them that flee and escape out of the land of Babylon, to declare in Zion the vengeance of the LORD our God, the vengeance of his temple.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Omoodettida asati Baabilooneppe kessi ekkidi, Yerusalaame baqatana. Baabiloone biittaa asai Beeta Maqidasiyaa bollan oottidobaassi GODAI eta Xoossai haluwaa kiyiyoogaa eti Xiyoonen haasayana.

English Sentences: Call together the archers against Babylon: all ye that bend the bow, camp against it round about; let none thereof escape: recompense her according to her work; according to all that she hath done, do unto her: for she hath been proud against the LORD, against the Holy One of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Baabiloone olanau wonddafiyaa dukkiyaageeta ubbaa xeegite; issoinne kessi ekkennaadan, eti a yuushuwan dooddona. GODAA bolli, Israa7eela Geeshshaa bolli, i otorettido gishshau, ayyo a oosuwaadan zaarite. I haratu bollan oottidoogaadan, a bollankka oottite.

English Sentences: Therefore shall her young men fall in the streets, and all her men of war shall be cut off in that day, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, a yelaga attumaasati katamaa giddo ogiyan haiqqana; he gallassi a olanchchati ubbai xayana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais" yaagees.

English Sentences: Behold, I am against thee, O thou most proud, saith the Lord GOD of hosts: for thy day is come, the time that I will visit thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Nenoo, otoranchchau, taani ne bolli denddaas. Aissi giikko, ne gallassai, neeni qaxxayettiyo wodee gakkiis.

English Sentences: And the most proud shall stumble and fall, and none shall raise him up: and I will kindle a fire in his cities, and it shall devour all round about him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Otoranchchai xubettidi kunddana; a denttiyaabikka de7enna. Taani a katamatu giddon tamaa eettana; he tamai yuushuwan de7iya ubbaa mirggana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; The children of Israel and the children of Judah were oppressed together: and all that took them captives held them fast; they refused to let them go.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Israa7eela asainne Yihudaa asai issippe naaqettiis. Eta omooddidi efiidaageeti eta wolqqappe mintti oiqqidosona; oiqqidi yeddennan diggidosona.

English Sentences: Their Redeemer is strong; the LORD of hosts is his name: he shall throughly plead their cause, that he may give rest to the land, and disquiet the inhabitants of Babylon.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eta Woziyaagee mino; a sunttaikka Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAA. I eta biittaayyo shemppuwaa immanau, eta gishshau mootettees. SHin Baabiloone biittan de7iyaageetuyyo shabbirssaa immana.

English Sentences: A sword is upon the Chaldeans, saith the LORD, and upon the inhabitants of Babylon, and upon her princes, and upon her wise men.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Baabiloone asainne Baabiloone biittan de7iyaageeti bisuwan haiqqona! "A halaqatinne a aadhdhida eranchchati bisuwan haiqqona! Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: A sword is upon the liars; and they shall dote: a sword is upon her mighty men; and they shall be dismayed.
Wolaitta Sentences: "A worddo hananabaa yootiyaageeti, eeyyati bisuwan haiqqona! "A wolqqaama olanchchati, dagammidaageeti bisuwan haiqqona!

English Sentences: A sword is upon their horses, and upon their chariots, and upon all the mingled people that are in the midst of her; and they shall become as women: a sword is upon her treasures; and they shall be robbed.
Wolaitta Sentences: "A paratu bollinne a paratu gaaretu bolli, qassi maccaasa mala gidida a allaga olanchchatu bolli bisoi yo! "A buquraa minjjiyo keettaa bolli bisoi yo! Yaatobare a buqurai ubbai bonqqettana.

English Sentences: A drought is upon her waters; and they shall be dried up: for it is the land of graven images, and they are mad upon their idols.
Wolaitta Sentences: "A bolli koshai yo! Yaatobare a haattai melana. Aissi giikko, Baabiloone biittai eeqaa misileti kumido biitta; he misileti asaa daganttoosonanne eeyyettoosona.

English Sentences: Therefore the wild beasts of the desert with the wild beasts of the islands shall dwell there, and the owls shall dwell therein: and it shall be no more inhabited for ever; neither shall it be dwelt in from generation to generation.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, Baabiloonee bazzo do7atinne worakanati de7iyo soho gidana; qassi yanchchatikka an de7ana. An merinaukka asi de7enna; yeleta ubbankka asi an uttenna.

English Sentences: As God overthrew Sodom and Gomorrah and the neighbour cities thereof, saith the LORD; so shall no man abide there, neither shall any son of man dwell therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai beni Sadoomanne Gamoora eta yuushuwan de7iya katamatuura issippe xaissidoogaadan, Baabiloonen ooninne de7enna; asi mulekka yan uttenna. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: Behold, a people shall come from the north, and a great nation, and many kings shall be raised up from the coasts of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Be7ite, asai huuphessa bagga biittaappe yees; mino kawotettatinne daro kawoti sa7aa gaxaappe yaanau denddoosona.

English Sentences: They shall hold the bow and the lance: they are cruel, and will not shew mercy: their voice shall roar like the sea, and they shall ride upon horses, every one put in array, like a man to the battle, against thee, O daughter of Babylon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta wonddafiyaanne tooraa oiqqidosona; eti meqettaa iitanne yeddi maarenna asa. Eti bantta paraa toggidi biyo wode, beetai shociyo abbaa gunttaadan hanees. Nenoo, Baabiloonee, eti ubbaikka olau giigida asaa gididi, ne bollan salppidosona.

English Sentences: The king of Babylon hath heard the report of them, and his hands waxed feeble: anguish took hold of him, and pangs as of a woman in travail.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Baabiloone kawoi eta oduwaa siyiis; siyin a kushee daafuridi, hilssi giis; maaretai oiqqido maccaaseedan, un77oi a oiqqiis.

English Sentences: Behold, he shall come up like a lion from the swelling of Jordan unto the habitation of the strong: but I will make them suddenly run away from her: and who is a chosen man, that I may appoint over her? for who is like me? and who will appoint me the time? and who is that shepherd that will stand before me?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa lanqqiyan de7iya woraappe lo77o qooroi de7iyoosaa qoppennan kiyiya gaammuwaadan, taani yaada, Baabiloone asaa eta biittaappe yedettana. Hegaappe guyyiyan, ta doorido asa a bollan sunttana. Aissi giikko, ta mali baawa; taani oottana giidobaakka teqqanau danddayiya asi baawa. Ai henttanchchi tanaara eqettanau danddayii?

English Sentences: Therefore hear ye the counsel of the LORD, that he hath taken against Babylon; and his purposes, that he hath purposed against the land of the Chaldeans: Surely the least of the flock shall draw them out: surely he shall make their habitation desolate with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani GODAI Baabiloone asaa bollaaninne Baabiloone biittaa bollan halchchidobaanne qoppidobaa siyite! Eta naata wolqqan goochchidi efaana; hegaa gaasuwan eta so asai ubbai dagammana.

English Sentences: At the noise of the taking of Babylon the earth is moved, and the cry is heard among the nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloone kunddettaa giirettai biittaa qaattana; Baabiloonetu waasoikka kawotettatu ubban siyettana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD; Behold, I will raise up against Babylon, and against them that dwell in the midst of them that rise up against me, a destroying wind;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Baabiloone asaanne Baabiloone biittaa xaissiyaabaa taani kiittana.

English Sentences: And will send unto Babylon fanners, that shall fan her, and shall empty her land: for in the day of trouble they shall be against her round about.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Baabiloone bolli allagata kiittana; eti yiidi, a suraggana; a biittaa baisa oottana. A bashshaa gallassi eti ubbasaara a dooddana.

English Sentences: Against him that bendeth let the archer bend his bow, and against him that lifteth himself up in his brigandine: and spare ye not her young men; destroy ye utterly all her host.
Wolaitta Sentences: A olanchchati wonddafiyaa dukkanaashin woikko bantta ola miishshaa gixxanaashin gattoppite. A yelagata ashshoppite; a olanchchata muliyaa xaissite.

English Sentences: Thus the slain shall fall in the land of the Chaldeans, and they that are thrust through in her streets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Baabiloone biittan siifetti wurana; eta katamatu ogetunkka cadetti kunddana.

English Sentences: For Israel hath not been forsaken, nor Judah of his God, of the LORD of hosts; though their land was filled with sin against the Holy One of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela biittainne Yihudaa biittai Israa7eela Geeshshaa, tana, naaqqido nagaran kumidaagaa gidikkonne, Israa7eela gidin, Yihudaa gidin, naa77aakka taani eta Xoossai, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI yeggabeikke.

English Sentences: Flee out of the midst of Babylon, and deliver every man his soul: be not cut off in her iniquity; for this is the time of the LORD's vengeance; he will render unto her a recompence.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Baabilooneppe baqatite! Asi ubbi ba shemppuwaa shemppuwaa ashsho! I oottido nagaraa gaasuwan intte wuroppite! Hagee wodee taani GODAI ta autiyaa achchiyo wode.

English Sentences: Babylon hath been a golden cup in the LORD's hand, that made all the earth drunken: the nations have drunken of her wine; therefore the nations are mad.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloonee sa7an de7iya asai ubbai uyidi mattottiyo woine eessai tigettiyo, ta kushiyan de7iya worqqa wanccaa mala. Kawotettati ubbati he woine eessaa uyidi gooyidosona.

English Sentences: Babylon is suddenly fallen and destroyed: howl for her; take balm for her pain, if so be she may be healed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloonee qoppennan kunddidi meqqiis. Hegaa gishshau, ayyo yeekkite! A masunttaassi xaliyaa immite. Ooni erii, i paxanaakkonne.

English Sentences: We would have healed Babylon, but she is not healed: forsake her, and let us go every one into his own country: for her judgment reacheth unto heaven, and is lifted up even to the skies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloonen de7iya allaga asati, Nuuni Baabiloone pattanau koyida; shin paxanau danddayibeenna. Ane a aggiigidi, nu biitti biitti simmoos. Aissi giikko, a pirddai haakkidi, saluwaa gakkiis; bolla saluwaa gufanttuwaa gakkanau pude xoqqiis yaagidosona" yaagees.

English Sentences: The LORD hath brought forth our righteousness: come, and let us declare in Zion the work of the LORD our God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai, "GODAI nuna shatinttiis! Ane Yerusalaame biidi, GODAI nu Xoossai oottidobaa asaassi odoos!" yaagana.

English Sentences: Make bright the arrows; gather the shields: the LORD hath raised up the spirit of the kings of the Medes: for his device is against Babylon, to destroy it; because it is the vengeance of the LORD, the vengeance of his temple.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Baabiloone xaissanau qofaa qachchido gishshau, Meedoonatu kawota olau denttiis; i ba Beeta Maqidasiyaa autiyaa hagaadan oottidi achchana. Meedoonatu gadaawati hagaadan yaagidosona; "Zubbeta leefite; gonddalleta oiqqite!

English Sentences: Set up the standard upon the walls of Babylon, make the watch strong, set up the watchmen, prepare the ambushes: for the LORD hath both devised and done that which he spake against the inhabitants of Babylon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloone bolli olaa banddiraa denttite; naagiyaageetakka minttite! Wochchiyaageetakka eta sohuwan sohuwan wottite; zuggidi naagiya olanchchatakka giigissite!" yaagidosona. Aissi giikko, GODAI Baabiloonen de7iya asaa bolli haasayidobaanne qoppidobaa oottana.

English Sentences: O thou that dwellest upon many waters, abundant in treasures, thine end is come, and the measure of thy covetousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloonee daro shaafatinne daro aqoi kumido biitta; shin a wurssettai gakkiis; a de7uwaa turaikka duuxxiis.

English Sentences: The LORD of hosts hath sworn by himself, saying, Surely I will fill thee with men, as with caterpillers; and they shall lift up a shout against thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, "Boolee biittaa kumiyoogaadan, taani asata ne biittan kunttana; etikka nena xoonido ufaissaa bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, ne bollan gairana" yaagidi ba sunttan caaqqiis.

English Sentences: He hath made the earth by his power, he hath established the world by his wisdom, and hath stretched out the heaven by his understanding.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ba wolqqan sa7aa medhdhiis; ba aadhdhida eratettan biittaa baasiis; salotakka ba akeekan micciis.

English Sentences: When he uttereth his voice, there is a multitude of waters in the heavens; and he causeth the vapours to ascend from the ends of the earth: he maketh lightnings with rain, and bringeth forth the wind out of his treasures.
Wolaitta Sentences: I haasayiyo wode, saluwan de7iya haattati guummoosona. SHaarata i sa7aa gaxaappe ehees. Qassi irai bukkiyo wodekka, wolqqanttaa wolqqammissees. Ba minjjiyo sohuwaappekka carkkuwaa kessees.

English Sentences: Every man is brutish by his knowledge; every founder is confounded by the graven image: for his molten image is falsehood, and there is no breath in them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi ubbi akeekinne eri bainnaagaa. Qassi worqqaa tigidi, eeqa misileta medhdhiyaageeti ubbati yeellatidosona. Aissi giikko, eta misileti worddonne shemppoi bainnaageeta.

English Sentences: They are vanity, the work of errors: in the time of their visitation they shall perish.
Wolaitta Sentences: He misileti pattennaageetanne karettidaageeta. Eta bollan pirddai yiyo wode, eti xayana.

English Sentences: The portion of Jacob is not like them; for he is the former of all things: and Israel is the rod of his inheritance: the LORD of hosts is his name.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yaaqooba Xoossai hegaa mala gidenna. Aissi giikko, i ubbabaa medhdhidaagaa. Israa7eela asai i baassi doorido zare. A sunttaikka Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAA.

English Sentences: Thou art my battle axe and weapons of war: for with thee will I break in pieces the nations, and with thee will I destroy kingdoms;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Baabiloonee, neeni ta dijinonne ta ola miishsha. Nenan go7ettada taani biittata mentterettaas; kawotettatakka xaissaas.

English Sentences: And with thee will I break in pieces the horse and his rider; and with thee will I break in pieces the chariot and his rider;
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenan paratanne paraa toggiyaageeta, para gaaretanne eta laaggiyaageeta mentterettaas.

English Sentences: With thee also will I break in pieces man and woman; and with thee will I break in pieces old and young; and with thee will I break in pieces the young man and the maid;
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenan maccaanne attumaa, cimaanne naatuwaa, wodallatanne geela7ota mentterettaas.

English Sentences: I will also break in pieces with thee the shepherd and his flock; and with thee will I break in pieces the husbandman and his yoke of oxen; and with thee will I break in pieces captains and rulers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenan henttanchchaanne a wudiyaa, goyiyaagaanne a waatta boorata, deriyaa haariyaageetanne halaqata mentterettaas" yaagees.

English Sentences: And I will render unto Babylon and to all the inhabitants of Chaldea all their evil that they have done in Zion in your sight, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Baabiloone asainne Baabiloonen de7iyaageeti Xiyoone bolli oottido iitaa haluwaa taani intte xeellishin kessana.

English Sentences: Behold, I am against thee, O destroying mountain, saith the LORD, which destroyest all the earth: and I will stretch out mine hand upon thee, and roll thee down from the rocks, and will make thee a burnt mountain.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nenoo, Baabiloonee, neeni biittaa sa7aa bashshiya wogga deriyaa mala; shin taani GODAI nena morkkais. Taani ta kushiyaa yeddada, nena deriyaa bollappe duge gonddorssana; hegaappe guyyiyan, neeni biittanne bidintta gidada attana.

English Sentences: And they shall not take of thee a stone for a corner, nor a stone for foundations; but thou shalt be desolate for ever, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77antto neeppe baasuwan yeggiyo woikko gimbbiyau ekkiyo shuchchi de7enna; neeni merinaukka baisa gidana. Taani GODAI hagaa odais.

English Sentences: Set ye up a standard in the land, blow the trumpet among the nations, prepare the nations against her, call together against her the kingdoms of Ararat, Minni, and Ashchenaz; appoint a captain against her; cause the horses to come up as the rough caterpillers.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Baabiloone bolli olaa banddiraa denttite; asaa ubbaa giddon malkkataa punnite. A olanau asaa ubbaa giigissite; Araaraate, Miinanne Ashkkanaaza kawotettata xeesite. Ola gadaawaakka sunttite; booliyaa keena daro paratakka ehiite.

English Sentences: Prepare against her the nations with the kings of the Medes, the captains thereof, and all the rulers thereof, and all the land of his dominion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloone olanau kawotettata ubbaa giigissite; Meedoona kawota, eta halaqata, deriyaa haariyaageetanne eti haariyo biittaa asaa ubbaa denttite.

English Sentences: And the land shall tremble and sorrow: for every purpose of the LORD shall be performed against Babylon, to make the land of Babylon a desolation without an inhabitant.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Baabiloone ooninne de7enna bazzo oottanau GODAI halchchido halchchuwaa poliyo gishshau, biittai ubbai kokkoreesinne porqqattees.

English Sentences: The mighty men of Babylon have forborn to fight, they have remained in their holds: their might hath failed; they became as women: they have burned her dwellingplaces; her bars are broken.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloone olanchchati olaa olettiyoogaa aggidosona; aggidi bantta qatuwan utti bayidosona. Eta wolqqai hitiis; hitin eti maccaasa mala gididosona. Eta keettatikka xuugettidosona; eta katamaa yuushuwaa gimbbiyaa penggetikka meqqidosona.

English Sentences: One post shall run to meet another, and one messenger to meet another, to shew the king of Babylon that his city is taken at one end,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha gaxaappe hini gaxaa gakkanaashin, katamai morkkiyan ohettidoogaa Baabiloone kawuwaassi yootanau, woxxiyaagee woxxiyaagaa kaallidi, kiitettidaageekka kiitettidaagaa kaallidi boosona.

English Sentences: And that the passages are stopped, and the reeds they have burned with fire, and the men of war are affrighted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi shaafaara pinniyo sohoti ohettidoogaa, qatoti xuugettidoogaanne olanchchati dagammidoogaa eti kawuwaassi yootanau boosona" yaagees.
